life.quote: So plant your own gardens and decorate your own soul, instead of waiting for someone to bring you flowers.
life.author: Jorge Luis Borges

life.quote: Holiness doesn't mean doing extraordinary things, but doing ordinary things with love and faith.
life.author: Pope Francis

life.quote: My nostrils dilate while savoring the acrid odor of gunpowder and blood… Crazy with fury I will stain my rifle red while slaughtering any surrendered enemy that falls in my hands! With the deaths of my enemies I prepare my being for the sacred fight and join the triumphant proletariat with a bestial howl!
life.author: Che Guevara

life.quote: You have to fight to reach your dream. You have to sacrifice and work hard for it.
life.author: Lionel Messi

life.quote: Life is a journey. When we stop, things don't go right.
life.author: Pope Francis

life.quote: Do not give up your dreams of a more just world.
life.author: Pope Francis

life.quote: You must always strive to be the best, but you must never believe that you are.
life.author: Juan Manuel Fangio

life.quote: Migrants and refugees are not pawns on the chessboard of humanity. They are children, women and men who leave or who are forced to leave their homes for various reasons, who share a legitimate desire for knowing and having, but above all for being more
life.author: Pope Francis

life.quote: Being with you and not being with you is the only way I have to measure time.
life.author: Jorge Luis Borges

life.quote: I know you are here to kill me. Shoot, coward, you are only going to kill a man.
life.author: Che Guevara

life.quote: Every person has the truth in his heart. No matter how complicated his circumstances, no matter how others look at him from the outside, and no matter how deep or shallow the truth dwells in his heart, once his heart is pieced with a crystal needle, the truth will gush forth like a geyser.
life.author: Che Guevara

life.quote: At the risk of seeming ridiculous, let me say that the true revolutionary is guided by a great feeling of love. It is impossible to think of a genuine revolutionary lacking this quality.
life.author: Che Guevara

life.quote: My ambition is always to get better and better.
life.author: Lionel Messi

life.quote: I recognize that globalization has helped many people rise out of poverty, but it has also damned many others to starve to death. It is true that global wealth is growing in absolute terms, but inequalities have also grown and new poverty arisen.
life.author: Pope Francis

life.quote: I have one thing that counts, and that is my heart; it burns in my soul, it aches in my flesh, and it ignites my nerves: that is my love for the people and Peron.
life.author: Evita Peron

life.quote: Democracy is not compatible with financial oligarchy.
life.author: Che Guevara

life.quote: Shadows cannot see themselves in the mirror of the sun.
life.author: Evita Peron

life.quote: I am not Christ or a philanthropist, old lady, I am all the contrary of a Christ I fight for the things I believe in, with all the weapons at my disposal and try to leave the other man dead so that I don't get nailed to a cross or any other place.
life.author: Che Guevara

life.quote: I learned to approach racing like a game of billiards. If you bash the ball too hard, you get nowhere. As you handle the cue properly, you drive with more finesse.
life.author: Juan Manuel Fangio

life.quote: True charity requires courage: let us overcome the fear of getting our hands dirty so as to help those in need.
life.author: Pope Francis

life.quote: I cannot sleep unless I am surrounded by books.
life.author: Jorge Luis Borges

life.quote: The fact is that poetry is not the books in the library . . . Poetry is the encounter of the reader with the book, the discovery of the book.
life.author: Jorge Luis Borges

life.quote: The worst labyrinth is not that intricate form that can entrap us forever, but a single and precise straight line
life.author: Jorge Luis Borges

life.quote: One must have a large dose of humanity, a large dose of a sense of justice and truth in order to avoid dogmatic extremes, cold scholasticism, or an isolation from the masses. We must strive every day so that this love of living humanity is transformed into actual deeds, into acts that serve as examples, as a moving force.
life.author: Che Guevara

life.quote: Throwing away food is like stealing from the table of those who are poor and hungry.
life.author: Pope Francis

life.quote: Driving fast on the track does not scare me. What scares me is when I drive on the highway I get passed by some idiot who thinks he is Fangio.
life.author: Juan Manuel Fangio

life.quote: As long as the problems of the poor are not radically resolved by rejecting the absolute autonomy of markets and financial speculation and by attacking the structural causes of inequality, no solution will be found for the world's problems or, for that matter, to any problems.
life.author: Pope Francis

life.quote: Wretched are those who are vindictive and spiteful.
life.author: Pope Francis

life.quote: Messi scores a goal and celebrates. Cristiano scores a goal and poses like he's in a shampoo commercial.
life.author: Diego Maradona

life.quote: Nothing is built on stone; all is built on sand, but we must build as if the sand were stone.
life.author: Jorge Luis Borges

life.quote: I was very sad for many days when I discovered that in the world there were poor people and rich people; and the strange thing is that the existence of the poor did not cause me as much pain as the knowledge that at the same time there were people who were rich.
life.author: Evita Peron

life.quote: The negro is indolent and a dreamer; spending his meager wage on frivolity or drink; the European has a tradition of work and saving, which has pursued him as far as this corner of America and drives him to advance himself, even independently of his own individual aspirations.
life.author: Che Guevara

life.quote: I can give you my loneliness, my darkness, the hunger of my heart, I am trying to bribe you with uncertainty, with danger, with defeat.
life.author: Jorge Luis Borges

life.quote: Try to understand what I am saying: everything is dependent on everything else, everything is connected, nothing is separate. Therefore everything is going in the only way it can go. If people were different everything would be different. They are what they are, so everything is as it is.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: A considerable percentage of the people we meet on the street are people who are empty inside, that is, they are actually already dead. It is fortunate for us that we do not see and do not know it. If we knew what a number of people are actually dead and what a number of these dead people govern our lives, we should go mad with horror.
life.author: George Gurdjieff

life.quote: Self-observation brings man to the realization of the necessity of self-change. And in observing himself a man notices that self-observation itself brings about certain changes in his inner processes. He begins to understand that self-observation is an instrument of self-change, a means of awakening.
life.author: George Gurdjieff

life.quote: Self-observation brings man to the realization of the necessity of self-change. And in observing himself a man notices that self-observation itself brings about certain changes in his inner processes. He begins to understand that self-observation is an instrument of self-change, a means of awakening.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: The evolution of man is the evolution of his consciousness, and 'consciousness' cannot evolve unconsciously. The evolution of man is the evolution of his will, and 'will' cannot evolve involuntarily.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: If you meditate and the Devil comes, make the Devil meditate.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: I will tell you one thing that will make you rich for life. There are two struggles: an Inner-world struggle and an Outer-world struggle...you must make an intentional contact between these two worlds; then you can crystallize data for the Third World, the World of the Soul.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: It is only by grounding our awareness in the living sensation of our bodies that the 'I Am,' our real presence, can awaken.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: Two things in life are infinite; the stupidity of man and the mercy of God.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: Without self knowledge, without understanding the working and functions of his machine, man cannot be free, he cannot govern himself and he will always remain a slave.
life.author: George Gurdjieff

life.quote: In order to understand the interrelation of truth and falsehood in life, a man must understand falsehood in himself, the constant incessant lies he tells himself.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: If you help others, you will be helped, perhaps tomorrow, perhaps in one hundred years, but you will be helped. Nature must pay off the debt. It is a mathematical law and all life is mathematics.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: It is more satisfying to be a bad player at golf. The worse you play, the better you remember the occasional good shot.
life.author: Nubar Gulbenkian

life.quote: Real love is a cosmic force which goes through us. If we crystallize it, it becomes the greatest power in the world.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: There is a cosmic law which says that every satisfaction must be paid for with a dissatisfaction.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: Every ceremony or rite has a value if it is performed without alteration. A ceremony is a book in which a great deal is written. Anyone who understands can read it. One rite often contains more than a hundred books.
life.author: George Gurdjieff

life.quote: Knowledge can be acquired by a suitable and complete study, no matter what the starting point is. Only one must know how to "learn." What is nearest to us is man; and you are the nearest of all men to yourself. Begin with the study of yourself; remember the saying "Know thyself."
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: I ask you to believe nothing that you cannot verify for yourself.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: By teaching others you will learn yourself.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: It is very difficult also to sacrifice one's suffering. A man will renounce any pleasures you like but he will not give up his suffering.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: That which is easy is bad for your inner life.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: The greatest untold story is the evolution of God.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: From my point of view, he can be called a remarkable man who stands out from those around him by the resourcefulness of his mind, and who knows how to be restrained in the manifestations which proceed from his nature, at the same time conducting himself justly and tolerantly towards the weaknesses of others.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: Wish' is the most powerful thing in the world. Higher than God.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: The first fundamental law of the universe is the law of three forces, of three principles, or , as it is often called, the law of three. According to this law every action, every phenomenon in all worlds without exception, is the result of a simultaneous action of three forces- the positive, the negative, and the neutralizing.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: Love without knowledge is demonic.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: If a sufficient number of people who wanted to stop war really did gather together, they would first of all begin by making war upon those who disagreed with them. And it is still more certain that they would make war on people who also want to stop wars but in another way.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: Those who have not sown anything during their responsible life will have nothing to reap in the future.
life.author: G. I. Gurdjieff

life.quote: It is unfair to label me anti-Islam. I am an atheist and a secular humanist.

life.quote: I am an atheist. I do not believe in prayers, I believe in work. And my work is that of an author. My pen is my weapon.

life.quote: Those religions that are oppressive to women are also against democracy, human rights, and freedom of expression.

life.author: Rene Magritte

life.quote: Never regret anything that makes you smile.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: I love people who make me laugh. I honestly think it's the thing I like most, to laugh. It cures a multitude of ills. It's probably the most important thing in a person.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: Let's face it, a nice creamy chocolate cake does a lot for a lot of people; it does for me.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: To plant a garden is to believe in tomorrow.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: We must not fear daylight just because it almost always illuminates a miserable world.
life.author: Rene Magritte

life.quote: My painting is visible images which conceal nothing... they evoke mystery and indeed when one sees one of my pictures, one asks oneself this simple question 'What does that mean'? It does not mean anything, because mystery means nothing either, it is unknowable.
life.author: Rene Magritte

life.quote: I'm an introvert... I love being by myself, love being outdoors, love taking a long walk with my dogs and looking at the trees, flowers, the sky.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: You can always tell what kind of a person a man really thinks you are by the earrings he gives you.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: I love people who make me laugh. I honestly think it's the thing I like most, to laugh. It cures a multitude of ills. It's probably the most important thing in a person.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: To be a surrealist means barring from your mind all remembrance of what you have seen, and being always on the lookout for what has never been.
life.author: Rene Magritte

life.quote: The famous pipe. How people reproached me for it! And yet, could you stuff my pipe? No, it's just a representation, is it not? So if I had written on my picture "This is a pipe", I'd have been lying!
life.author: Rene Magritte

life.quote: To have beautiful lips, say beautiful things. To have beautiful eyes, look at people and see the good in them.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: People who look for symbolic meaning fail to grasp the inherent poetry and mystery of the images.
life.author: Rene Magritte

life.quote: My greatest victory has been to be able to live with myself, to accept my shortcomings. I'm a long way from the human being I'd liked to be, but I've decided I'm not so bad after all.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: If I'm honest I have to tell you I still read fairy tales and I like them best of all.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: I believe in manicures.I believe in overdressing.I believe in primping at leisure and wearing lipsitck.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: There are more important things than outward appearance. No amount of makeup can cover an ugly personality.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: True beauty in a woman is reflected in her soul.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: Art evokes the mystery without which the world would not exist.
life.author: Rene Magritte

life.quote: I'm half-Irish, half-Dutch, and I was born in Belgium. If I was a dog, I'd be in a hell of a mess!
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: My look is attainable. Women can look like Audrey Hepburn by flipping out their hair, buying the large sunglasses, and the little sleeveless dresses.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: For attractive lips, speak words of kindness. For lovely eyes, seek out the good in people.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: Laughing is the best calorie burner.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: Pick the day. Enjoy it– to the hilt.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: For attractive lips, speak words of kindness.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: I'm just a simple man standing alone with my old brushes, asking God for inspiration.
life.author: Peter Paul Rubens

life.quote: The purpose of art is mystery.
life.author: Rene Magritte

life.quote: Elegance is the only beauty that never fades.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: I heard a definition once: Happiness is health and a short memory! I wish I'd invented it, because it is very true.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: God gave me a great body and it's my duty to take care of my physical temple.
life.author: Jean Claude Van Damme

life.quote: ...walk with the knowledge that you are never alone.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: The ambivalence of writing is such that it can be considered both an act and an interpretive process that follows after an act with which it cannot coincide. As such, it both affirms and denies its own nature.
life.author: Paul De Man

life.quote: I detest my past, and anyone else's. I detest resignation, patience, professional heroism and obligatory beautiful feelings. I also detest the decorative arts, folklore, advertising, voices making announcements, aerodynamism, boy scouts, the smell of moth balls, events of the moment, and drunken people.
life.author: Rene Magritte

life.quote: Everything that is visible hides something that is invisible.
life.author: Rene Magritte

life.quote: Nothing is impossible, the world itself says "I'm Possible"!
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: Placebo is music for outsiders, by outsiders and our gigs are like conventions of outcasts, which is cool.
life.author: Brian Molko

life.quote: When I wear a silk scarf I never feel so definitely like a woman, a beautiful woman
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: There are certain shades of limelight that can wreck a girl's complexion.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: The present reeks of mediocrity and the atom bomb.
life.author: Rene Magritte

life.quote: Success is like reaching an important birthday and finding you're exactly the same.
life.author: Audrey Hepburn

life.quote: We can not have equilibrium in this world with the current inequality and destruction of Mother Earth. Capitalism is what is causing this problem and it needs to end.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: Natural disasters in Bolivia have been getting worse with the passage of time. It's brought about by a system: the capitalist system, the unbridled industrialization of the resources of the Planet Earth.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: The cost of pension reforms has been perhaps the biggest error committed in the process of modernizing Bolivia's economy.
life.author: Carlos Mesa

life.quote: Capitalism and the thirst for profit without limits of the capitalist system are destroying the planet...Climate change has placed all humankind before a great choice: to continue in the ways of capitalism and death, or to start down the path of harmony with nature and respect for life.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: For me, being leftist means fighting against injustice and inequality but, most of all, we want to live well.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: In Iraq, [American administration] said Saddam Hussein had weapons of mass destruction endangering mankind. With this pretext, the U.S. intervened militarily, and all they did is take control over oil fields, and oil wells.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: Baldness that appears to be normal is a disease in Europe, almost all of them are bald, and that is because of the things they eat; while among the indigenous peoples there are no bald people, because we eat other things.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: The fight against drug trafficking is a false pretext for the United States to install military bases.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: I have a lot of trouble understanding all the detail of finance and administration - but if you combine intellectual and professional capacity with a social conscience, you can change things: countries, structures, economic models, colonial states.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: Israel does not respect the principles or purposes of the United Nations charter nor the Universal Declaration of Human Rights.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: What unites Bolivia with Venezuela is the concept of the integration of South America. This is the old dream of a great fatherland, a dream that existed even before the Spanish conquest, and Simon Bolivar fought for it later on.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: There are countries that send us garbage. There are countries that send us their outdated technology as their cooperation. With Fidel [Castro] it is totally different. Fidel is the first and the best one to stand for peace in the world denouncing the interventionist policies of the U.S.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: Bolivia historically made and still makes a living from natural resources. Before it was tin, but also silver, gold, and other minerals were plundered by many foreign countries. Europe after the United States.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: I am not accustomed to protocol.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: Bolivia also depends not only on tin and other minerals, but also depends on the gas and oil. A rational extraction should be made, taking care of the environment. We should give added value to this natural resource, and generate revenue to fight poverty with more resources, that come from natural resources.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: I have a lot of hope for the Constituent Assembly.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: Chile needs Bolivian natural resources and Bolivia needs access to the sea. Under those circumstances, it must be possible to find a solution in the interest of both countries.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: When the United States was in control of counternarcotics, the US governments used drug trafficking for purely geopolitical purposes .... The US uses drug trafficking and terrorism for political control .... We have nationalised the fight against drug trafficking.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: Lithium is like a beautiful lady, very much sought and pursued, especially in Bolivia. There is data indicating Bolivia has the largest reserves of lithium in the world.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: The chicken that we eat is chock-full of feminine hormones. So, when men eat these chickens, they deviate from themselves as men.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: I don't debate with liars.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: We are going forward with the idea of a multicultural , a multinational state, trying to live in unity, at the same time respecting our diversity...But we need to all come together so we can live united.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: We want to govern with our indigenous ancestors' models: That means a different concept of participation, community work and honesty.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: We Indians are Latin America's moral reserve. We act according to a universal law that consists of three basic principles: do not steal, do not lie and do not be idle.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: The capitalist system only allows us to heap up waste. I would like to propose that the trillions of money earmarked for war should be channeled to make good the damage to the environment, to make reparations to the earth.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: The United States is using its war on drugs as an excuse to expand its control over Latin America.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: In Bolivia there are Catholic, Evangelical, Methodist, Baptist churches, and so on. In Bolivia there are indigenous religious beliefs like the rite of Pachamama Mother Earth, which shows us that Mother Earth is our life, we are born out of the Earth we live on the Earth and return to the Earth.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: Unfortunately, in this Obama Government, we have charges of drug trafficking and terrorism. For Evo, it's drug trafficking. For Hugo, it's terrorism. Evo Morales, drug trafficking. Hugo Chavez, terrorism.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: Direct access to sea is an essential part of foreign policy.
life.author: Carlos Mesa

life.quote: I don't mind being a permanent nightmare for the United States.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: [In Bolivia] We want to overcome our historical problems with Chile. The sea has divided us and the sea must bring us back together again.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: Playing sports has always been my greatest pleasure. I don't smoke, I hardly drink alcohol. Sports helped get me into the presidential palace. My first position in the union was that of sports secretary.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: In this new millennium it is more important to defend the rights of the Mother Earth to guarantee human rights.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: If we want to save our planet earth, we have a duty to put an end to the capitalist system.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: Capitalism has only hurt Latin America.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: Chavez's oil is unimportant for Bolivia... We are not dependent on Venezuela. We complement each other. Venezuela shares its wealth with other countries, but that doesn't make us subordinate.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: I am quite an admirer of Fidel [Castro]. For me, Fidel is the first and the best man in solidarity with the peoples of the world. Fidel shares not just what he does not need, but every little thing he has. That is called solidarity.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: It is a democratic uprising. I'd say a democratic revolution against imperialism and against capitalism. So the agreements between us, more than that, any cooperation means unconditional credit, while the US and some capitalist countries want to help us under conditions, under blackmail.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: The peoples of the Andes believe in the concept of 'living well' instead of wanting to 'live better' by consuming more, regardless of the cost to our neighbors and our environment.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: With our goddess, the Pachamama, and it is not possible to continue having a monopoly of religious faith, only Catholic. We have therefore adopted the new constitution as a secular state where all religious beliefs will be respected.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: I am Catholic but I want to say something to the Catholics. Thank you for some of the bishops who live in rural areas, and are still Catholic. These bishops of the Catholic churches still pray for the poor, and pray for their president who works for the poor, while the leaders of the Catholic Church only defend oligarchy.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: I'm much more convinced that the hierarchy comes from the monarchy, and that the hierarchy stays apart from the oligarchy. So the oligarchy is hurtful to the majority in Bolivia.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: With Bolivia, I had hope that a discriminated African-American, with another discriminated indigenous peasant leader, I hoped that together we could work for justice and equality. Not only for just two countries, Bolivia and USA, but for equality around the world.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: To talk only about national security, national defense, means to be selfish, ambitious. It is discrimination, isolation. "It is just me. What do I care about others?"
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: I don't accept armed struggle. Maybe it was the way in the '50s and '60s, but we want a democratic revolution.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: Almost everyone is bald. And thats because of what they eat.
life.author: Evo Morales

life.quote: You only have to look at the Medusa straight on to see her. And she's not deadly. She's beautiful and she's laughing.
life.author: Helene Cixous

life.quote: In truth, ideology has very little to do with 'consciousness', even supposing this term to have an unambiguous meaning. It is profoundly unconscious, even when it presents itself in a reflected form.
life.author: Louis Althusser

life.quote: Ideology represents the imaginary relationship of individuals to their real conditions of existence.
life.author: Louis Althusser

life.quote: Philosophy is, in the last instance, class struggle in the field of theory.
life.author: Louis Althusser

life.quote: To philosophize with open eyes is to philosophize in the dark. Only the blind can look straight at the sun.
life.author: Louis Althusser

life.quote: Be modest, be respectful of others, try to understand.
life.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

life.quote: What art makes us see, and therefore gives to us in the form of 'seeing', 'perceiving' and 'feeling' (which is not the form of knowing,) is the ideology from which it is born, in which it bathes, from which it detaches itself as art, and which it alludes.
life.author: Louis Althusser

life.quote: Ideology... is indispensable in any society if men are to be formed, transformed and equipped to respond to the demands of their conditions of existence.
life.author: Louis Althusser

life.quote: The ultimate condition of production is therefore the reproduction of the conditions of production
life.author: Louis Althusser

life.quote: Thinking is trying to think the unthinkable: thinking the thinkable is not worth the effort.
life.author: Helene Cixous

life.quote: The third point is that for some time the UN has been talking about helping Afghanistan in the reconstruction of the country but there has never been any real commitment by the international community to provide resources for that.
life.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

life.quote: A dialogue among civilizations can be seen as a dialogue between the individual and the universal.
life.author: Abdelaziz Bouteflika

life.quote: She alone dares and wishes to know from within, where she, the outcast, has never ceased to hear the resonance of fore language. She lets the other language speak - the language of 1,000 tongues which knows neither enclosure nor death. To life she refuses nothing. Her language does not contain, it carries; it does not hold back; it makes possible.
life.author: Helene Cixous

life.quote: Writing is the passageway, the entrance, the exit, the dwelling place of the other in me.
life.author: Helene Cixous

life.quote: In the battle that is philosophy all the techniques of war, including looting and camouflage, are permissible.
life.author: Louis Althusser

life.quote: And I was afraid. She frightens me because she can knock me down with a word. Because she does not know that writing is walking on a dizzying silence setting one word after the other on emptiness. Writing is miraculous and terrifying like the flight of a bird who has no wings but flings itself out and only gets wings by flying.
life.author: Helene Cixous

life.quote: It is characteristic of ideology to impose self-evident facts as self-evident facts.
life.author: Louis Althusser

life.quote: Decisive moment: the one when you will be really alone. And it is perhaps this that makes her hesitate: not the void, but the vastness of the solitude. It's as well if you are frightened of solitude. It's a sign that you have come to the moment of your birth.
life.author: Helene Cixous

life.quote: Wouldn't the worst be, isn't the worst, in truth, that women aren't castrated, that they have only to stop listening to the Sirens (for the Sirens were men) for history to change its meaning? You only have to look at the Medusa straight on to see her. And she's not deadly. She's beautiful and she's laughing.
life.author: Helene Cixous

life.quote: Occasionally, the whole class struggle may be summed up in the struggle for one word against another word. Certain words struggle amongst themselves as enemies. Other words are the site of an ambiguity: the stake in a decisive but undecided battle
life.author: Louis Althusser

life.quote: I am not innocent. Innocence is a science of the sublime. And I am only at the very beginning of the apprenticeship.
life.author: Helene Cixous

life.quote: Relations of production are first reproduced by the materiality of the processes of production and circulation. But it should not be forgotten that ideological relations are immediately present in these same processes.
life.author: Louis Althusser

life.quote: Only when you are lost can love find itself in you without losing its way.
life.author: Helene Cixous

life.quote: One of the goals of philosophy is wage theoretical battle. That is why we can say that every thesis is always, by its very nature, an antithesis. A thesis is only ever put forward in opposition to another thesis, or in defence of a new one.
life.author: Louis Althusser

life.quote: There is also a natural and very, very strong empathy with the underdog, with people who have suffered, people who have been pushed around by foreigners in particular, but also by their own people.
life.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

life.quote: But you are absolutely right that when the international community decides to help in a meaningful manner a country like Afghanistan, then coordination between the various actors that are involved in these processes is very, very difficult indeed.
life.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

life.quote: When I write, it's everything that we don't know we can be that is written out of me, without exclusions, without stipulation, and everything we will be calls us to the unflagging, intoxicating, unappeasable search for love. In one another we will never be lacking.
life.author: Helene Cixous

life.quote: There is no greater love than the love the wolf feels for the lamb-it-doesn’t-eat.
life.author: Helene Cixous

life.quote: If you are talking about terrorism, you need to sit down and understand what is making these people put dynamite around their waists and blow themselves up.
life.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

life.quote: Love is when you suddenly wake up as a cannibal, and not just any old cannibal, or else wake up destined for devourment.
life.author: Helene Cixous

life.quote: In the globalized world that is ours, maybe we are moving towards a global village, but that global village brings in a lot of different people, a lot of different ideas, lots of different backgrounds, lots of different aspirations.
life.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

life.quote: Yet, history has shown that if material force can defeat some ideologies it can no longer obliterate a civilization without destabilizing the whole planet.
life.author: Abdelaziz Bouteflika

life.quote: There is a firm, clear commitment to provide resources and ideas to enable us to organize the Afghans towards starting the process of rehabilitation and reconstruction.
life.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

life.quote: If the lives of men can be measured in terms of years, ideologies in decades, and nations in centuries, then the unit measuring civilizations, born of the interaction among peoples, would be the millennium.
life.author: Abdelaziz Bouteflika

life.quote: It is said that life and death are under the power of language.
life.author: Helene Cixous

life.quote: Somebody was asking me the other day - President Bush is now talking about freedom for the Arab world. I say, well, that's great. I was talking about that fifty years ago.
life.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

life.quote: In Rwanda that genocide happened because the international community and the Security Council refused to give, again, another 5000 troops which would have cost, I don't know, maybe fifty, a hundred, million dollars.
life.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

life.quote: There is a story which is not being told strongly enough of the Afghan employees of the UN inside the country who are saving hundreds of thousands of lives everyday by their bravery and nobody talks of them.
life.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

life.quote: People now realize that globalization is not only for the multi-nationals and the circulation of money.
life.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

life.quote: The events of September 11 and what has happened since have made people understand that even a small, distant and far away country like Afghanistan cannot be left to break up into anarchy and chaos without consequences for the whole world.
life.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

life.quote: I have reaffirmed my political will to work towards national unity.
life.author: Abdelaziz Bouteflika

life.quote: To leave Afghanistan as a playground for terrorists and adventurers was simply not possible anymore.
life.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

life.quote: Afghanistan is a land-locked country.
life.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

life.quote: Of course the UN brings in a lot of moral authority.
life.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

life.quote: Several million people inside and outside Afghanistan are destitute and desperately in need of help.
life.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

life.quote: A fly cannot go in unless it stops somewhere; therefore weapons, fuel, food, money will not go to Afghanistan unless the neighbors of Afghanistan are working, are cooperating, either being themselves the origin or the transit.
life.author: Lakhdar Brahimi

life.quote: The good you do today may be forgotten tomorrow. Do good anyway. Give the world the best you have and it may never be enough. Give your best anyway. For you see, in the end, it is between you and God. It was never between you and them anyway.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: If you judge people, you have no time to love them.
life.author: Mother Theresa

life.quote: I used to believe that prayer changes things, but now I know that prayer changes us, and we change things.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: If you judge people, you have no time to love them.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Never worry about numbers. Help one person at a time and always start with the person nearest you.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: If you want to change the world, go home and love your family.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: If you want to change the world, go home and love your family.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Your true character Is most accurately measured by how you treat those who can do 'Nothing' for you
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: On the British Royal Divorce (Charles and Dianna). She is such a sad soul. It is good that it is over. Nobody was happy anyhow. I know I should preach family love and unity, but in their case. . . .
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Speak tenderly; let there be kindness in your face, in your eyes, in your smile, in the warmth of your greeting. Always have a cheerful smile. Don't only give your care, but give your heart as well.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: I can do things you cannot, you can do things I cannot; together we can do great things.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: I don't do great things. I do small things with great love.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: None of us, including me, ever do great things. But we can all do small things, with great love, and together we can do something wonderful.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Every time you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Be happy in the moment, that's enough. Each moment is all we need, not more.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: And so let us always meet each other with a smile, for the smile is the beginning of love, and once we begin to love each other naturally we want to do something.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: If you judge people, you have no time to love them.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: To Almighty God, it's not how much we give, but how much love we put in the giving. Love is not measured by how much we do; love is measured by how much love we put in; how much it is hurting us in loving.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: If you can't do great things, do little things with great love. If you can't do them with great love, do them with a little love. If you can't do them with a little love, do them anyway.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Honesty and transparency make you vulnerable. Be honest and transparent anyway.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies. Focus on big things.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: If you are discouraged it is a sign of pride because it shows you trust in your own power. Your self-sufficiency, your selfishness and your intellectual pride will inhibit His coming to live in your heart because God cannot fill what is already full. It is as simple as that.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: We can cure physical diseases with medicine, but the only cure for loneliness, despair, and hopelessness is love. There are many in the world who are dying for a piece of bread, but there are many more dying for a little love.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: We ourselves feel that what we are doing is just a drop in the ocean, but the ocean would be less because that missing drop.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: God doesn't require us to succeed, he only requires that you try.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: There is no key to happiness, the door is always open.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: There is a light in this world, a healing spirit more powerful than any darkness we may encounter. We sometimes lose sight of this force when there is suffering, too much pain. Then suddenly, the spirit will emerge through the lives of ordinary people who hear a call and answer in extraordinary ways.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: I used to pray that God would feed the hungry, or do this or that, but now I pray that he will guide me to do whatever I'm supposed to do, what I can do. I used to pray for answers, but now I'm praying for strength. I used to believe that prayer changes things, but now I know that prayer changes us and we change things.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.
life.author: Mother Theresa

life.quote: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the waters to create many ripples.
life.author: Mother Theresa

life.quote: The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: We ourselves feel that what we are doing is just a drop in the ocean. But the ocean would be less because of that missing drop.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: I am nothing; I am but an instrument, a tiny pencil in the hands of the Lord with which He writes what he likes. However imperfect we are, he writes beautifully.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Peace begins with a smile..
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: People who love each other fully and truly are the happiest people in the world. They may have little, they may have nothing, but they are happy people. Everything depends on how we love one another.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: What can you do to promote world peace? Go home and love your family.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: I am a little pencil in the hand of a writing God who is sending a love letter to the world.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Whatever our religion, we know that if we really want to love, we must first learn to forgive before anything else.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the water to create many ripples.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Love begins by taking care of the closest ones - the ones at home.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: There is a light in this world, a healing spirit more powerful than any darkness we may encounter.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Love begins at home, and it is not how much we do, but how much love we put in the action that we do.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: The biggest disease today is not leprosy or tuberculosis, but rather the feeling of being unwanted.
life.author: Mother Theresa

life.quote: Peace begins with a smile.
life.author: Mother Theresa

life.quote: Loneliness and the feeling of being unwanted is the most terrible poverty.
life.author: Mother Theresa

life.quote: Peace and war begin at home. If we truly want peace in the world, let us begin by loving one another in our own families. If we want to spread joy, we need for every family to have joy.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: There are so many religions and each one has its different ways of following God. I follow Christ:Jesus is my God,Jesus is my Spouse,Jesus is my Life,Jesus is my only Love,Jesus is my All in All;Jesus is my Everything.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Life is an opportunity, benefit from it.Life is beauty, admire it.Life is a dream, realize it
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.
life.author: Mother Teresa

life.quote: Believe in God, for with the grace of God the American rockets will go astray and we will be saved.
life.author: Mohammed Omar

life.quote: I tell my brethren in Palestine: be patient and continue your blessed struggle. We did not forget you. We are still healing another wound in the Muslim nation, which is the occupation of our land by the Americans. Your battle and ours are one and the same.
life.author: Mohammed Omar

life.quote: This project would not only open up venues of cooperation in the oil and gas sector between the member countries but also help bring the people of regional countries together.
life.author: Amanullah Khan

life.quote: We have destroyed 80 percent of the statues. There is only small amount left and we will destroy that soon.
life.author: Mohammed Omar

life.quote: The sheik is, thank God, still alive and this hurts Bush who promised to his people to kill Osama.
life.author: Mohammed Omar

life.quote: The Taliban and its backers bear the responsibility for the consequences of this outrageous act.
life.author: Amanullah Khan

life.quote: As for the United States' future in Afghanistan, it will be fire and hell and total defeat, God willing, as it was for their predecessors - the Soviets and, before them, the British.
life.author: Mohammed Omar

life.quote: All Taliban are moderate. There are two things: extremism ['ifraat,' or doing something to excess] and conservatism ['tafreet,' or doing something insufficiently]. So in that sense, we are all moderates - taking the middle path.
life.author: Mohammed Omar

life.quote: God says he will never be satisfied with the infidels.
life.author: Mohammed Omar

life.quote: Death comes to everyone. We must stand proud as Afghans in the defense of Islam.
life.author: Mohammed Omar

life.quote: I believe that the people, instead of pretty lies, should be told the truth, no matter how ugly it may be. What can we do, destiny hasn't been kind to us; but, with the help of God, we will prevail.
life.author: Alija Izetbegovic

life.quote: Bosnia is a complicated country: three religions, three nations and those "others". Nationalism is strong in all three nations; in two of them there are a lot of racism, chauvinism, separatism; and now we are supposed to make a state out of that.
life.author: Alija Izetbegovic

life.quote: The international community is pushing things forward in Bosnia... but it is doing it at expense of the Muslim people. I feel it as an injustice, these are the things that I cannot live with.
life.author: Alija Izetbegovic

life.quote: As far as the sovereignty of Bosnia-Hercegovina is concerned we agreed to have limited sovereignty for a limited time and that is clear from the Dayton Agreement.
life.author: Alija Izetbegovic

life.quote: In these negotiations we are not a helpless object, although great world powers are involved. We play an active role and try to influence our destiny; we have our own trump cards and we use them.
life.author: Alija Izetbegovic

life.quote: Our goal: the Islamization of Muslims. Our methods: to believe and to struggle.
life.author: Alija Izetbegovic

life.quote: In history, good intentions do not always make good consequences
life.author: Alija Izetbegovic

life.quote: When a man is ill,he has only one wish -to gain health,and when he does -then come a hundred wishes and he turns even unhappier than when he was lying sick in bed
life.author: Alija Izetbegovic

life.quote: People complain that life is short,for me it seems very long.
life.author: Alija Izetbegovic

life.quote: Life is short. Kiss slowly, laugh insanely, love truly and forgive quickly
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: Don't forget: Beautiful sunsets need cloudy Skies.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: There are moments when troubles enter our lives and we can do nothing to avoid them. But they are there for a reason. Only when we have overcome them will we understand why they were there.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: The Warrior knows about the "waterfall effect".
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: I prefer to be crazy and happy rather than normal and bitter.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: One day, you will wake up and there won't be any more time to do the thing you've always wanted. Do it now.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: The more difficult the victory, the greater the happiness in winning.
life.author: Pele

life.quote: One day you'll wake up and there won't be any more time to do the things you've always wanted
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: What is success? It is being able to go to bed each night with your soul at peace.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: Tolerance and compassion are qualities of fearless people.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: If a person has no dreams, they no longer have any reason to live. Dreaming is necessary, although in the dream reality should be glimpsed. For me this is a principle of life.
life.author: Ayrton Senna

life.quote: Football is the only sport where you put people together, it doesn't matter if you are rich, or poor, or black, or white. It is one nation. This is the beauty of football.
life.author: Pele

life.quote: A mistake repeated more than once is a decision.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: Love is just a word until someone comes along and gives it meaning.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: If you no longer go for a gap that exists, you are no longer a racing driver.
life.author: Ayrton Senna

life.quote: The world is changed by your example, not by your opinion.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: Learning is a process where knowledge is presented to us, then shaped through understanding, discussion and reflection.
life.author: Paulo Freire

life.quote: Whatever you decide to do, make sure it makes you happy
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: Hide your craziness behind a beautiful smile. That's all you need.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: Life has a way of testing a person's will, either by having nothing happen at all or by having everything happen at once.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: Educators need to know what happens in the world of the children with whom they work. They need to know the universe of their dreams, the language with which they skillfully defend themselves from the aggressiveness of their world, what they know independently of the school, and how they know it.
life.author: Paulo Freire

life.quote: I believe that we start to see our true personalities when we go through the most difficult moments. This is when we get stronger
life.author: Ayrton Senna

life.quote: No one is born fully-formed: it is through self-experience in the world that we become what we are.
life.author: Paulo Freire

life.quote: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: If you only walk on sunny days you'll never reach your destination.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: Life always waits for some crisis to occur before revealing itself at its most brilliant.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: Stress, anxiety, and depression are caused when we are living to please others.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: Whoever you are, no matter what social position you have, rich or poor, always show great strength and determination, and always do everything with much love and deep faith in God. One dayyou will reach your goal.
life.author: Ayrton Senna

life.quote: Because love is an act of courage, not of fear, love is a commitment to others. No matter where the oppressed are found, the act of love is commitment to their cause--the cause of liberation.
life.author: Paulo Freire

life.quote: There is always someone out there getting better than you by training harder than you.
life.author: Pele

life.quote: As soon as you touch this limit, something happens and you suddenly can go a little bit further. With your mind power, your determination, your instinct, and the experience as well, you can fly very high.
life.author: Ayrton Senna

life.quote: A lot of people, when a guy scores a lot of goals, think, 'He's a great player', because a goal is very important, but a great player is a player who can do everything on the field. He can do assists, encourage his colleagues, give them confidence to go forward. It is someone who, when a team does not do well, becomes one of the leaders.
life.author: Pele

life.quote: Dehumanization, although a concrete historical fact, is not a given destiny but the result of an unjust order that engenders violence in the oppressors, which in turn dehumanizes the oppressed
life.author: Paulo Freire

life.quote: If you're brave enough to say goodbye, life will reward you with a new hello.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: Knowledge emerges only through invention and re-invention, through the restless, impatient, continuing, hopeful inquiry human beings pursue in the world, with the world, and with each other.
life.author: Paulo Freire

life.quote: A team is not made up of isolated individuals. Always stay in the game. Don't be passive. Football is a team game. No one plays alone. Success depends on your whole team being a single unit.
life.author: Pele

life.quote: Education must begin with the solution of the teacher-student contradiction, by reconciling the poles of the contradiction so that both are simultaneously teachers and students.
life.author: Paulo Freire

life.quote: It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: A boat is safe in the harbor. But this is not the purpose of a boat.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: Leaders who do not act dialogically, but insist on imposing their decisions, do not organize the people--they manipulate them. They do not liberate, nor are they liberated: they oppress.
life.author: Paulo Freire

life.quote: If you are brave enough to say goodbye, life will reward you with a new hello.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: In our obsessive wish to arrive, we often forget the most important thing, which is the journey.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: Great teams are not made up of many well-rounded players. Great teams are made up of a variety of players, each having their own strengths.
life.author: Pele

life.quote: Washing one's hands of the conflict between the powerful and the powerless means to side with the powerful, not to be neutral.
life.author: Paulo Freire

life.quote: We are travelers on a cosmic journey,stardust,swirling and dancing in the eddies and whirlpools of infinity. Life is eternal. We have stopped for a moment to encounter each other, to meet, to love, to share.This is a precious moment. It is a little parenthesis in eternity.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: On your journey to your dream, be ready to face oasis and deserts. In both cases, don't stop
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: I prefer to be crazy and happy rather than normal and bitter.
life.author: Paulo Coelho

life.quote: It would be extremely naive to expect the dominant classes to develop a type of education that would enable subordinate classes to perceive social injustices critically.
life.author: Paulo Freire

life.quote: If you have God on your side, everything becomes clear.
life.author: Ayrton Senna

life.quote: You commit yourself to such a level where there is no compromise. You give everything you have, everything, absolutely everything.
life.author: Ayrton Senna

life.quote: With regard to performance, commitment, effort, dedication, there is no middle ground. Or you do something very well or not at all.
life.author: Ayrton Senna

life.quote: I want to live fully, very intensely. I would never want to live partially, suffering from illness or injury. If I ever happen to have an accident that eventually costs my life, I hope it happens in one instant.
life.author: Ayrton Senna

life.quote: When a man opens a car door for his wife, it's either a new car or a new wife.
life.author: Prince Philip

life.quote: You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life.
life.author: Winston Churchill

life.quote: The POSITIVE THINKER sees the INVISIBLE, feels the INTANGIBLE, and achieves the IMPOSSIBLE.
life.author: Winston Churchill

life.quote: She dares me to pour myself out like a living waterfall. She dares me to enter the soul that is more than my own; she extinguishes fear in mere seconds. She lets light come through.
life.author: Virginia Woolf

life.quote: You can't go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending.
life.author: C. S. Lewis

life.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
life.author: Winston Churchill

life.quote: A pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees opportunity in every difficulty.
life.author: Winston Churchill

life.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
life.author: Winston Churchill

life.quote: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
life.author: Winston Churchill

life.quote: Diplomacy is the art of telling people to go to hell in such a way that they ask for directions.
life.author: Winston Churchill

life.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
life.author: George Eliot

life.quote: Life with God is not immunity from difficulties, but peace in difficulties.
life.author: C. S. Lewis

life.quote: Socialism is a philosophy of failure, the creed of ignorance, and the gospel of envy, its inherent virtue is the equal sharing of misery.
life.author: Winston Churchill

life.quote: We are what we believe we are.
life.author: C. S. Lewis

life.quote: You'll never find peace of mind until you listen to your heart.
life.author: George Michael

life.quote: You will never reach your destination if you stop and throw stones at every dog that barks.
life.author: Winston Churchill

life.quote: Criticism may not be agreeable, but it is necessary. It fulfils the same function as pain in the human body. It calls attention to an unhealthy state of things.
life.author: Winston Churchill

life.quote: Everyone is in favor of free speech. Hardly a day passes without its being extolled, but some people's idea of it is that they are free to say what they like, but if anyone else says anything back, that is an outrage.
life.author: Winston Churchill

life.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
life.author: Winston Churchill

life.quote: Smell the sea and feel the sky.
life.author: Van Morrison

life.quote: What we see depends mainly on what we look for.
life.author: John Lubbock

life.quote: Chandeliers are marvels of drop-dead showiness, the jewellery of architecture.
life.author: Peter York

life.quote: The best argument against democracy is a five-minute conversation with the average voter.
life.author: Winston Churchill

life.quote: The time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time.
life.author: Bertrand Russell

life.quote: The most effective way to destroy people is to deny and obliterate their own understanding of their history.
life.author: George Orwell

life.quote: Believe in God like you believe in the sunrise. Not because you can see it, but because you can see all it touches.
life.author: C. S. Lewis

life.quote: You will never do anything in this world without courage. It is the greatest quality of the mind next to honor.
life.author: James Allen

life.quote: Tact is the ability to tell someone to go to hell in such a way that they look forwad for the trip.
life.author: Winston Churchill

life.quote: Don't shine so that others can see you. Shine so that through you, others can see HIM.
life.author: C. S. Lewis

life.quote: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
life.author: Richard Branson

life.quote: It seems to me that the natural world is the greatest source of excitement; the greatest source of visual beauty; the greatest source of intellectual interest. It is the greatest source of so much in life that makes life worth living.
life.author: David Attenborough

life.quote: You cannot warm the hearts of people with God's love if they have an empty stomach and cold feet.
life.author: William Booth

life.quote: Be good to yourself 'cause nobody else has the power to make you happy.
life.author: George Michael

life.quote: I'm just the mere shadow of my former selfishness. I crave the silhouette of your kiss.
life.author: Elvis Costello

life.quote: Isn't it funny how day by day nothing changes, but when you look back everything is different.
life.author: C. S. Lewis

life.quote: Grief is the price we pay for love.
life.author: Elizabeth II

life.quote: The truth is: the natural world is changing. And we are totally dependent on that world. It provides our food, water and air. It is the most precious thing we have and we need to defend it.
life.author: David Attenborough

life.quote: Most Christians would like to send their recruits to Bible college for five years. I would like to send them to hell for five minutes. That would do more than anything else to prepare them for a lifetime of compassionate ministry.
life.author: William Booth

life.quote: It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
life.author: J. K. Rowling

life.quote: If you're not a liberal at twenty you have no heart, if you're not a conservative at forty, you have no brain.
life.author: Winston Churchill

life.quote: In a time of universal deceit - telling the truth is a revolutionary act.
life.author: George Orwell

life.quote: The further a society drifts from the truth, the more it will hate those that speak it.
life.author: George Orwell

life.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
life.author: C. S. Lewis

life.quote: Instead of controlling the environment for the benefit of the population, perhaps we should control the population to ensure the survival of our environment
life.author: David Attenborough

life.quote: The first step in a fascist movement is the combination under an energetic leader of a number of men who possess more than the average share of leisure, brutality, and stupidity. The next step is to fascinate fools and muzzle the intelligent, by emotional excitement on the one hand and terrorism on the other.
life.author: Bertrand Russell

life.quote: A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on.
life.author: Winston Churchill

life.quote: Africa is still lying ready for us it is our duty to take it. It is our duty to seize every opportunity of acquiring more territory and we should keep this one idea steadily before our eyes that more territory simply means more of the Anglo-Saxon race more of the best the most human, most honorable race the world possesses.
life.author: Cecil Rhodes

life.quote: Who wants to become a writer? And why? Because it's the answer to everything. ... It's the streaming reason for living. To note, to pin down, to build up, to create, to be astonished at nothing, to cherish the oddities, to let nothing go down the drain, to make something, to make a great flower out of life, even if it's a cactus.
life.author: Enid Bagnold

life.quote: Animals are such agreeable friends - they ask no questions, they pass no criticisms.
life.author: George Eliot

life.quote: The Christian does not think God will love us because we are good, but that God will make us good because He loves us.
life.author: C. S. Lewis

life.quote: The people will believe what the media tells them they believe.
life.author: George Orwell

life.quote: There are some common problems in the Balkans in the settlement of which Bulgaria should also participate.
life.author: Todor Zhivkov

life.quote: The best thing at the tournament were the cheerleaders.
life.author: Ivan Slavkov

life.quote: The work of art is a scream of freedom.
life.author: Christo

life.quote: This year - a factory of semiconductors. Next year - a factory of whole conductors!
life.author: Todor Zhivkov

life.quote: We must make a radical turn, at 360 degrees.
life.author: Todor Zhivkov

life.quote: Of course, in no case would we allow the creation of a regional union in the Balkans, directed against the Soviet Union and Bulgaria.
life.author: Todor Zhivkov

life.quote: A good journalist is not the one that writes what people say, but the one that writes what he is supposed to write.
life.author: Todor Zhivkov

life.quote: Тоз, който падне в бой за свобода, той не умира. Who fells in fight for freedom, doesn't dies.
life.author: Hristo Botev

life.quote: No power can rule this head, who is ready to be separated from its body in the name of freedom and the good of all humanity. / Няма власт над оная глава, която е готова да се отдели от плещите си в името на свободата и за благото на цялото човечество.
life.author: Hristo Botev

life.quote: The police belongs to the people and the people belong to the police.
life.author: Todor Zhivkov

life.quote: Good times are always where I am. I feel bored if I'm not there.
life.author: Ivan Slavkov

life.quote: When politicians completely rob their citizens, they train them for invasion in other countries.
life.author: Radoy Ralin

life.quote: First, learn how to report traffic jams, then you can talk about football.(on Bulgarian journalists)
life.author: Ivan Slavkov

life.quote: I am happy! I'm leaving on a trip and my wife is staying in Bulgaria.
life.author: Ivan Slavkov

life.quote: What do we need spectators for? The game should be played behind closed doors. Football is an art!
life.author: Ivan Slavkov

life.quote: I like marriage. I've been married three times.
life.author: Ivan Slavkov

life.quote: I am satisfied with everything in my life. Including the fact that I spent time in jail.
life.author: Ivan Slavkov

life.quote: The only thing that's running well in Bulgaria is the Bulgarian Football Union. Unlike the BFU, many footballers here don't run, they limp.
life.author: Ivan Slavkov

life.quote: I'm sick of these congress meetings. There no reason to meet again. As you know, if there's a congress, I usually win it.
life.author: Ivan Slavkov

life.quote: Since the national team doesn't have a stadium yet, they'll come to play here, at Sofia airport.
life.author: Ivan Slavkov

life.quote: I feel good... considering I managed to wake up.
life.author: Ivan Slavkov

life.quote: Let me reassure that the Kingdom of Cambodia a country with independence, neutrality, peace, freedom, democracy and human rights as you all have seen, shall be existing with no end.
life.author: Hun Sen

life.quote: I not only weaken the opposition, I’m going to make them dead ... and if anyone is strong enough to try to hold a demonstration, I will beat all those dogs and put them in a cage.
life.author: Hun Sen

life.quote: The lessons of the past should steer us towards ensuring lasting legacies for generations yet to be born.
life.author: Hun Sen

life.quote: We have lost the art of sharing and caring.
life.author: Hun Sen

life.quote: Pol Pot will surrender, be captured or commit suicide.
life.author: Hun Sen

life.quote: In all my life and in the future, I will always be a faithful and loyal servant to all of my compatriots.
life.author: Norodom Sihamoni

life.quote: Yet, our achievements also mask many continuing failings and seem to expose more future dangers.
life.author: Hun Sen

life.quote: Peace, so elusive in the past many decades, now finally prevails all over the country.
life.author: Hun Sen

life.quote: Cambodia possesses now the rights to look far into the future and everything for making a future construction is waiting for the Cambodian own efforts.
life.author: Hun Sen

life.quote: I will always stay close to all compatriots, and share together the happiness and suffering.
life.author: Norodom Sihamoni

life.quote: We now need to look beyond our immediate future and aim higher and farther.
life.author: Paul Biya

life.quote: I was born to make mistakes, not to fake perfection
life.author: Drake

life.quote: Tables turn, bridges burn, you live and learn.
life.author: Drake

life.quote: Sometimes it all gets a little too much, but you gotta realize that soon the fog will clear up.
life.author: Shawn Mendes

life.quote: Live without pretending, love without depending, listen without defending, speak without offending.
life.author: Drake

life.quote: If he only wants you for your breasts, legs, and thighs, send him to KFC.
life.author: Drake

life.quote: We're captive on the carousel of time, we can't return we can only look behind.
life.author: Joni Mitchell

life.quote: If you have been brutally broken but still have the courage to be gentle to other living beings, than you're a badass with a heart of an angel.
life.author: Keanu Reeves

life.quote: Crazy how you gotta wait until it's dark out to see who really with you.
life.author: Drake

life.quote: Extraordinary people survive under the most terrible circumstances and they become more extraordinary because of it.
life.author: Robertson Davies

life.quote: We are all in this world together, and the only test of our character that matters is how we look after the least fortunate among us. How we look after each other, not how we look after ourselves. That's all that really matters, I think.
life.author: Tommy Douglas

life.quote: It took cancer to realize that being self-centered is not the way to live. The answer is to try and help others.
life.author: Terry Fox

life.quote: Life is like a confused teacher...first she gives the test and then teaches the lesson
life.author: Drake

life.quote: There is a crack in everything, that's how the light gets in.
life.author: Leonard Cohen

life.quote: There is a crack, a crack in everything. That's how the light gets in.
life.author: Leonard Cohen

life.quote: Smile and let everyone know that today, you're a lot stronger than you were yesterday.
life.author: Drake

life.quote: I came to believe that health services ought not to have a price tag on them, and that people should be able to get whatever health services they required irrespective of their individual capacity to pay.
life.author: Tommy Douglas

life.quote: Don't lie to the girl of your life for the hoe of the night
life.author: Drake

life.quote: And the seasons they go 'round and 'round And the painted ponies go up and down We're captive on the carousel of time We can't return we can only look behind From where we came And go round and round and round In the circle game.
life.author: Joni Mitchell

life.quote: There is no such thing as a model or ideal Canadian. What could be more absurd than the concept of an "all Canadian" boy or girl? A society which emphasizes uniformity is one which creates intolerance and hate.
life.author: Pierre Trudeau

life.quote: Never forgetting from where I came and no matter where I'm headed I promise to stay the same
life.author: Drake

life.quote: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
life.author: Michael J. Fox

life.quote: When you look ahead and darkness is all you see, faith and determination will pull you through.
life.author: Drake

life.quote: If a man has an apartment stacked to the ceiling with newspapers, we call him crazy. If a woman has a trailer house full of cats, we call her nuts. But when people pathologically hoard so much cash that they impoverish the entire nation, we put them on the cover of Fortune magazine and pretend that they are role models.
life.author: Lester B. Pearson

life.quote: The night before my amputation, my former basketball coach brought me a magazine with an article on an amputee who ran in the New York Marathon. It was then I decided to meet this new challenge head on and not only overcome my disability, but conquer it in such a way that I could never look back and say it disabled me.
life.author: Terry Fox

life.quote: Don't go through life, grow through life.
life.author: Eric Butterworth

life.quote: I'm not a dreamer... but I believe in miracles. I have to
life.author: Terry Fox

life.quote: Smile more than you cry, Give more than you take, and Love more than you Hate.
life.author: Drake

life.quote: Don't make permanent decisions based on temporary feelings.
life.author: Bobby Umar

life.quote: There were moments when I really just thought, I don't need anything and I don't need anyone. I just want to go away and disappear.
life.author: Shania Twain

life.quote: The good physician treats the disease; the great physician treats the patient who has the disease.
life.author: William Osler

life.quote: We walk the same path, but got on different shoes, live in the same building, but we got different views
life.author: Drake

life.quote: Happiness is like a cloud, if you stare at it long enough, it evaporates.
life.author: Sarah McLachlan

life.quote: My friends, love is better than anger. Hope is better than fear. Optimism is better than despair. So let us be loving, hopeful and optimistic. And we'll change the world.
life.author: Jack Layton

life.quote: Be calm and strong and patient. Meet failure and disappointment with courage. Rise superior to the trials of life, and never give in to hopelessness or despair. In danger, in adversity, cling to your principles and ideals. Aequanimitas!
life.author: William Osler

life.quote: An error does not become a mistake, until you refuse to correct it.
life.author: Orlando A. Battista

life.quote: Bad decisions, good intentions.
life.author: Drake

life.quote: Listen to your patient, he is telling you the diagnosis.
life.author: William Osler

life.quote: I got my eyes on youYou're everything that I see, I want your hot love and emotionEndlessly.
life.author: Drake

life.quote: Family over friends, because real friends are family
life.author: Drake

life.quote: The person who takes medicine must recover twice, once from the disease and once from the medicine.
life.author: William Osler

life.quote: Now I'm livin' out here on the beach, but those seagulls are still out of reach.
life.author: Neil Young

life.quote: Happy people don't worry about what other people think of them.
life.author: Gail Vaz-Oxlade

life.quote: We want women leaders today as never before. Leaders who are not afraid to be called names and who are willing to go out and fight. I think women can save civilization. Women are persons.
life.author: Emily Murphy

life.quote: Love doesn't mean doing extraordinary or heroic things. It means knowing how to do ordinary things with tenderness.
life.author: Jean Vanier

life.quote: Each person is sacred, no matter what his or her culture, religion, handicap, or fragility. Each person is created in God’s image; each one has a heart, a capacity to love and to be loved.
life.author: Jean Vanier

life.quote: Depression is when you have lots of love, but no one's taking.
life.author: Doug Coupland

life.quote: Hoes want attention, women want respect.
life.author: Drake

life.quote: I don't consider myself a pessimist. I think of a pessimist as someone who is waiting for it to rain. And I feel soaked to the skin.
life.author: Leonard Cohen

life.quote: Freedom is the right to be wrong, not the right to do wrong.
life.author: John G. Diefenbaker

life.quote: Many a man in love with a dimple makes the mistake of marrying the whole girl.
life.author: Stephen Leacock

life.quote: The smell of moist earth and lilacs hung in the air like wisps of the past and hints of the future.
life.author: Margaret Millar

life.quote: My dream is for people around the world to look up and to see Canada like a little jewel sitting at the top of the continent.
life.author: Tommy Douglas

life.quote: How can there be peace without people understanding each other; and how can this be if they don't know each other?
life.author: Lester B. Pearson

life.quote: The hardest conviction to get into the mind of a beginner is that the education upon which he is engaged is not a college course, not a medical course, but a life course, for which the work of a few years under teachers is but a preparation.
life.author: William Osler

life.quote: Independence is not a whim or an ambition. It is the necessary condition of our survival as an ethnic group.
life.author: Aslan Maskhadov

life.quote: The war is ending, for the first time in the history of relations between Moscow and Grozny, and the era of peace is starting.
life.author: Aslan Maskhadov

life.quote: Western States keep playing with, and around, Russia.
life.author: Aslan Maskhadov

life.quote: I assure you, it would be much more pleasant for me to be an ordinary voter in peaceful Chechnya than the president of a republic at war.
life.author: Aslan Maskhadov

life.quote: It is not advantageous for Russia in its present state to fight against Chechnya. The army is a mess. It must be made combat ready. That will take time. Russia has a lot of economic, social and political problems much more important than Chechnya.
life.author: Aslan Maskhadov

life.quote: A foreign ideology cannot be introduced into Chechnya - were it through an Arab or al-Qaeda. Our experience is rich and long enough for us to be Muslims and know what jihad is.
life.author: Aslan Maskhadov

life.quote: It would be easier to fight the Russian army, and it would give me great satisfaction, but I have a responsibility to my people
life.author: Aslan Maskhadov
