life.quote: Cows run away from the storm while the buffalo charges toward it - and gets through it quicker. Whenever I’m confronted with a tough challenge, I do not prolong the torment, I become the buffalo.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: An Indian is an Indian regardless of the degree of Indian blood or which little government card they do or do not possess.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: The secret of our success is that we never, never give up.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: If you argue with a fool, someone passing by will not be able to tell who is the fool and who is not.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: Remember that I am just a woman who is living a very abundant life. Every step I take forward is on a path paved by strong Indian women before me.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: A lot of young girls have looked to their career paths and have said they'd like to be chief. There's been a change in the limits people see.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: I've run into more discrimination as a woman than as an Indian.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: I think the most important issue we have as a people is what we started, and that is to begin to trust our own thinking again and belive in ourselves enough to think that we can articulate our own vision of the future and then work to make sure that that vision becomes a reality.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: It should be remembered that hundreds of people of African ancestry also walked the Trail of Tears with the Cherokee during the forced removal of 1838-1839. Although we know about the terrible human suffering of our native people and the members of other tribes during the removal, we rarely hear of those black people who also suffered.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: Friends describe me as someone who likes to sing and dance along the edge of the roof. I try to encourage young women to be willing to take risks, to stand up for the things they believe in, and to step up and accept the challenge of serving in leadership roles.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: My ability to survive personal crises is really a mark of the character of my people. Individually and collectively, we must react with a tenacity that allows us again and again to bounce back from adversity.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: Everybody is sitting around saying, 'Well, jeez, we need somebody to solve this problem of bias.' That somebody is us. We all have to try to figure out a better way to get along.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: Every single person has leadership ability. Some step up and take them. Some don't. My answer was to step up and lead.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: We must trust our own thinking. Trust where we're going. And get the job done.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: Women in leadership roles can help restore balance and wholeness to our communities.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: I want to be remembered as the person who helped us restore faith in ourselves.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: Individually and collectively, Cherokee people possess an extraordinary ability to face down adversity and continue moving forward.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: Prior to my election, young Cherokee girls would never have thought that they might grow up and become chief.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: Growth is a painful process.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: America would be a better place if leaders would do more long-term thinking.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: Negative thoughts were treated by Cherokee healers with the same medicines as wounds, headaches, or physical illness. It was believed that unchecked negative thoughts can permeate the being and manifest themselves in negative actions.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: We celebrate Thanksgiving along with the rest of America, maybe in different ways and for different reasons. Despite everything that's happened to us since we fed the Pilgrims, we still have our language, our culture, our distinct social system. Even in a nuclear age, we still have a tribal people.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: People say that crisis changes people and turns ordinary people into wiser or more responsible ones.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: One of the things my parents taught me, and I'll always be grateful as a gift, is to not ever let anybody else define me; that for me to define myself. and I think that helped me a lot in assuming a leadership position.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: I learned a long time ago that I can't control the challenges the creator sends my way, but I can control the way I think about them and deal with them
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: A significant number of people believe tribal people still live and dress as they did 300 years ago. During my tenure as principal chief of the Cherokee Nation, national news agencies requesting interviews sometimes asked if they could film a tribal dance or if I would wear traditional tribal clothing for the interview. I doubt they asked the president of the United States to dress like a pilgrim for an interview.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: It's like everybody's sitting there and they have some kind of veil over their face, and they look at each other through this veil that makes them see each other through some stereotypical kind of viewpoint. If we're ever gonna collectively begin to grapple with the problems that we have collectively, we're gonna have to move back the veil and deal with each other on a more human level.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: The happiest people I've ever met, regardless of their profession, their social standing, or their economic status, are people that are fully engaged in the world around them. The most fulfilled people are the ones who get up every morning and stand for something larger than themselves. They are the people who care about others, who will extend a helping hand to someone in need or will speak up about an injustice when they see it.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: Western movies always seemed to show Indian women washing clothes at the creek and men with a tomahawk or spear in their hands, adorned with lots of feathers. That image has stayed in some people's minds. Many think we're either visionaries, `noble savages,' squaw drudges or tragic alcoholics. We're very rarely depicted as real people who have greater tenacity in terms of trying to hang on to our culture and values system than most people.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: Growth is a painful process.If we’re ever going to collectively begin to grapple with the problems that we have collectively, we’re going to have to move back the veil and deal with each other on a more human level.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: Whoever controls the education of our children controls the future.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: We are a revitalized tribe. After every major upheaval, we have been able to gather together as a people to rebuild a community and a government. Individually and collectively, Cherokee people possess an extraordinary ability to face down adversity and continue moving forward. We are able to do that because our culture, though certainly diminished, has sustained us since time inmemorial. This Cherokee culture is a well-kept secret.
life.author: Wilma Mankiller

life.quote: To feel the love of people whom we love is a fire that feeds our life.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: Someday, somewhere - anywhere, unfailingly, you'll find yourself, and that, and only that, can be the happiest or bitterest hour of your life.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: And one by one the nights between our separated cities are joined to the night that unites us.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: Only a burning patience will lead to the attainment of a splendid happiness.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: Let us forget with generosity those who cannot love us
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: I will bring you flowers from the mountains, bluebells, dark hazels, and rustic baskets of kisses. I want to do with you what spring does with the cherry trees.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: If nothing saves us from death, may love at least save us from life.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: Oh, may your silhouette never dissolve on the beach;may your eyelids never flutter into the emptydistance.Don't leave me for a second, my dearest.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: Your wide eyes are the only light I know from extinguished constellations.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: By night, Love, tie your heart to mine, and the two together in their sleep will defeat the darkness
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: My soul is an empty carousel at sunset.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: You can crush the flowers, but you can't stop the spring.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: And I, infinitesima­l being, drunk with the great starry void, likeness, image of mystery, I felt myself a pure part of the abyss, I wheeled with the stars, my heart broke loose on the wind.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: We all have an unsuspected reserve of strength inside that emerges when life puts us to the test.
life.author: Isabel Allende

life.quote: I do not love you as if you were salt-rose, or topaz,or the arrow of carnations the fire shoots off.I love you as certain dark things are to be loved,in secret, between the shadow and the soul.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: There is no light without shadow, just as there is no happiness without pain.
life.author: Isabel Allende

life.quote: Laughter is the language of the soul.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: I love all the things there are,and of all fireslove is the only inexhaustible one;and that's why I go from life to life.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: All paths lead to the same goal: to convey to others what we are.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: I love you between shadow and soul. I love you as the plant that hasn't bloomed yet, and carries hidden within itself the light of flowers. I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. Because of you, the dense fragrance that rises from the earth lives in my body, rioting with hunger for the eternity of our victorious kisses.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: We don't even know how strong we are until we are forced to bring that hidden strength forward.
life.author: Isabel Allende

life.quote: I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: As if you were on fire from within. The moon lives in the lining of your skin.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: I love you as certain dark things are to be loved,in secret, between the shadow and the soul.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: You know how this is: if I look at the crystal moon, at the red branch of the slow autumn at my window, if I touch near the fire the impalpable ash or the wrinkled body of the log, everything carries me to you, as if everything that exists, aromas, light, metals, were little boats that sail toward those isles of yours that wait for me.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: Aphrodite is about lust and gluttony - the only two sins worth committing, in my opinion.
life.author: Isabel Allende

life.quote: And it follows that I am, because you are: it follows from 'you are', that I am, and we: and, because of love, you will, I will, we will, come to be.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: Everything I did, all my actions, all of the problems I had I dedicate to God and to Chile, because I kept Chile from becoming Communist.
life.author: Augusto Pinochet

life.quote: You shall create beauty not to excite the senses but to give sustenance to the soul.
life.author: Gabriela Mistral

life.quote: I can promise you that women working together - linked, informed and educated - can bring peace and prosperity to this forsaken planet.
life.author: Isabel Allende

life.quote: Don't forget that in the history of the world, there was a plebiscite, in which Christ and Barabbas were being judged, and the people chose Barabbas.
life.author: Augusto Pinochet

life.quote: For women, the best aphrodisiacs are words. The G-spot is in the ears. He who looks for it below there is wasting his time.
life.author: Isabel Allende

life.quote: At night I dream that you and I are two plants that grew together, roots entwined, and that you know the earth and the rain like my mouth, since we are made of earth and rain.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: Fear is inevitable, I have to accept that, but I cannot allow it to paralyze me.
life.author: Isabel Allende

life.quote: We are dust and to dust return. In the end we're neither air, nor fire, nor water, just dirt, neither more nor less, just dirt, and maybe some yellow flowers.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: There is no death, daughter. People die only when we forget them,' my mother explained shortly before she left me. 'If you can remember me, I will be with you always.
life.author: Isabel Allende

life.quote: Sometimes democracy must be bathed in blood.
life.author: Augusto Pinochet

life.quote: Heart is what drives us and determines our fate.
life.author: Isabel Allende

life.quote: Love beauty it is the shadow of God on the universe
life.author: Gabriela Mistral

life.quote: You only have what you give. It’s by spending yourself that you become rich.
life.author: Isabel Allende

life.quote: The rich people are those who create wealth, and you have to treat them well so they continue to give wealth.
life.author: Augusto Pinochet

life.quote: so I love you because I know no other way than this: where I does not exist, nor you, so close that your hand on my chest is my hand, so close that your eyes close as I fall asleep.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: Rome cut off the heads of Christians and they continued to reappear one way or another. Something similar happens with Marxists.
life.author: Augusto Pinochet

life.quote: Don't leave me, even for an hour, because then the little drops of anguish will all run together, the smoke that roams looking for a home will drift into me, choking my lost heart.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: For real change, we need feminine energy in the management of the world. We need a critical number of women in positions of power, and we need to nurture the feminine energy in men.
life.author: Isabel Allende

life.quote: Silence before being born, silence after death: life is nothing but noise between two unfathomable silences.
life.author: Isabel Allende

life.quote: Conspirators in pajamas who exchange deep kisses for passwords.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: All stories interest me, and some haunt me until I end up writing them. Certain themes keep coming up: justice, loyalty, violence, death, political and social issues, freedom.
life.author: Isabel Allende

life.quote: There were thirst and hunger, and you were the fruit. There were grief and the ruins, and you were the miracle.
life.author: Pablo Neruda

life.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: The man who asks a question is a fool for a minute, the man who does not ask is a fool for life.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: By three methods we may learn wisdom: First, by reflection, which is noblest; Second, by imitation, which is easiest; and third by experience, which is the bitterest.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: New beginnings are often disguised as painful endings.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: I hear and I forget. I see and I remember. I do and I understand.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: The superior man is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: Remember: "The Best Fighter is Never Angry."
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: An orchid in a deep forest sends out its fragrance even if no one is around to appreciate it.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: Silence is a source of great strength.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: A great man is hard on himself; a small man is hard on others.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: Care about what other people think and you will always be their prisoner.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: Water is the softest thing, yet it can penetrate mountains and earth. This shows clearly the principle of softness overcoming hardness.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everyone will respect you.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: To know what you know and what you do not know, that is true knowledge.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: If you are depressed, you are living in the past. If you are anxious, you are living in the future. If you are at peace, you are living in the present.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: He who wishes to secure the good of others has already secured his own.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: Today is hard, tomorrow will be worse, but the day after tomorrow will be sunshine.
life.author: Jack Ma

life.quote: All political power comes from the barrel of a gun. The communist party must command all the guns, that way, no guns can ever be used to command the party.
life.author: Mao Zedong

life.quote: To love a thing means wanting it to live.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: New beginnings are often disguised as painful endings.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: The wise man does not lay up his own treasures. The more he gives to others, the more he has for his own.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: Don't curse the darkness, light a candle.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: Time is a created thing. To say 'I don't have time,' is like saying, 'I don't want to.'
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: Knowing others is intelligence, knowing yourself is true wisdom.
life.author: Lao Tzu

life.quote: Strategy without tactics is the slowest route to victory. Tactics without strategy is the noise before defeat.
life.author: Sun Tzu

life.quote: If you want happiness for a year, inherit a fortune. If you want happiness for a lifetime, help someone else.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: Attack the evil that is within yourself, rather than attacking the evil that is in others.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never failling but in rising every time we fall.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: As a historical legacy, the Kashmir conflict has been an outstanding issue for more than half a century.
life.author: Li Peng

life.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: It is better to light one small candle than to curse the darkness.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: Life will knock us down, but we can choose whether or not to stand back up.
life.author: Jackie Chan

life.quote: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: The man who asks a question is a fool for a minute. The man who does not ask, is a fool for life.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
life.author: Sun Tzu

life.quote: The gem cannot be polished without friction, nor man perfected without trials.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: Nothing makes me more determined to succeed than someone telling me something's impossible.
life.author: Jackie Chan

life.quote: A true friend is the one who holds your hand and touches your heart.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: All human beings have three lives: public, private, and secret.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: He who awaits much can expect little.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: No matter what, nobody can take away the dances you've already had.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: Tell him yes. Even if you are dying of fear, even if you are sorry later, because whatever you do, you will be sorry all the rest of your life if you say no.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: It's enough for me to be sure that you and I exist at this moment.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: No matter what, nobody can take away the dances you've already had.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: Life is not what one lived, but what One remembers and how One remembers it in order to recount it
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: The only regret I will have in dying is if it is not for love.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: The adolescents of my generation, greedy for life, forgot in body and soul about their hopes for the future until reality taught them that tomorrow was not what they had dreamed, and they discovered nostalgia.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: Wherever they might be they always remember that the past was a lie, that memory has no return, that every spring gone by could never be recovered, and that the wildest and most tenacious love was an ephemeral truth in the end.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: But that afternoon he asked himself, with his infinite capacity for illusion, if such pitiless indifference might not be a subterfuge for hiding the torments of love.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: I don't believe in God, but I'm afraid of Him.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: An early-rising man is a good spouse but a bad husband.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: The spirit of her invincible heart guided her through the shadows.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: Become a better person and be sure to know who you are, before meeting someone new and hoping that person knows who you are
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: No, not rich. I am a poor man with money, which is not the same thing.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: I'm fearless, I don't complain. Even when horrible things happen to me, I go on.
life.author: Sofia Vergara

life.quote: He allowed himself to be swayed by his conviction that human beings are not born once and for all on the day their mothers give birth to them, but that life obliges them over and over again to give birth to themselves.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: I don't think God cares if I wear nail polish or not. I don't think that's a deal breaker for him.
life.author: Sofia Vergara

life.quote: Death really did not matter to him but life did, and therefore the sensation he felt when they gave their decision was not a feeling of fear but of nostalgia.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: Her nakedness was not absolute, for like Manet's _Olympia__, behind her ear she had a poisonous flower with orange petals, and she also wore a gold bangle on her right wrist and a necklace of tiny pearls. I imagined I would never see anything more exciting for as long as I lived, and today I can confirm that I was right.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: I never thought I would get such a perfect role in 'Modern Family.' A lot of TV shows now are looking for more Latin women.
life.author: Sofia Vergara

life.quote: But he could not renounce his infinite capacity for illusion at the very moment he needed it most... he saw fireflies where there were none.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: I have waited for this opportunity for more than half a century, to repeat to you once again my vow of eternal fidelity and everlasting love.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: Caribbean reality resembles the wildest imagination.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: America may not realize it yet, but Latin prototypes are being created right now, and not just by me. They are these mambo kings and salsa queens, Aztec lords and Inca princesses, every Hernandez and Fernandez, whom this country will one day come to understand and respect.
life.author: John Leguizamo

life.quote: To all, I would say how mistaken they are when they think that they stop falling in love when they grow old, without knowing that they grow old when they stop falling in love...
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: It always amuses me that the biggest praise for my work comes for the imagination, while the truth is that there's not a single line in all my work that does not have a basis in reality. The problem is that Caribbean reality resembles the wildest imagination.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: I like drama. I love being in a drama where I get to be the funny guy. That's what I really love the most.
life.author: John Leguizamo

life.quote: Take advantage of it now, while you are young, and suffer all you can, because these things don't last your whole life.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: For those who may be hurting over lost love:Don't cry because it is over... smile because it happened.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: The heart's memory eliminates the bad and magnifies the good.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: One minute of reconciliation is worth more than a whole life of friendship!
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: I love jewelry - rings, earrings, bracelets, necklaces, you name it.
life.author: Sofia Vergara

life.quote: But when a woman decides to sleep with a man, there is no wall she will not scale, no fortress she will not destroy, no moral consideration she will not ignore at its very root: there is no God worth worrying about.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: A man knows when he is growing old because he begins to look like his father.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: If I walk outside without lipstick, I feel naked.
life.author: Sofia Vergara

life.quote: Amputees suffer pains, cramps, itches in the leg that is no longer there. That is how she felt without him, feeling his presence where he no longer was.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: The truth is I'm getting old, I said. We already are old, she said with a sigh. What happens is that you don't feel it on the inside, but from the outside everybody can see it.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: "Things have a life of their own," the gypsy proclaimed with a harsh accent. "It's simply a matter of waking up their souls."
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: Injections are the best thing ever invented for feeding doctors.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: A lie is more comfortable than doubt, more useful than love, more lasting than truth.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: I guess at the end of the day, all women like to be appreciated and treated with respect and kindness.
life.author: Sofia Vergara

life.quote: Beauty is really all about confidence. If you feel beautiful, then you are beautiful.
life.author: Sofia Vergara

life.quote: Ultimately, literature is nothing but carpentry. With both you are working with reality, a material just as hard as wood.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: There is always something left to love.
life.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

life.quote: When you like something, you should do it all night long.
life.author: Chavela Vargas

life.quote: Frida Kahlo taught me a lot without ever bragging about anything.
life.author: Chavela Vargas

life.quote: I am a friend of life, at 80 life tells me to behave like a woman and not like an old woman.
life.author: Chavela Vargas

life.quote: Sometimes your disappointments make you a stronger person for the future.
life.author: Blanka Vlasic

life.quote: Although we didn't have much when I was growing up in Split, Croatia, my parents always tried to ensure that my sister and I had the things we needed, and it was enough for us.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: The trouble with me is that every match I play against five opponents: umpire, crowd, ball boys, court, and myself.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: If I can't serve on grass, I can maybe help cut the grass, paint the lines and serve some strawberries.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: I don't care now if I ever win a match in my life again. Whatever I do in my life, wherever I go, I'm going to be always Wimbledon champion.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: I have so many runner-up cups that I am thinking of starting my own tea shop.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: People don't come to stadiums only to see results. They come to see a reaction, they want to see we are also human, that we can cry or laugh.
life.author: Blanka Vlasic

life.quote: You can't slow the game here. It's grass, it's always going to be fast.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: Ivan Lendl's never going to be a great player on grass. The only time he comes to the net is to shake your hand.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: My fines? I pay more fines than some guys' career prize money on the tour.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: When I won Wimbledon, I said to God: just let me win this one tournament and I won't play another match. Maybe God's telling me to go home, but I don't want to go home. We are negotiating at the moment.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: With me, you never know what is going to happen
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: I think I owe it to myself and my fans in Britain to play one more Wimbledon.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: Easy was, like, spending time with Jennifer on set. Difficult stuff about character is, it was a little bit like just being the only one with no superhuman powers.
life.author: Goran Visnjic

life.quote: At her birthday, my seven-year-old daughter will say that she wants these big cakes and certain expensive toys as presents, and I can't say no to her. It would just break my heart. But when I was little, for birthdays we just played outside and we were happy if we got any cake.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: Actually, I tossed it nicely, landed nicely, like airplane. No warning, beautiful. That's the art of throwing racquets.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: All I ever wanted to do was act.
life.author: Goran Visnjic

life.quote: I like so much wearing heels, legs look so much better, everything looks better. But it's only recently I've had the courage to do that.
life.author: Blanka Vlasic

life.quote: Since retiring I have spent a lot of time with my family, on my boat, and playing football.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: I must be the only player in the world who ever injured himself for a tournament by stepping on a shell on the beach. I don't know what I'm going to do.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: Thank god my wife is neither a Serb nor a Jew.
life.author: Franjo Tudjman

life.quote: Winning Wimbledon was a great feeling and it is still a great feeling. It has given me so much confidence.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: I am the only girl in the family so everyone pampered me.
life.author: Blanka Vlasic

life.quote: It's great, but there is one problem. She doesn't sleep. At night she seems to turn into a vampire. She wakes up every night five or 10 times, asking for things, singing, calling out.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: I still break racquets, but now I do it in a positive way.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: After I won a match at a tournament I tried to repeat everything I did the day I won. Before my next match, I ate the same food, I went to the same restaurant etc. Sometimes it got very boring.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: Every generation has its own Goran. So I was the Goran of this generation.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: I don't understand the word 'hunk.
life.author: Goran Visnjic

life.quote: I don't want to lose my accent, I just want it to become smaller.
life.author: Goran Visnjic

life.quote: Making my English better is a hard job, a slow job. But it's getting better. Three years ago it would have taken me a half hour to say this sentence.
life.author: Goran Visnjic

life.quote: When I started in my career, my sister was very sick so I play for her because we didn't have money.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: My tattoo is a cross, a rose and a shark. A cross is a cross, a rose like love and a shark is a pretty tough animal.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: Lately, my mind is like an orchestra. If you don't have the conductor, you don't know what to do. One guy is playing jazz, one guy is playing rock and roll, another classical. It's a big mess.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: The estimated loss of up to six million dead is founded too much on both emotional, biased testimonies and on exaggerated data in the postwar reckonings of war crimes and on the squaring of accounts with the defeated.
life.author: Franjo Tudjman

life.quote: It's fun to be there with the guys, to practice with them, arrange the balls, do this, do that, but when you play you can get some of this nervousness out of your system.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: As soon as I step on the court I just try to play tennis and don't find excuses. You know, I just lost because I lost, not because my arm was sore.
life.author: Goran Ivanisevic

life.quote: If a great part comes up and the guy's meant to have an Eastern European accent, great; but if it's a bad part I won't take it.
life.author: Goran Visnjic

life.quote: Acting is my job.
life.author: Goran Visnjic

life.quote: I'm always trying to be a good ambassador for my country.
life.author: Goran Visnjic

life.quote: I realized that health is the most important thing and that all the other things come with time if you are devoted enough.
life.author: Blanka Vlasic

life.quote: The Olympics must be my curse or something.
life.author: Blanka Vlasic

life.quote: I believe the reason for my early independence is sport, through which I learnt at an early stage to take care of myself and be disciplined.
life.author: Blanka Vlasic

life.quote: Competing helps me to polish my shape.
life.author: Blanka Vlasic

life.quote: A good career is a long-lasting career. When you're there in every competition doing a good job you're a part of an elite, and that's the most important thing.
life.author: Blanka Vlasic

life.quote: People like scandals.
life.author: Blanka Vlasic

life.quote: Since I became a favorite in every race, it's just another burden that I have to bear.
life.author: Blanka Vlasic

life.quote: I could compare my music to white light which contains all colours. Only a prism can divide the colours and make them appear; this prism could be the spirit of the listener.
life.author: Arvo Part

life.quote: The human voice is the most perfect instrument of all.
life.author: Arvo Part

life.quote: A need to concentrate on each sound, so that every blade of grass would be as important as a flower.
life.author: Arvo Part

life.quote: Tintinnabulation is like this. Here I am alone with silence. I have discovered that it is enough when a single note is beautifully played. This note, or a silent beat, or a moment of silence comfort me.
life.author: Arvo Part

life.quote: I don't think just being skinny means necessarily anorexic.
life.author: Carmen Kass

life.quote: I hope one day when I say I'm from Estonia, people don't say: 'What? Where's that?'
life.author: Carmen Kass

life.quote: We feel free. We're independent. People can be openly proud of being Estonian. I have a lot of belief in Estonia.
life.author: Carmen Kass

life.quote: Tintinnabulation is an area I sometimes wander into when I am searching for answers - in my life, my music, my work. In my dark hours, I have the certain feeling that everything outside this one thing has no meaning.
life.author: Arvo Part

life.quote: You know what I always dreamed of? That with the greenhouse effect, one day Estonia can be what L.A. is right now. I always thought when the end of the world comes, I want to be in Estonia. I think then I'd survive.
life.author: Carmen Kass

life.quote: Because I have a passion for the play. My father was a chess teacher, and I learned the play of him as a small child. Occasionally I made another career; but now I have again the possibility of maintaining the passion of my early youth days.
life.author: Carmen Kass

life.quote: I have a figure, and there aren't many girls out there right now who have that.
life.author: Carmen Kass

life.quote: Silence is the pause in me when I am near to God.
life.author: Arvo Part

life.quote: I don't think Estonians ever really hated Russians. It was more, 'Leave us alone.' We can't change what is past. We can't blame them for what their parents have done. We never hated them. They didn't destroy us that bad.
life.author: Carmen Kass

life.quote: I get paid to work; I don't pay to work.
life.author: Carmen Kass

life.quote: Places like New York are just too intense, too much about money, too much about ambition; it's all too superficial for me.
life.author: Carmen Kass

life.quote: It's not really like you have a thing like a supermodel anymore. It's more of a word than a real existence. I think, also, looking at it from a designer's point of view, at one point maybe they felt the stars took too much attention away from the clothes.
life.author: Carmen Kass

life.quote: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: There are two ways to be fooled. One is to believe what isn't true; the other is to refuse to believe what is true.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: Where words fail, music speaks.
life.author: Hans Christian Andersen

life.quote: The Bible is very easy to understand. But we Christians are a bunch of scheming swindlers. We pretend to be unable to understand it because we know very well that the minute we understand, we are obliged to act accordingly.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: People demand freedom of speech as a compensation for the freedom of thought which they seldom use.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: The function of prayer is not to influence God, but rather to change the nature of the one who prays.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: Don't waste your time looking back, you're not going that way.
life.author: Ragnar Lodbrok

life.quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: I found I had less and less to say, until finally, I became silent, and began to listen. I discovered in the silence, the voice of God
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: The most common form of despair is not being who you are.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: In a theatre it happened that a fire started off stage. The clown came out to tell the audience. They thought it was a joke and applauded. He told them again, and they became still more hilarious. This is the way, I suppose, that the world will be destroyed-amid the universal hilarity of wits and wags who think it is all a joke.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: How the little piglets would grunt if they knew how the old boar suffered.
life.author: Ragnar Lodbrok

life.quote: Once you label me you negate me.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: But he who cannot reveal himself cannot love, and he who cannot love is the most unhappy of all.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: The cure for anything is salt water: sweat, tears or the sea.
life.author: Isak Dinesen

life.quote: Face the facts of being what you are, for that is what changes what you are.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: The greatest danger to Christianity is, I contend, not heresies, not heterodoxies, not atheists, not profane secularism - no, but the kind of orthodoxy which is cordial drivel, mediocrity served up sweet. There is nothing that so insidiously displaces the majestic as cordiality.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: To be a woman is something so strange, so confusing and so complicated that only a woman could put up with it.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: Christ has not only spoken to us by his life but has also spoken for us by his death.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: If quantum mechanics hasn't profoundly shocked you, you haven't understood it yet.
life.author: Niels Bohr

life.quote: It takes nothing to join the crowd. It takes everything to stand alone.
life.author: Hans F. Hansen

life.quote: When we measure something we are forcing an undetermined, undefined world to assume an experimental value. We are not measuring the world, we are creating it.
life.author: Niels Bohr

life.quote: If Copenhagen were a person, that person would be generous, beautiful, elderly, but with a flair. A human being that has certain propensities for quarrelling, filled with imagination and with appetite for the new and with respect for the old - somebody who takes good care of things and of people.
life.author: Connie Nielsen

life.quote: The highest and most beautiful things in life are not to be heard about, nor read about, nor seen but, if one will, are to be lived.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: C makes it easy to shoot yourself in the foot; C++ makes it harder, but when you do it blows your whole leg off.
life.author: Bjarne Stroustrup

life.quote: Just living is not enough... one must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower.
life.author: Hans Christian Anderson

life.quote: Our life always expresses the result of our dominant thoughts.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: Most men pursue pleasure with such breathless haste that they hurry past it.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: There are some things so serious you have to laugh at them.
life.author: Niels Bohr

life.quote: The whole world is a series of miracles, but we're so used to them we call them ordinary things.
life.author: Hans Christian Andersen

life.quote: God creates out of nothing. Wonderful you say. Yes, to be sure, but he does what is still more wonderful: he makes saints out of sinners.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: You can't change the past, but you can ruin the present by worrying about the future.
life.author: Isak Dinesen

life.quote: Having an experience is taking part in the world. Taking part in the world is really about sharing responsibility.
life.author: Olafur Eliasson

life.quote: The cure for anything is salt water - sweat, tears or the sea.
life.author: Isak Dinesen

life.quote: A physicist visits a colleague and notices a horseshoe hanging on the wall above the entrance. 'Do you really believe that a horseshoe brings luck?' he asks. 'No,' replies the colleague, 'but I've been told that it works even if you don't believe in it.'
life.author: Niels Bohr

life.quote: No, no, you're not thinking; you're just being logical.
life.author: Niels Bohr

life.quote: Those who study the stars have God for a teacher.
life.author: Tycho Brahe

life.quote: My goal is to formulate a new color theory based on the full spectrum of visible light.
life.author: Olafur Eliasson

life.quote: The paradox is really the pathos of intellectual life and just as only great souls are exposed to passions it is only the great thinker who is exposed to what I call paradoxes, which are nothing else than grandiose thoughts in embryo.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: People understand me so poorly that they don't even understand my complaint about them not understanding me.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: Above all do not forget your duty to love yourself.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: To dare is to lose one's footing momentarily. Not to dare is to lose oneself.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: Your theory is crazy, but it's not crazy enough to be true.
life.author: Niels Bohr

life.quote: The question is not "To be or not to be," it is what we should be until we are not.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: If there was no Black Sabbath, I could still possibly be a morning newspaper delivery boy. No fun.
life.author: Lars Ulrich

life.quote: I still love taking pictures with Polaroid film. For me, it offers the most beautiful way of capturing reality and transferring it onto a flat piece of paper.
life.author: Helena Christensen

life.quote: Difficult times have helped me to understand better than before, how infinitely rich and beautiful life is in every way, and that so many things that one goes worrying about are of no importance whatsoever.
life.author: Isak Dinesen

life.quote: People inspire you or they drain you. Pick them wisely.
life.author: Hans F. Hansen

life.quote: To cheat oneself out of love is the most terrible deception; it is an eternal loss for which there is no reparation, either in time or in eternity.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: Life is like a beautiful melody, only the lyrics are messed up.
life.author: Hans Christian Andersen

life.quote: Hope is passion for what is possible.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: We're strongly in favor of the U.N. plan for a solution to the Cyprus conflict. Hopefully a solution can be found before the end of this summit, but we cannot and will not let it block our decisions on enlargement.
life.author: Anders Fogh Rasmussen

life.quote: The extreme rarity of transitional forms in the fossil record persists as the trade secret of paleontology.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: Not just in commerce but in the world of ideas too our age is putting on a veritable clearance sale. Everything can be had so dirt cheap that one begins to wonder whether in the end anyone will want to make a bid.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: Boredom is the root of all evil - the despairing refusal to be oneself.
life.author: Soren Kierkegaard

life.quote: The grounding in natural sciences which I obtained in the course of my medical studies, including preliminary examinations in botany, zoology, physics, and chemistry, was to become decisive in determining the trend of my literary work.
life.author: Johannes Vilhelm Jensen

life.quote: If one devalues rationality, the world tends to fall apart.
life.author: Lars von Trier

life.quote: You can tell whether a man is clever by his answers. You can tell whether a man is wise by his questions.
life.author: Naguib Mahfouz

life.quote: Our path to Palestine will not be covered with a red carpet or with yellow sand. Our path to Palestine will be covered with blood... In order that we may liberate Palestine, the Arab nation must unite, the Arab armies must unite, and a unified plan of action must be established.
life.author: Gamal Abdel Nasser

life.quote: He who cannot change the very fabric of his thought will never be able to change reality.
life.author: Anwar Sadat

life.quote: To be satisfied with a little, is the greatest wisdom; and he that increaseth his riches, increaseth his cares; but a contented mind is a hidden treasure, and trouble findeth it not.
life.author: Akhenaton

life.quote: The stars are like letters that inscribe themselves at every moment in the sky. Everything in the world is full of signs. All events are coordinated. All things depend on each other. Everything breathes together.
life.author: Plotinus

life.quote: We will not accept any...coexistence with Israel...Today the issue is not the establishment of peace between the Arab states and Israel....The war with Israel is in effect since 1948.
life.author: Gamal Abdel Nasser

life.quote: It's a most distressing affliction to have a sentimental heart and a skeptical mind.
life.author: Naguib Mahfouz

life.quote: Beauty is rather a light that plays over the symmetry of things than that symmetry itself.
life.author: Plotinus

life.quote: I will announce some of the tombs I found next to the great pyramid of Khufu. One is an intact tomb that I have not opened yet.
life.author: Zahi Hawass

life.quote: I promise to crush Israel and return it to the humiliation and wretchedness of the Koran.
life.author: Anwar Sadat

life.quote: If you don't have the capacity to change yourself and your own attitudes, then nothing around you can be changed.
life.author: Anwar Sadat

life.quote: Mankind is poised midway between the gods and the beasts.
life.author: Plotinus

life.quote: True wisdom is less presuming than folly. The wise man doubteth often, and changeth his mind; the fool is obstinate, and doubteth not; he knoweth all things but his own ignorance.
life.author: Akhenaton

life.quote: Knowledge has three degrees--opinion, science, illumination. The means or instrument of the first is sense; of the second, dialectic; of the third, intuition.
life.author: Plotinus

life.quote: There can be hope only for a society which acts as one big family, not as many separate ones.
life.author: Anwar Sadat

life.quote: Withdraw into yourself and look. And if you do not find yourself beautiful as yet, do as the creator of a statue that is to be made beautiful; the sculptor cuts away here, smoothes there, makes this line lighter, this other purer, until he or she has shown a beautiful face upon the statue.
life.author: Plotinus

life.quote: As for life's tragedies, our love will defeat them. Love is the most effective cure. In the crevices of disasters, happiness lies like a diamond in a mind, so let us instill in ourselves the wisdom of love.
life.author: Naguib Mahfouz

life.quote: I found myself in a sea in which the waves of joy and sorrow were clashing against each other.
life.author: Naguib Mahfouz

life.quote: The genius of you Americans is that you never make clear-cut stupid moves, only complicated stupid moves which make the rest of us wonder at the possibility that we might be missing something.
life.author: Gamal Abdel Nasser

life.quote: Let there be no more war or bloodshed between Arabs and Israelis. Let there be no more suffering or denial of rights. Let there be no more despair or loss of faith.
life.author: Anwar Sadat

life.quote: All strange and terrible events are welcome, but comforts we despise.
life.author: Cleopatra

life.quote: Real success is success with self. It's not in having things, but in having mastery, having victory over self.
life.author: Anwar Sadat

life.quote: If you don't have the power to change yourself, then nothing will change around you.
life.author: Anwar Sadat

life.quote: Co-operative enterprises provide the organisational means whereby a significant proportion of humanity is able to take into its own hands the tasks of creating productive employment, overcoming poverty and achieving social integration.
life.author: Boutros Boutros-Ghali

life.quote: I am just a person who is human, down to earth enjoying life... whatever god blesses you with. Enjoying life for me is just normal.
life.author: Mohamed Al-Fayed

life.quote: Peace is more precious than a piece of land.
life.author: Anwar Sadat

life.quote: There is no longer a way out of our present situation except by forging a road toward our objective, violently and by force, over a sea of blood and under a horizon blazing with fire.
life.author: Gamal Abdel Nasser

life.quote: Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a great battle. by Saint Philo of Alexandria
life.author: Philo

life.quote: The age of isolation is gone. And gone are the days in which barbed wire served as demarcation lines, separating and isolating countries from one another. No country can escape looking beyond its boundaries to find the source of the currents which influence how it can live with others.
life.author: Gamal Abdel Nasser

life.quote: Democracy is an objective. Democratization is a process. Democratization serves the cause of peace because it offers the possibility of justice and of progressive change without force.
life.author: Boutros Boutros-Ghali

life.quote: To love means to give, and to give means to build, while to hate is to destroy.
life.author: Anwar Sadat

life.quote: It would be some time before I fully realized that the United States sees little need for diplomacy; power is enough. Only the weak rely on diplomacy. The Roman Empire had no need for diplomacy. Nor does the United States.
life.author: Boutros Boutros-Ghali

life.quote: We must close our eyes and invoke a new manner of seeing...a wakefulness that is the birthright of us all, though few put it to use.
life.author: Plotinus

life.quote: Never did eye see the sun unless it had first become sun-like, and never can the soul have vision of the First Beauty unless itself be beautiful.
life.author: Plotinus

life.quote: We're a sentimental people. We like a few kind words better than millions of dollars given in a humiliating way.
life.author: Gamal Abdel Nasser

life.quote: Only stupid people don't change their minds.
life.author: Boutros Boutros-Ghali

life.quote: It has long been recognized that an essential element in protecting human rights was a widespread knowledge among the population of what their rights are and how they can be defended.
life.author: Boutros Boutros-Ghali

life.quote: A genocide in Africa has not received the same attention that genocide in Europe or genocide in Turkey or genocide in other part of the world. There is still this kind of basic discrimination against the African people and the African problems.
life.author: Boutros Boutros-Ghali

life.quote: Working gets in the way of living.
life.author: Omar Sharif

life.quote: I want to live every moment totally and intensely. Even when I'm giving an interview or talking to people, that's all that I'm thinking about.
life.author: Omar Sharif

life.quote: The Islamic method of waging war is not to kill innocent civilians, but it was Christians in World War II who bombed civilians in Dresden and Hiroshima, neither of which were military targets.
life.author: Feisal Abdul Rauf

life.quote: I was brought up to believe that how I saw myself was more important than how others saw me.
life.author: Anwar Sadat

life.quote: In this state of absorbed contemplation, there is no longer any question of holding an object in view; the vision is such that seeing and seen are one; object and act of vision have become identical.
life.author: Plotinus

life.quote: [At Marc Antony's tomb:] Nothing could part us in life, but now in death we are likely to change places, you the Roman lying here in Egyptian soil, and I, helpless woman that I am, being buried in Italy.
life.author: Cleopatra

life.quote: Fear is, I believe, a most effective tool in destroying the soul of an individual - and the soul of a people.
life.author: Anwar Sadat

life.quote: The only matter that could take Egypt to war again is water.
life.author: Anwar Sadat

life.quote: A computer is like air conditioning - it becomes useless when you open Windows
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: Most of the good programmers do programming not because they expect to get paid or get adulation by the public, but because it is fun to program.
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: I've got asthma. When I was 17 I forgot to take my medication and was taken to a hospital for almost two weeks. After that I've taken better care of my illness.
life.author: Ville Valo

life.quote: Los Angeles and New York are the big centers of the music industry worldwide so of course it can be hard for newcomers who don't know what to expect from the music business.
life.author: Ville Valo

life.quote: Finnish companies tend to be very traditional, not taking many risks. Silicon Valley is completely different: people here really live on the edge.
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: Mind is everything. Muscle - pieces of rubber. All that I am, I am because of my mind.
life.author: Paavo Nurmi

life.quote: Microsoft isn't evil, they just make really crappy operating systems.
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: I need a soul mate so that I can be who I am, naked. I want there to be someone who picks up my heavy, bleeding heart and takes it somewhere safe and warm.
life.author: Ville Valo

life.quote: The Finland of the 21st century can thrive only if women of learning - in common with their male counterparts - are guaranteed the opportunity to use their creative potential to the full.
life.author: Tarja Halonen

life.quote: Bad programmers worry about the code. Good programmers worry about data structures and their relationships.
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: If we understood the world, we would realize that there is a logic of harmony underlying its manifold apparent dissonances.
life.author: Jean Sibelius

life.quote: The helmet has a special meaning for many drivers. How important is it to you? - It protects my head.
life.author: Kimi Raikkonen

life.quote: Backups are for wimps. Real men upload their data to an FTP site and have everyone else mirror it.
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: Music is, for me, like a beautiful mosaic which God has put together. He takes all the pieces in his hand, throws them into the world, and we have to recreate the picture from the pieces.
life.author: Jean Sibelius

life.quote: All the doctors who wanted to forbid me to smoke and to drink are dead.
life.author: Jean Sibelius

life.quote: What commercialism has brought to Linux has been the incentive to make a good distribution that is easy to use and that has all the packaging issues worked out.
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: Only wimps use tape backup. Real men just upload their important stuff on ftp and let the rest of the world mirror it.
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: Intelligence is the ability to avoid doing work, yet getting the work done.
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: Finland, and all the other European countries, we are too dependent on imported energy. We should be using a broader variety of energy resources.
life.author: Tarja Halonen

life.quote: All operating systems sucks, but Linux just sucks less
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: If you really put a small value upon yourself, rest assured that the world will not raise your price. Pay no attention to what the critics say. A statue has never been erected in honor of a critic.
life.author: Jean Sibelius

life.quote: Often your 'fixes' are actually removing capabilities that you had, because they were 'too confusing to the user'. GNOME seems to be developed by interface Nazis, where consistently the excuse for not doing something is not 'it's too complicated to do', but 'it would confuse users'.
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: That's what makes Linux so good: you put in something, and that effort multiplies. It's a positive feedback cycle.
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: I have a big heart and a small brain.
life.author: Ville Valo

life.quote: Some people have told me they don't think a fat penguin really embodies the grace of Linux, which just tells me they have never seen an angry penguin charging at them in excess of 100mph. They'd be a lot more careful about what they say if they had.
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: In many cases the user interface to a program is the most important part for a commercial company: whether the programs works correctly or not seems to be secondary.
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: I haven't been baptised. My dad's not in the church and is not a religious person. My mum is more spiritual - she does Thai-chi and goes to Stonehenge and things like that. I'm proud to be pagan. Finland is not really a religious country. I'm still looking for my god.
life.author: Ville Valo

life.quote: Whereas most other modern composers are engaged in manufacturing cocktails of every hue and description, I offer the public cold spring water.
life.author: Jean Sibelius

life.quote: The most romantic thing is to look someone straight in the eyes and say and mean, "I love you", that's a lot. It's a really hard thing because you can never be certain of yourself, but at that particular moment, you feel like that. Its magic
life.author: Ville Valo

life.quote: I love you is eight letters...then again, so is bullshit.
life.author: Ville Valo

life.quote: I often conduct an orchestra in my sleep; my orchestras are so huge that the back desks of the violas vanish into the horizon. And everything is so wonderful.
life.author: Jean Sibelius

life.quote: Music for me is an emotional thing and it really does make me happy. It's not a tool for me to get fame or see my face in the papers or anything like that. It's about the fact that I really do enjoy it.
life.author: Ville Valo

life.quote: Women are always beautiful.
life.author: Ville Valo

life.quote: Millions of years ago, in my previous incarnations, I must have been related to swans... because I can still feel that affinity.
life.author: Jean Sibelius

life.quote: Let's put it this way: the glass is half-empty, but the fact is, I can always get another drink
life.author: Ville Valo

life.quote: Every girl has something beautiful in her soul. It doesn't matter if she's fat or thin. That has nothing to do with her personality.
life.author: Ville Valo

life.quote: In short: just say NO TO DRUGS, and maybe you won't end up like the Hurd people.
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: In real open source, you have the right to control your own destiny.
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: I have 4 kids already, I don’t need anymore. I’m a single parent. I’m taking them through Europe and make them play funny instruments.
life.author: Ville Valo

life.quote: The framework of a symphony must be so strong that it forces you to follow it, regardless of the environment and circumstances.
life.author: Jean Sibelius

life.quote: Those that can, do. Those that can't, complain.
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: For an instant God opens his door and His orchestra plays the Fifth Symphony.
life.author: Jean Sibelius

life.quote: If I could throw my phone away, I would probably do it. It's always on silent, and I don't like when it rings and people are calling. We could live without those things in the past when we just had a phone on the street somewhere, on the corner or at the house. I have no interest in telling all the people what I do every day and where I am.
life.author: Kimi Raikkonen

life.quote: I think love keeps on changing every day.It’s not black and white and it’s definitely more than 50 shades of grey.
life.author: Ville Valo

life.quote: Avoiding complexity reduces bugs.
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: If Microsoft ever does applications for Linux it means I've won.
life.author: Linus Torvalds

life.quote: I’m not interested in what people think about me. I’m not Michael Schumacher.
life.author: Kimi Raikkonen

life.quote: We're trying to have the band create something beautiful that hopefully one day, 20 years from now, can be picked up by a kid and hopefully have the same effect that Neil Young had on me, or Led Zeppelin or Black Sabbath.
life.author: Ville Valo

life.quote: I like to listen to mellow stuff on the road like Travis, as we are constantly surrounded by rock music on tour and so its nice listening to mellow stuff. Obviously back at home I listen to a lot more rock music.
life.author: Ville Valo

life.quote: All athletes need three things: commitment, discipline and hard work. Without that it's hard to keep running.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: When you run the marathon, you run against the distance, not against the other runners and not against the time.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: Once you have commitment, you need the discipline and hard work to get you there.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: First, do enough training. Then believe in yourself and say: I can do it. Tomorrow is my day. And then say: the person in front of me, he is just a human being as well; he has two legs, I have two legs, that is all. That is mentally how you prepare.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: You need three things to win: discipline, hard work and, before everything maybe, commitment. No one will make it without those three. Sport teaches you that.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: I always tell young athletes the same thing, 'Wherever you go, whatever you do, what must your top priority be? Running.'
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: Always, if you win mentally, you can win physically as well.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: You must do as your people do. If my people are poor, I must be poor. People ask me, 'Why don't you find a personal coach or a private car?' I can't. Then I won't be part of my people.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: I will always listen to my coaches. But first I listen to my body. If what they tell me suits my body, great. If my body doesn't feel good with what they say, then always my body comes first.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: My father thought sport was something fun - he didn't know it was a way to make money. Then I won a Mercedes at the world championships and I gave it to him. From the moment it arrived my father said: 'Good, you can support not just yourself but me too'.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: I can't change everything by myself but I can be one of the people who are trying to change the situation.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: My school was six miles away from where I lived on the farm. I had to walk and run, there and back every day, through gorges and over rivers. If I was late, there was a very big stick waiting for me.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: Life is a kind of struggle. Life is a sort of fight.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: Many people know that Ethiopia is poor. When I break a world record, maybe people get to know something else about Ethiopia, something good. We can't make planes or cars, we don't have the materials. We do what we can.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: You know the marathon in my country is just exceptional. It's like soccer in England. If England win the world cup and Ethiopia win the marathon - it's the same.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: Why should I say I will retire in three or four years? You retire the very moment you utter those words.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: In the rainy season, sometimes to get to the first lesson we had to run really quick, because we had to cross the river to school and we'd have to go up and down the bank to find a place to cross because there is no bridge.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: I feel a social responsibility. We need to open people's eyes. There is a lack of education in Ethiopia.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: In my life I do a lot of things but I never forget my training.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: When I run in Ethiopia, I look out and see eucalyptus trees and rivers.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: He was not a runner, my father, but he was quick. I always remember it was very difficult to escape from him when he was angry. If he wanted to beat us he would always catch us. Even me, he could always catch me.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: I love running and I will always run.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: I have to change a lot of things before I become a good marathon runner.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: Since I achieved something, running has exploded in my country. For me sometimes it is difficult even to know who the athletes are who are competing at the highest level. There are thousands.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: When I had no shoes I was comfortable - I used to run barefoot. When I wore shoes it was difficult. To run in shoes was ok, but at the beginning of my career it was hard.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: You lose the speed before the stamina.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: When you talk about world record times, you have to understand that everything must be perfect the weather, the course, the temperature. It is not always enough to be in good shape.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: Being a great athlete is something that requires a lot of training and dedication, it does not come as easily as some people may think.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: I haven't done a marathon for a long time. So we'll see. I will need good luck.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: If I don't train enough, of course I'm nervous.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: I remember in particular my first victory when I achieved a very fast time in what were perfect conditions but since then the wind has always been a factor against me.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: Like some high official, you have to tell your brain: 'Do it. Come on. I have to do it.'
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: When we race in London a world record will be the last thing on our minds.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: You know, I want to help my country. Definitely I can help them, simply by winning races. Sure, they can follow my path to a good career. But for me it is not enough. I want to be more than that. In everything I want to be a role model.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: When I wake up at 5 in the morning is it just to jog? Definitely not, I give it all of my efforts.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: For me a day without training is like a day without eating.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: I'm a runner first before anything else.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: Athletes have to be confident and I am thinking like that.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: When you promise something, you must fulfill it.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: Considering that the race is star-studded no runner will be willing to set the pace for the others. This is why a record will be almost impossible.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: I know what I want when I start a marathon: to win! But what do you want? Make sure you're clear in advance and don't go out too fast.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: My father thought sport was something fun - he didn't know it was a way to make money.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: Since I achieved something, running has exploded in my country.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: I'm retiring from competitive running, not from running. You cannot stop running, this is my life.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: That is not enough. Sport has been great for me, a great learning place that if you want to achieve you can, even if you are from the poorest part of Africa.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: Eradicate poverty. This is all that matters in my country. When I am out training I think about this a lot; when I am running it is going over in my mind. As a country we cannot move forward until we eradicate poverty.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: At the moment I am a little bit politician, yes. I think that could be my next step. It is not because I want power, it is because of what I think I could do for the people.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: I'm lucky. The best possible place in the world for training is Addis Ababa, so I am home all the time except when I am racing. I like to be there, near my family, my kids, also the real estate business I run with my wife.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: This hand is not very active always, because it was in this hand that I carried my books. My carrying hand was always my strongest. Now I think my other hand has developed more muscles from signing all those autographs.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: I used to run to school, 10k every day. And this at altitude, perfect preparation, really.
life.author: Haile Gebrselassie

life.quote: Religion is for people who fear hell, spirituality is for people who have been there.
life.author: David Bowie

life.quote: A man is lucky if he is the first love of a woman. A woman is lucky if she is the last love of a man.
life.author: Charles Dickens

life.quote: To love means loving the unlovable. To forgive means pardoning the unpardonable. Faith means believing the unbelievable. Hope means hoping when everything seems hopeless.
life.author: G. K. Chesterton

life.quote: I think women are foolish to pretend they are equal to men, they are far superior and always have been.
life.author: William Golding

life.quote: Nature is painting for us, day after day, pictures of infinite beauty.
life.author: John Ruskin

life.quote: It is almost impossible to watch a sunset and not dream.
life.author: Bernard Williams

life.quote: If you get tired, learn to rest, not to quit.
life.author: Banksy

life.quote: As human beings we suffer from an innate tendency to jump to conclusions; to judge people too quickly and to pronounce them failures or heroes without due consideration of the actual facts and ideals of the period.
life.author: Prince Charles

life.quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
life.author: Charlie Chaplin

life.quote: As you get older three things happen. The first is your memory goes, and I can't remember the other two.
life.author: Norman Wisdom

life.quote: Sunsets are so beautiful that they almost seem as if we were looking through the gates of Heaven.
life.author: Sir John Lubbock

life.quote: The Eyes are the window to your soul
life.author: William Shakespeare

life.quote: Sometimes it is the people who no one imagines anything of who do the things that no one can imagine.
life.author: Alan Turing

life.quote: Sometimes there is no next time, no time-outs, no second chances. Sometimes it's now or never.
life.author: Alan Bennett

life.quote: Experience is not what happens to you; it's what you do with what happens to you.
life.author: Aldous Huxley

life.quote: Wisdom is the right use of knowledge. To know is not to be wise. Many men know a great deal, and are all the greater fools for it. There is no fool so great a fool as a knowing fool. But to know how to use knowledge is to have wisdom.
life.author: Charles Spurgeon

life.quote: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
life.author: John Lennon

life.quote: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.
life.author: A. A. Milne

life.quote: Look up to the sky. You’ll never find rainbows if you’re looking down.
life.author: Charlie Chaplin

life.quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
life.author: William Shakespeare

life.quote: To trust God in the light is nothing, but to trust him in the dark, that is faith.
life.author: Charles Spurgeon

life.quote: Live your life as an Exclamation rather than an Explanation
life.author: Isaac Newton

life.quote: The most worth-while thing is to try to put happiness into the lives of others.
life.author: Robert Baden-Powell

life.quote: We never fail when we try to do our duty, we always fail when we neglect to do it.
life.author: Robert Baden-Powell

life.quote: What a terrible era in which idiots govern the blind.
life.author: William Shakespeare

life.quote: Hell is empty and all the devils are here.
life.author: William Shakespeare

life.quote: No one can pass through life, any more than he can pass through a bit of country, without leaving tracks behind, and those tracks may often be helpful to those coming after him in finding their way.
life.author: Robert Baden-Powell

life.quote: Nothing is permanent in this world, not even our troubles.
life.author: Charlie Chaplin

life.quote: The Word of God is like a lion. You don't have to defend a lion. All you have to do is let the lion loose, and the lion will defend itself.
life.author: Charles Spurgeon

life.quote: A time will come when instead of shepherds feeding the sheep, the church will have clowns entertaining the goats
life.author: Charles Spurgeon

life.quote: Atheism is so senseless. When I look at the solar system, I see the earth at the right distance from the sun to receive the proper amounts of heat and light. This did not happen by chance.
life.author: Isaac Newton

life.quote: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.
life.author: Isaac Newton

life.quote: What we see depends mainly on what we look for.
life.author: Sir John Lubbock

life.quote: Never play with the feelings of others, because you may win the game but the risk is that you will surely lose the person for life time
life.author: William Shakespeare

life.quote: Have more than you show, speak less than you know.
life.author: William Shakespeare

life.quote: In the absence of any other proof, the thumb alone would convince me of God's existence.
life.author: Isaac Newton

life.quote: Be Prepared... the meaning of the motto is that a scout must prepare himself by previous thinking out and practicing how to act on any accident or emergency so that he is never taken by surprise.
life.author: Robert Baden-Powell

life.quote: You're under no obligation to be the same person you were 5 minutes ago.
life.author: Alan Watts

life.quote: A friend is one that knows you as you are, understands where you have been, accepts what you have become, and still, gently allows you to grow.
life.author: William Shakespeare

life.quote: I would rather be a rebel than a slave.
life.author: Emmeline Pankhurst

life.quote: The Bible is not the light of the world, it is the light of the Church. But the world does not read the Bible, the world reads Christians! "You are the light of the world."
life.author: Charles Spurgeon

life.quote: Aging is an extraordinary process where you become the person you always should have been.
life.author: David Bowie

life.quote: Don't waste your love on somebody, who doesn't value it.
life.author: William Shakespeare

life.quote: Happiness is not mere pleasure, not the outcome of wealth. It is the result of active work rather than passive enjoyment of pleasure.
life.author: Robert Baden-Powell

life.quote: You have not lived today until you have done something for someone who can never repay you.
life.author: John Bunyan

life.quote: The deepest sin against the human mind is to believe things without evidence.
life.author: Thomas Huxley

life.quote: A Scout is never taken by surprise; he knows exactly what to do when anything unexpected happens.
life.author: Robert Baden-Powell

life.quote: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
life.author: William Shakespeare

life.quote: A wise man will make more opportunities than he finds.
