life.author: Francis Bacon

life.quote: Every action has an equal and opposite reaction
life.author: Isaac Newton

life.quote: The most important thing in life is to stop saying 'I wish' and start saying 'I will.' Consider nothing impossible, then treat possibilities as probabilities.
life.author: Charles Dickens

life.quote: It is not the strongest of the species that survives, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
life.author: Charles Darwin

life.quote: Much as we might wish to believe otherwise, universal love and the welfare of the species as a whole are concepts which simply do not make evolutionary sense.
life.author: Richard Dawkins

life.quote: Being honest may not get you a lot of friends but it’ll always get you the right ones
life.author: John Lennon

life.quote: If you make listening and observation your occupation you will gain much more than you can by talk.
life.author: Robert Baden-Powell

life.quote: Your naked body should only belong to those who fall in love with your naked soul.
life.author: Charlie Chaplin

life.quote: I know not how I seem to others, but to myself I am but a small child wandering upon the vast shores of knowledge, every now and then finding a small bright pebble to content myself with while the vast ocean of undiscovered truth lay before me.
life.author: Isaac Newton

life.quote: Girls should be brought up to be comrades and helpers, not to be dolls. They should take a real and not a visionary share in the welfare of the nation.
life.author: Robert Baden-Powell

life.quote: Pay attention to the people God puts in your path if you want to discern what God is up to in your life.
life.author: Henri Nouwen

life.quote: Hope is willing to leave unanswered questions unanswered and unknown futures unknown. Hope makes you see God's guiding hand not only in the gentle and pleasant moments but also in the shadows of disappointment and darkness.
life.author: Henri Nouwen

life.quote: Every time there are losses, there are choices to be made. You choose to live your losses as passages to anger, blame, hatred, depression and resentment, or you choose to let these losses be passages to something new, something wider, and deeper.
life.author: Henri Nouwen

life.quote: What makes us human is not our mind but our heart, not our ability to think but our ability to love.
life.author: Henri Nouwen

life.quote: Love is something eternal; the aspect may change, but not the essence.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: If you look at the world, you'll be distressed. If you look within, you'll be depressed. If you look at God you'll be at rest.
life.author: Corrie Ten Boom

life.quote: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: Jimmy Page is an excellent producer. Led Zeppelin I and II are classics. As a player he's very good in the studio, but I've never seen him play well live. He's sloppy. He plays like he's got a broken hand and he's two years old. If you put out a good album and play like a two year old, what's the purpose?
life.author: Eddie Van Halen

life.quote: Our life is full of brokenness - broken relationships, broken promises, broken expectations. How can we live with that brokenness without becoming bitter and resentful except by returning again and again to God's faithful presence in our lives.
life.author: Henri Nouwen

life.quote: Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God.
life.author: Corrie Ten Boom

life.quote: Jesus did not promise to change the circumstances around us. He promised great peace and pure joy to those who would learn to believe that God actually controls all things.
life.author: Corrie Ten Boom

life.quote: Evil can also be beautiful. The Coliseum in Rome, for example, a wonderful structure with an awful past. Just think about the bloody gladiator fights there.
life.author: Rem Koolhaas

life.quote: Forgiveness is setting the prisoner free, only to find out that the prisoner was me.
life.author: Corrie Ten Boom

life.quote: Normality is a paved road: It's comfortable to walk, but no flowers grow.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: Faith sees the invisible, believes the unbelievable, and receives the impossible.
life.author: Corrie Ten Boom

life.quote: I dream my painting and I paint my dream.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: Worry does not empty tomorrow of its sorrow. It empties today of its strength.
life.author: Corrie Ten Boom

life.quote: Your profession is not what brings home your weekly paycheck, your profession is what you're put here on earth to do, with such passion and such intensity that it becomes spiritual in calling.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: This is what the past is for! Every experience God gives us, every person He puts in our lives is the perfect preparation for the future that only He can see.
life.author: Corrie Ten Boom

life.quote: If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint,' then by all means paint, and that voice will be silenced.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: I am always doing what I cannot do yet, in order to learn how to do it.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: In order to realize the worth of the anchor we need to feel the stress of the storm.
life.author: Corrie Ten Boom

life.quote: Forgiveness is the key that unlocks the door of resentment and the handcuffs of hatred. It is a power that breaks the chains of bitterness and the shackles of selfishness.
life.author: Corrie Ten Boom

life.quote: Normality is a paved road: It's comfortable to walk, but no flowers grow on it.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: Is prayer your steering wheel or your spare tire?
life.author: Corrie Ten Boom

life.quote: Worrying is carrying tomorrow's load with today's strength- carrying two days at once. It is moving into tomorrow ahead of time. Worrying doesn't empty tomorrow of its sorrow, it empties today of its strength.
life.author: Corrie Ten Boom

life.quote: Dare to love and to be a real friend. The love you give and receive is a reality that will lead you closer and closer to God as well as those whom God has given you to love.
life.author: Henri Nouwen

life.quote: Joy does not simply happen to us. We have to choose joy and keep choosing it every day.
life.author: Henri Nouwen

life.quote: Close friends are truly life's treasures. Sometimes they know us better than we know ourselves. With gentle honesty, they are there to guide and support us, to share our laughter and our tears. Their presence reminds us that we are never really alone.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: Trying to do the Lord's work in your own strength is the most confusing, exhausting, and tedious of all work. But when you are filled with the Holy Spirit, then the ministry of Jesus just flows out of you.
life.author: Corrie Ten Boom

life.quote: Art is to console those who are broken by life.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: If you want the present to be different from the past, study the past.
life.author: Baruch Spinoza

life.quote: No matter how thin you slice it, there will always be two sides.
life.author: Baruch Spinoza

life.quote: My whole life I have been complainingthat my work was constantly interrupted, until I discoveredthat my interruptionswere my work.
life.author: Henri Nouwen

life.quote: There is nothing more truly artistic than to love people.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: How lovely yellow is! It stands for the sun.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: The more you struggle to live, the less you live. Give up the notion that you must be sure of what you are doing. Instead, surrender to what is real within you, for that alone is sure....you are above everything distressing.
life.author: Baruch Spinoza

life.quote: The way to know life is to love many things.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: I am seeking, I am striving, I am in it with all my heart.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: If one truly loves nature one finds beauty everywhere.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: A great fire burns within me, but no one stops to warm themselves at it, and passers-by only see a wisp of smoke.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: There is peace even in the storm.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: Those we most love cause us not only great joy but also great pain. LOVE is stronger than fear, life stronger than death, hope stronger than despair. We have to trust that the risk of loving is always worth taking.
life.author: Henri Nouwen

life.quote: We are called to be fruitful - not successful, not productive, not accomplished. Success comes from strength, stress, and human effort. Fruitfulness comes from vulnerability and the admission of our own weakness.
life.author: Henri Nouwen

life.quote: What am I in the eyes of most people - a nonentity, an eccentric, or an unpleasant person - somebody who has no position in society and will never have; in short, the lowest of the low. All right, then - even if that were absolutely true, then I should one day like to show by my work what such an eccentric, such a nobody, has in his heart.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: I often think that the night is more alive and more richly colored than the day.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: A man cannot govern a nation if he cannot govern a city; he cannot govern a city if he cannot govern a family; he cannot govern a family unless he can govern himself; and he cannot govern himself unless his passions are subject to reason
life.author: Hugo Grotius

life.quote: Each day holds a surprise. But only if we expect it can we see, hear, or feel it when it comes to us. Let's not be afraid to receive each day's surprise, whether it comes to us as sorrow or as joy It will open a new place in our hearts, a place where we can welcome new friends and celebrate more fully our shared humanity.
life.author: Henri Nouwen

life.quote: I often think that the night is more alive and richly colored than the day.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: Ultimately, we have just one moral duty: to reclaim large areas of peace in ourselves, more and more peace, and to reflect it towards others. And the more peace there is in us, the more peace there will be in our troubled world.
life.author: Etty Hillesum

life.quote: The more clearly you understand yourself and your emotions, the more you become a lover of what is.
life.author: Baruch Spinoza

life.quote: I don't know anything with certainty, but seeing the stars makes me dream.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: Nothing in nature is by chance... Something appears to be chance only because of our lack of knowledge.
life.author: Baruch Spinoza

life.quote: I put my heart and my soul into my work, and have lost my mind in the process.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: Listening is much more than allowing another to talk while waiting for a chance to respond. Listening is paying full attention to others and welcoming them into our very beings. The beauty of listening is that those who are listened to start feeling accepted, start taking our words more seriously and discovering their true selves.
life.author: Henri Nouwen

life.quote: I am seeking. I am striving. I am in it with all my heart.
life.author: Vincent Van Gogh

life.quote: The wonderful thing about praying is that you leave a world of not being able to do something, and enter God’s realm where everything is possible. He specializes in the impossible. Nothing is too great for His almighty power. Nothing is too small for His love.
life.author: Corrie Ten Boom

life.quote: When I trust deeply that today God is truly with me and holds me safe in a divine embrace, guiding every one of my steps I can let go of my anxious need to know how tomorrow will look, or what will happen next month or next year. I can be fully where I am and pay attention to the many signs of God's love within me and around me.
life.author: Henri Nouwen

life.quote: He who does not know how to look back at where he came from will never get to his destination.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: Ignorance is servitude, because as a man thinks, so he is; a man who does not think for himself and allows himself to be guided by the thought of another is like the beast led by a halter.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: Genius has no country. It blossoms everywhere. Genius is like the light, the air. It is the heritage of all.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: I have to believe much in God because I have lost my faith in man.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: One only dies once, and if one does not die well, a good opportunity is lost and will not present itself again.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: I die without seeing dawn's light shining on my country... You, who will see it, welcome it for me...don't forget those who fell during the nighttime.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: It is enough for the evil people to succeed, for the good people to do nothing.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: No good water comes from a muddy spring. No sweet fruit comes from a bitter seed.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: The youth is the hope of our future.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: Travel is a caprice in childhood, a passion in youth, a necessity in manhood, and an elegy in old age.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: I don’t believe in courtship.It’s a waste of time. If I love the person, I’ll tell her right away. But for you, I’ll make an exception. Just love me now, and I’ll court you forever.
life.author: Ferdinand Marcos

life.quote: I go where there are no slaves, hangmen or oppressors; where faith does not kill; where the one who reigns is God.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: I can concede that the government has no knowledge of the people, but I believe the people know less of the government. There are useless officials, evil, if you like, but there are also good ones, and these are not able to accomplish anything because they encounter an inert mass, the population that takes little part in matters that concern them.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: Who does not love his own tongue is far worse than a brute or stinking fish.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: Our liberty will not be secured at the sword's point... We must secure it by making ourselves worthy of it. And when the people reaches that height, God will provide a weapon, the idols will be shattered, tyranny will crumble like a house of cards, and liberty will shine out like the first dawn.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: To be happy does not mean to indulge in foolishness!
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: To live is to be among men, and to be among men is to struggle, a struggle not only with them but with oneself; with their passions, but also with one's own.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: It is not the criminals who arouse the hatred of others, but the men who are honest.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: I do not write for this generation. I am writing for other ages. If this could read me, they would burn my books, the work of my whole life. On the other hand, the generation which interprets these writings will be an educated generation; they will understand me and say: Not all were asleep in the nighttime of our grandparents.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: The people do not complain because they have no voice; do not move because they are lethargic, and you say that they do not suffer because you have not seen their hearts bleed.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: History should not be left to the historians. Rather, be like Churchill. Make history, and then write it.
life.author: Ferdinand Marcos

life.quote: I honor the father in his son, not the son in his father. Each one receives a reward or punishment for his deeds, but not for the acts of others.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: The glory of saving a country is not for him who has contributed to its ruin.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: Why independence? If the slaves of today will be the tyrants of tomorrow.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: For myself I think that one wrong does not right the other, and forgiveness cannot be won with useless tears or alms to the Church.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: I often wonder what I will be remembered in history for. Scholar? Military hero? Builder?
life.author: Ferdinand Marcos

life.quote: Some people say the president is incapable of enforcing the law. Let them say that once more and I will set the tanks on them.
life.author: Ferdinand Marcos

life.quote: I was reminded as I was reviewing my life, that I have been in too many conflicts, too many wars, political battles, military battles, civil strifes in government. And always one lesson stands out and that is, those whom you fight most passionately often turn out to be your best friends.
life.author: Ferdinand Marcos

life.quote: Elect me as your congressman today, I promise you an Ilocano president in 20 years.
life.author: Ferdinand Marcos

life.quote: The power of one, if fearless and focused, is formidable, but the power of many working together is better.
life.author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

life.quote: The example could encourage others who only fear to start.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: It is a useless life that is not consecrated to a great ideal. It is like a stone wasted on the field without becoming a part of any edifice.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: Life is meant to be a challenge, because challenges are what make you grow.
life.author: Manny Pacquiao

life.quote: A nation is born into freedom on the day when such a people, moulded into a nation by a process of cultural evolution and sense of oneness born of common struggle and suffering, announces to the world that it asserts its natural right to liberty and is ready to defend it with blood, life, and honor.
life.author: Diosdado Macapagal

life.quote: The tyranny of some is possible only through the cowardice of others.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: I come from a poor family.
life.author: Manny Pacquiao

life.quote: Now I ask you to make your sacrifice. Take a gamble. I took the plunge and I'm glad of it.
life.author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

life.quote: The challenge to America is to extend to Asia the defensive shield of American power in forms consonant with Asian freedom and self-respect.
life.author: Ferdinand Marcos

life.quote: Cowardice rightly understood begins with selfishness and ends with shame.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: Oh how beautiful to fall to give you flight, to die to give you life, to rest under your sky; and in your enchanted land forever sleep.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: Little boys have amazing minds.
life.author: Ferdinand Marcos

life.quote: Boxing is not for killing each other.
life.author: Manny Pacquiao

life.quote: No one has a monopoly of the true God, nor is there a nation or religion that can claim, or at any rate prove, that it has been given the exclusive right to the Creator or sole knowledge of His Being.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: The foundation upon which our nation stands is much richer and firmer than the sympathies that may occasionally divide us. And we never know this more truly than in Christmas time. In good times or in bad, under clear skies or under the shadow of uncertainty, the Christmas message is the imperishable one of joy, hope and brotherhood.
life.author: Ferdinand Marcos

life.quote: If you practice hard, you can win every battle.
life.author: Manny Pacquiao

life.quote: I have sat at the sumptuous tables of power, but I have not run away with the silverware.
life.author: Diosdado Macapagal

life.quote: Man is multiplied by the number of languages he possesses and speaks.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: No, let us not make God in our image, poor inhabitants that we are of a distant planet lost in infinite space. However brilliant and sublime our intelligence may be, it is scarcely more than a small spark which shines and in an instant is extinguished, and it alone can give us no idea of that blaze, that conflagration, that ocean of light!
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: Your enemies hate you more than they hate your ideas. Should you want a project to be undone propose it. Even if it were as useful as a bishop's mire it would be rejected. Once you are defeated let the humblest-looking among you sponsor it and your enemies to humble you will approve it.
life.author: Jose Rizal

life.quote: Even in my prime, I need God in my life because without God, we're nothing.
life.author: Manny Pacquiao

life.quote: I hated the brutality, the sadism, and the insanity of Nazism. I just couldn't stand by and see people destroyed. I did what I could, what I had to do, what my conscience told me I must do. That's all there is to it. Really, nothing more.
life.author: Oskar Schindler

life.quote: The man hunched over his motorcycle can focus only on the present... he is caught in a fragment of time cut off from both the past and the future... he has no fear, because the source of fear is in the future, and a person freed of the future has nothing to fear.
life.author: Milan Kundera

life.quote: Power is when you have every justification to kill someone, and then you don't.
life.author: Oskar Schindler

life.quote: I knew the people who worked for me. When you know people, you have to behave towards them like human beings.
life.author: Oskar Schindler

life.quote: The first step in liquidating a people is to erase its memory. Destroy its books, its culture, its history. Then have somebody write new books, manufacture a new culture, invent a new history. Before long that nation will begin to forget what it is and what it was... The struggle of man against power is the struggle of memory against forgetting.
life.author: Milan Kundera

life.quote: I had to help them. There was no choice.
life.author: Oskar Schindler

life.quote: The desire to create is one of the deepest yearnings of the human soul.
life.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

life.quote: Our destiny is not determined by the number of times we stumble but by the number of times we rise up, dust ourselves off, and move forward.
life.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

life.quote: It is not enough to stare up the steps, we must step up the stairs.
life.author: Vaclav Havel

life.quote: Rejoice, that the immortal God is born, so that mortal men may live in eternity.
life.author: Jan Hus

life.quote: When it comes to hating, gossiping, ignoring, ridiculing, holding grudges, or wanting to cause harm, please apply the following: Stop it!
life.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

life.quote: The Greek word for "return" is nostos. Algos means "suffering." So nostalgia is the suffering caused by an unappeased yearning to return.
life.author: Milan Kundera

life.quote: No matter our circumstances, no matter our challenges or trials, there is something in each day to embrace and cherish. There is something in each day that can bring gratitude and joy if only we will see and appreciate it.
life.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

life.quote: We can choose to be grateful no matter what.
life.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

life.quote: Human rights are universal and indivisible. Human freedom is also indivisible: if it is denied to anyone in the world, it is therefore denied, indirectly, to all people. This is why we cannot remain silent in the face of evil or violence; silence merely encourages them.
life.author: Vaclav Havel

life.quote: As for antichrist occupying the papal chair, it is evident that a pope living contrary to Christ, like any other perverted person, is called, by common consent, antichrist.
life.author: Jan Hus

life.quote: Therefore, faithful Christian, seek the truth, listen to the truth, learn the truth, love the truth, tell the truth, learn the truth, defend the truth even to death.
life.author: Jan Hus

life.quote: People are always shouting they want to create a better future. It's not true. The future is an apathetic void of no interest to anyone. The past is full of life, eager to irritate us, provoke and insult us, tempt us to destroy or repaint it. The only reason people want to be masters of the future is to change the past.
life.author: Milan Kundera

life.quote: Love the truth. Let others have their truth, and the truth will prevail.
life.author: Jan Hus

life.quote: The heavens will not be filled with those who never made mistakes but with those who recognized that they were off course and who corrected their ways to get back in the light of gospel truth.
life.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

life.quote: Doubt your doubts before you doubt your faith.
life.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

life.quote: Though we are incomplete, God loves us completely. Though we are imperfect, He loves us perfectly. Though we may feel lost and without compass, God's love encompasses us completely. ... He loves every one of us, even those who are flawed, rejected, awkward, sorrowful, or broken.
life.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

life.quote: The basis of shame is not some personal mistake of ours, but the ignominy, the humiliation we feel that we must be what we are without any choice in the matter, and that this humiliation is seen by everyone.
life.author: Milan Kundera

life.quote: There is a certain part of all of us that lives outside of time. Perhaps we become aware of our age only at exceptional moments and most of the time we are ageless.
life.author: Milan Kundera

life.quote: I trust in the Lord God Almighty ... that he will not take away from me the cup of his redemption, but firmly hope to drink from it today in his kingdom.
life.author: Jan Hus

life.quote: On my birthday, I was in Milan for the collections.
life.author: Eva Herzigova

life.quote: We cannot stop natural disasters but we can arm ourselves with knowledge: so many lives wouldn't have to be lost if there was enough disaster preparedness.
life.author: Petra Nemcova

life.quote: It is your reaction to adversity, not the adversity itself, that determines how your life’s story will develop.
life.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

life.quote: Spring and summer 1942 was probably the worst period of internal terror in Slovakia. It was also the time of mass deportation of Slovak Jews to the extermination camps in Poland.
life.author: Alexander Dubcek

life.quote: Dreaming is not merely an act of communication; it is also an aesthetic activity, a game of the imagination, a game that is a value in itself.
life.author: Milan Kundera

life.quote: Genuine politics -- even politics worthy of the name -- the only politics I am willing to devote myself to -- is simply a matter of serving those around us: serving the community and serving those who will come after us. Its deepest roots are moral because it is a responsibility expressed through action, to and for the whole.
life.author: Vaclav Havel

life.quote: We cannot go back in time and change the past, but we can repent. The Savior can wipe away our tears of regret and remove the burden of our sins. His Atonement allows us to leave the past behind and move forward with clean hands, a pure heart, and a determination to do better and especially to become better.
life.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

life.quote: The perfect place to begin is exactly where you are right now.
life.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

life.quote: I'm glad you're doing this story on us and not on the WNBA. We're so much prettier than all the other women in sports.
life.author: Martina Hingis

life.quote: Modern man must descend the spiral of his own absurdity to the lowest point; only then can he look beyond it. It is obviously impossible to get around it, jump over it, or simply avoid it.
life.author: Vaclav Havel

life.quote: Her drama was a drama not of heaviness but of lightness. What fell to her lot was not the burden but the unbearable lightness of being.
life.author: Milan Kundera

life.quote: Since we humans have the better brain, isn't it our responsibility to protect our fellow creatures from, oddly enough, ourselves?
life.author: Joy Adamson

life.quote: Nothing is more powerful than individuals acting out of their own conscience.
life.author: Vaclav Havel

life.quote: I understand you, and I shall not attempt to make you change your mind. I am too old to want to improve the world. I have told you what I think, and that is all. I shall remain your friend even if you act contrary to my convictions, and I shall help you even if I disagree with you.
life.author: Milan Kundera

life.quote: O God and Lord, now the council condemns even Your own act and Your own law as heresy, since You Yourself did lay Your cause before Your Father as the just judge, as an example for us, whenever we are sorely oppressed.
life.author: Jan Hus

life.quote: The worst thing is not that the world is unfree, but that people have unlearned their liberty.
life.author: Milan Kundera

life.quote: When the heart speaks, the mind finds it indecent to object.
life.author: Milan Kundera

life.quote: Making love with a woman and sleeping with a woman are two separate passions, not merely different but opposite. Love does not make itself felt in the desire for copulation (a desire that extends to an infinite number of women) but in the desire for shared sleep (a desire limited to one woman).
life.author: Milan Kundera

life.quote: I do pottery. I love it. It's very relaxing; it takes me to another planet.
life.author: Eva Herzigova

life.quote: If the javelin had hit me 10cm to the left, it would have punctured my lung, 20cm higher the throat, which would have been the worst-case scenario. Just 1cm higher and it would have hit bone, muscle and tendon and that would have been the end of my sporting career.
life.author: Roman Sebrle

life.quote: For many years I enjoyed the pleasure of cruising on my yacht all summer long and these were my best holidays. In mid-May, we'd start in St Tropez. I'd collect my bikinis from my home there and then we'd go up to Cannes for the Film Festival, on to Monte Carlo for the Grand Prix and then to Italy.
life.author: Ivana Trump

life.quote: I feel that the dormant goodwill in people needs to be stirred. People need to hear that it makes sense to behave decently or to help others, to place common interests above their own, to respect the elementary rules of human coexistence.
life.author: Vaclav Havel

life.quote: Wherever you are, whatever your circumstances may be, you are not forgotten. No matter how dark your days may seem, no matter how insignificant you may feel, no matter how overshadowed you think you may be, your Heavenly Father has not forgotten you. In fact, He loves you with an infinite love.
life.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

life.quote: We don’t discover humility by thinking less of ourselves; we discover humility by thinking less about ourselves.
life.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

life.quote: Mankind's true moral test, its fundamental test (which lies deeply buried from view), consists of its attitude towards those who are at its mercy: animals. And in this respect mankind has suffered a fundamental debacle, a debacle so fundamental that all others stem from it.
life.author: Milan Kundera

life.quote: Gorgeous hair is the best revenge.
life.author: Ivana Trump

life.quote: I looked at my shoulder and saw a javelin stuck in it. I was in shock.
life.author: Roman Sebrle

life.quote: You can never fall in love with a team.
life.author: David Ortiz

life.quote: My timing’s a little off. But I’m about to get hotter than Jamaica in the middle of August.
life.author: David Ortiz

life.quote: I believe that if you're healthy, you're capable of doing everything. There's no one else who can give you health but God, and by being healthy I believe that God is listening to me.
life.author: Pedro Martinez

life.quote: Be the designer of your own destiny.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: It’s not about what you wear, but about how you live your life
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: Every day you have to reinvent yourself
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: The qualities I most admire in women are confidence and kindness.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: A fragrance is like a signature, so that even after a woman leaves the room, her fragrance should reveal she's been there.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: You have to appreciate every single day that you're alive. Life is a little bit like a garden - you have to find time to plant the seeds for beautiful flowers to grow.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: Style begins by looking good naked
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: Life is a challenge that you need. There's things in life that are going to throw you into the ground, but if you learn how to get up, that means you are not a quitter.
life.author: David Ortiz

life.quote: Fashion is about dressing according to what's fashionable. Style is more about being yourself.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: Walk like you have three men walking behind you.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: You can sum up the game of baseball in one word: 'You never know.'
life.author: Joaquin Andujar

life.quote: Silk does for the body what diamonds do for the hand.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: The well dressed man never stands out in a crowd; his elegance sets him apart.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: Elegance is a discipline of life.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: A woman makes an outfit her own with accessories.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: Never,ever confuse what happens on a runway with fashion. A runway is spectacle. It's only fashion when a woman puts it on. Being well dressed hasn't much to do with having good clothes. It's a question of good balance and good common sense.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: A runway is spectacle. It’s only fashion when a woman puts it on.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: When I was a boy, I thought scent was contained in dewdrops on flowers and if I got up very early in the morning, I could collect it and make perfume.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: My great strength is knowing who I am and where I come from - my island.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: I want to make clothes that people will wear, not styles that will make a big splash on the runway.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: They pick me [to be tested for steroids] every time. I don't know why. I don't know if it's because I'm a big guy, or what, but all I know is all they are going to find is a lot of rice and beans.
life.author: David Ortiz

life.quote: Fashions change and with rare exception are forgotten by the public. But the classic fragrances, like an invisible dress, endure. Fragrance must be introduced properly. A fragrance is like a signature, so that even after a woman leaves the room, her fragrance should reveal she's been there.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: I'm a winner, I play to win, I want to make good things go on around me.
life.author: David Ortiz

life.quote: I just want to play baseball.
life.author: David Ortiz

life.quote: You don't need an introduction to succeed in life. You need to have good work. Work hard. Believe in yourself
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: My mom, she wasn't like a baseball mother who knew everything about the game. She just wanted me to be happy with what I was doing.
life.author: David Ortiz

life.quote: There was always something missing in Montreal.
life.author: Pedro Martinez

life.quote: Fashion is a trend, style is within a person.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: Today, there is no fashion, really. There are just... choices. Women dress today to reveal their personalities. They used to reveal the designer's personality. Until the 70s, women listened to designers. Now women want to do it their own way. There are no boundaries. And without boundaries, there is no fashion.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: If the shortstop makes an error, I am responsible. I let the batter hit the ball.
life.author: Pedro Martinez

life.quote: Now is the most exciting time in fashion. Women are controlling their destiny now, the consumer is more knowledgeable, and I have to be better every single day.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: We live in an era of globalization and the era of the woman. Never in the history of the world have women been more in control of their destiny.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: The most important thing? Perfect lighting at all times.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: Gardening is how I relax. It's another form of creating and playing with colors.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: I always say: To be well dressed you must be well naked.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: I'm going to be done when I've decided that I'm done.
life.author: David Ortiz

life.quote: I just love the feeling from the fans and when I'm walking on deck I can hear people screaming and wishing you the best. That puts you into the game more than anything.
life.author: David Ortiz

life.quote: How can I play baseball if I'm stupid? If I was stupid I wouldn't have pitched in the World Series. I'd be playing ball in Mexico or Yugoslavia or on Pluto.
life.author: Joaquin Andujar

life.quote: I showed people that it's not about guessing what people can do. It's about saying, 'Here, show me what you can do.'
life.author: David Ortiz

life.quote: I am not interested in shock tactics. I just want to make beautiful clothes.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: Everybody goes through some tough times in their life, no matter what you do. Man, I've had my tough times.
life.author: David Ortiz

life.quote: I don't try to hit the ball 500 feet. It looks good when you hit it 500 feet, but as long as it goes over the fence, it's a home run. When you swing hard, it takes a little bit of recognition away from you. The power you're trying to increase - you're not all the way through it with your vision.
life.author: David Ortiz

life.quote: I'm a very restless person. I'm always doing something. The creative process never stops.
life.author: Oscar de la Renta

life.quote: I come to play everyday.
life.author: David Ortiz

life.quote: I throw the ball ninety-two miles an hour, but they hit it back just as hard.
life.author: Joaquin Andujar

life.quote: I get a lot of kids distracted. Sometimes they got to go cover left field, but they're over here talking to me, getting an autograph.
life.author: Pedro Martinez

life.quote: I'm thankful for not ever taking anything illegal.
life.author: Pedro Martinez

life.quote: Actually the adrenaline of the game will probably help me out a little bit to regain command and concentration about the things that I have to do.
life.author: Pedro Martinez

life.quote: Forgiving is not forgetting. Forgiving is remembering without pain.
life.author: Celia Cruz

life.quote: Socialist ideology, like so many others, has two main dangers. One stems from confused and incomplete readings of foreign texts, and the other from the arrogance and hidden rage of those who, in order to climb up in the world, pretend to be frantic defenders of the helpless so as to have shoulders on which to stand.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: Liberty is the right of every man to be honest, to think and to speak without hypocrisy.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: Other famous men, those of much talk and few deeds, soon evaporate. Action is the dignity of greatness.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: Happiness exists on earth, and it is won through prudent exercise of reason, knowledge of the harmony of the universe, and constant practice of generosity.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: We are free, but not to be evil, not to be indifferent to human suffering, not to profit from the people, from the work created and sustained through their spirit of political association, while refusing to contribute to the political state that we profit from.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: To busy oneself with what is futile when one can do something useful, to attend to what is simple when one has the mettle to attempt what is difficult, is to strip talent of its dignity.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: It is my duty to prevent, through the independence of Cuba, the U.S.A. from spreading over the West Indies and falling with addedweight upon other lands of Our America. All I have done up to now and shall do hereafter is to that end.... I know the Monster, because I have lived in its lair--and my weapon is only the slingshot of David.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: In a time of crisis, the peoples of the world must rush to get to know each other.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: Amor cuerdo, no es amor. (Sane love, is not love)
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: Only those who spread treachery, fire, and death out of hatred for the prosperity of others are undeserving of pity.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: One revolution is still necessary: the one that will not end with the rule of its leader. It will be the revolution against revolutions, the uprising of all peaceable individuals, who will become soldiers for once so that neither they nor anyone else will ever have to be a soldier again.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: "Racist" is a confusing word, and it should be clarified. Men have no special rights simply because they belong to one race or another. When you say "men," you have already imbued them with all their rights.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: Men of action, above all those whose actions are guided by love, live forever.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: Are we to say that any individual who's on steroids that has an angry moment is due to steroids? What about the individual who gets angry and kills someone who's not on steroids? What do we blame it on now?
life.author: Jose Canseco

life.quote: But when women are moved and lend help, when women, who are by nature calm and controlled, give encouragement and applause, when virtuous and knowledgeable women grace the endeavor with their sweet love, then it is invincible.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: I love sitting down and talking to people. CNBC gave me a chance to do it in a way that I liked. They gave me a chance to also develop the skills to learn from my mistakes.
life.author: Daisy Fuentes

life.quote: I was never a true journalist, I was a movie critic.
life.author: Guillermo Cabrera Infante

life.quote: A good smoker, like a good lover, always takes his time with a cigar.
life.author: Guillermo Cabrera Infante

life.quote: Culture, which makes talent shine, is not completely ours either, nor can we place it solely at our disposal. Rather, it belongs mainly to our country, which gave it to us, and to humanity, from which we receive it as a birthright.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: Singing is my life. It has always been my life. It will always be my life.
life.author: Celia Cruz

life.quote: Like bones to the human body, the axle to the wheel, the wing to the bird, and the air to the wing, so is liberty the essence of life. Whatever is done without it is imperfect.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: The beauty of women was the first expression of my photography.
life.author: Alberto Korda

life.quote: I just smoked a Cohiba the other day. It was great. You have to appreciate everything that cigar is.
life.author: Daisy Fuentes

life.quote: I always clean before the cleaning lady comes. If not, when I come home, I can't find anything. Cleaning ladies are always hiding things you leave out.
life.author: Celia Cruz

life.quote: If you want to achieve a high goal, you're going to have to take some chances.
life.author: Alberto Salazar

life.quote: I had as many doubts as anyone else. Standing on the starting line, we're all cowards.
life.author: Alberto Salazar

life.quote: You would give up your career if you lost your voice for good, or if the impresarios stopped calling, or the audiences stopped coming. But as long as those things are there, I don't plan to stop. There is nothing that makes me feel better than to be with my public.
life.author: Celia Cruz

life.quote: Steroids, used correctly, will not only make you stronger and sexier, they will also make you healthier.
life.author: Jose Canseco

life.quote: When I write, the first blank page, or any blank page, means nothing to me. What means something is a page that has been filled with words.
life.author: Guillermo Cabrera Infante

life.quote: I think that I've tried many times to get Cuba in my writings, especially Havana, which was once a great and fascinating city.
life.author: Guillermo Cabrera Infante

life.quote: Do something useful and you will have everything you want. Doors are shut for those who are dull and lazy; life is secure for those who obey the law of work.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: If I don't work, I'll be sitting on the couch watching TV, eating popcorn and getting like a cow.
life.author: Celia Cruz

life.quote: My mother had been educated at a convent, and she had been converted to communism by my father during Stalin's most rampant period, at the beginning of the 1930s. So she had two gods, God in heaven and god on earth.
life.author: Guillermo Cabrera Infante

life.quote: If I survive, I will spend my whole life at the oven door seeing that no one is denied bread and, so as to give a lesson of charity, especially those who did not bring flour.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: Cigars must be smoked one at a time, peaceably, with all the leisure in the world. Cigarettes are of the instant, Cigars are for eternity.
life.author: Guillermo Cabrera Infante

life.quote: Early in my career I was accused of being overconfident and even cocky, but I really was confident that I had done the training and didn't see any other reason to say otherwise.
life.author: Alberto Salazar

life.quote: Forget the camera, forget the lens, forget all of that. With any four-dollar camera, you can capture the best picture.
life.author: Alberto Korda

life.quote: A selfish man is a thief.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: Day and night I always dream with open eyes." - José Martí
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: To Educate is to Free.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: Let those who desire a secure homeland conquer it. Let those who do not conquer it live under the whip and in exile, watched over like wild animals, cast from one country to another, concealing the death of their souls with a beggar's smile from the scorn of free men.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: Fits did not go over well in my house. There was a lot of discipline and obedience and you had to be very ladylike. Ladies didn't curse and I still don't curse in front of my parents.
life.author: Daisy Fuentes

life.quote: An athlete who tells you the training is always easy and always fun simply hasn't been there. Goals can be elusive which makes the difficult journey all the more rewarding.
life.author: Alberto Salazar

life.quote: Hatred, slavery's inevitable aftermath.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: I'm doing great heart-wise. I get a complete stress test once a year, and those have gone well. I have stents in two arteries, and they are holding up. My other arteries haven't shown any additional clogging.
life.author: Alberto Salazar

life.quote: Like stones rolling down hills, fair ideas reach their objectives despite all obstacles and barriers. It may be possible to speed or hinder them, but impossible to stop them.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: It is necessary to make virtue fashionable.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: It is a sin not to do what one is capable of doing.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: He who could have been a torch and stoops to being a pair of jaws is a deserter.
life.author: Jose Marti

life.quote: We need to reach that happy stage of our development when differences and diversity are not seen as sources of division and distrust, but of strength and inspiration.
life.author: Josefa Iloilo

life.quote: I want to play golf, practice and not do much else. I don't drink, I don't smoke and I hate going places where you have to yell at someone who is about a foot away from you.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: If I can hit the ball the way I want to hit it on the range, I'd rather do that than play golf. I just love the feeling of hitting good golf shots.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: Golf is a passion that will stay with me forever. That's all I know.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: Maybe I should write 'Tiger Who?' on my cap.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: I open the driving range and I close it. I thought you ought to know that I work hard. I like practising. I enjoy it. If I did not enjoy it I would not do it. What is the point of going back to the hotel, having a drink and talking a load of bull?
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: You win one and then you win another. You feel more comfortable and more confident, and it snowballs. You can't wait to get to the next hole and play better.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: It doesn't much concern me if Tiger plays in the tournament or no.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: He started pushing to make birdies and you don't do that when you're down.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: When they say America is the land of opportunity, it's true. If you work hard, people appreciate you.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: I am proud of my achievements, my work ethic, and the way I live my life. The PGA Tour not only treated me unfairly, but displayed a lack of professionalism that should concern every professional golfer and fan of the game.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: There are probably guys who could be superstars but aren't because they didn't work at it.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: My journey has been a very slow build-up. Each year has been a step upward. I've never actually gone backward.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: I'm going to go out and play really hard. If I have another win, it will be icing on the cake. But I don't take anything for granted.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: A well balanced, inclusive approach, according to certain standards and ideals, is essential for the proper governance of any country.
life.author: Laisenia Qarase

life.quote: I will, from this day strive to forge togetherness out of our differences.
life.author: Josefa Iloilo

life.quote: A well balanced, inclusive approach, is essential for the proper government of any country.
life.author: Laisenia Qarase

life.quote: Golf is about knowledge, and studying another player - more than listening to a teacher - is the best way to get it.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: The way you play, you need to talk about winning. Don't talk about keeping your card - talk about winning.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: It's like getting the Williams sisters to play (tennis) against a man, and they're far better athletes than she (Sorenstam) is.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: Dr. Parent has been a great influence on my mental game. ZEN GOLF is the best book at connecting golf and the mind together. It's for everyone, it really helps, and you're really going to enjoy it.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: The more they made noise, the more calm I became.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: The green is so narrow that if you over-club, you've got an impossible bunker shot. If you're short, you're pretty much dead.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: I think we have arrived at the stage where we are making it too complicated. I know guys who can't play two rounds before running to their teachers.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: In my heart I know what kind of person I am, and that's good enough.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: I can honestly say that in my time in America, I have not encountered any racism. When Jim Thorpe and I make fun of each other on the range, or even when a white player makes a joke about my color, I take it as what it is-a joke-and give it back accordingly.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: I have this reputation of not wanting to talk to the media, which isn't true. What I don't like-what a lot of us don't understand-is how we can say one thing and it turns up in print as something else.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: I have a lot of friends, in and out of golf, and there is a mutual trust. I'm very serious at the course. Maybe if I joked around more around the press tent, your image of me would be different. But that's not me. And the golf course is my office. If I come up to you when you're writing a story, are you going to drop everything to talk? Or are you going to say you're too busy doing your job?
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: The people who know me, the people who see the passion I have for this game and the respect for it, they know that I don't cut any corners in the way I approach golf.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: Galleries are nice to me. I sign a lot of autographs.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: If I don't like someone, I'll let that person know. I'm not very diplomatic. I understand that.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: Sometimes, we should maybe sit back and look at all we have. It's because of golf and the tour. I mean, this life we lead is unbelievable.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: I'd like to have a little better relationship with the media. It's just that I don't think the media is comfortable with me.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: Whenever you're in a position to win, you don't want to let it go.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: I just play the game. I hit a shot and wait for the next guy to hit his. I don't think between shots-that's my nature.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: It never really crossed my mind that I was ever going to win a major. I always said that if you win a major, that's fine. If you don't, you tried your best.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: I've learned so much through life. Starting off in Asia, the cultures, the people you meet, the poverty you see. It's been a great education for me, and I've loved every minute of it.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: I've won a lot of times with my wife and son here, and I've won solo. I don't think there's a formula for when the come out and when they don't I'm simply happy to win.
life.author: Vijay Singh

life.quote: I have always felt that public, commercial and community organisations should be as open as possible about their affairs. They need to be accountable to their owners, their customers, their members and communities and other interest groups.
life.author: Laisenia Qarase

life.quote: The old world is dying, and the new world struggles to be born; now is the time of monsters
life.author: Antonio Gramsci

life.quote: The goal of early childhood education should be to activate the child's own natural desire to learn.
life.author: Maria Montessori

life.quote: To assist a child we must provide him with an environment which will enable him to develop freely.
life.author: Maria Montessori

life.quote: The most important period of life is not the age of university studies, but the first one, the period from birth to the age of six.
life.author: Maria Montessori

life.quote: The child who has felt a strong love for his surroundings and for all living creatures, who has discovered joy and enthusiasm in work, gives us reason to hope that humanity can develop in a new direction.
life.author: Maria Montessori

life.quote: Peace is what every human being is craving for, and it can be brought about by humanity through the child.
life.author: Maria Montessori

life.quote: It had long since come to my attention that people of accomplishment rarely sat back and let things happen to them. They went out and happened to things.
life.author: Leonardo da Vinci

life.quote: We shall walk together on this path of life, for all things are part of the universe and are connected with each other to form one whole unity.
life.author: Maria Montessori

life.quote: Free the child's potential, and you will transform him into the world.
life.author: Maria Montessori

life.quote: Remember that when you leave this earth, you can take with you nothing that you have received - only what you have given: a full heart, enriched by honest service, love, sacrifice and courage.
life.author: Francis of Assisi

life.quote: Our aim is not merely to make the child understand, and still less to force him to memorize, but so to touch his imagination as to enthuse him to his innermost core.
life.author: Maria Montessori

life.quote: The senses, being the explorers of the world, open the way to knowledge.
life.author: Maria Montessori

life.quote: Lord, help me to live this day, quietly, easily. To lean upon Thy great strength, trustfully, restfully. To wait for the unfolding of Thy will, patiently, serenely. To meet others, peacefully, joyously. To face tomorrow, confidently, courageously.
life.author: Francis of Assisi

life.quote: All our knowledge has its origin in our perceptions.
life.author: Leonardo da Vinci

life.quote: God requires that we assist the animals, when they need our help. Each being (human or creature) has the same right of protection.
life.author: Francis of Assisi

life.quote: What the hand does the mind remembers.
life.author: Maria Montessori

life.quote: All the darkness in the world cannot extinguish the light of a single candle.
life.author: Francis of Assisi

life.quote: All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered; the point is to discover them.
life.author: Galileo Galilei

life.quote: Ask the beasts and they will teach you the beauty of this earth.
life.author: Francis of Assisi

life.quote: What do you have to fear? Nothing. Whom do you have to fear? No one. Why? Because whoever has joined forces with God obtains three great privileges: omnipotence without power, intoxication without wine, and life without death.
life.author: Francis of Assisi

life.quote: I've loved the stars too fondly to be fearful of the night.
life.author: Galileo Galilei

life.quote: All things of creation are children of the Father and thus brothers of man. ... God wants us to help animals, if they need help. Every creature in distress has the same right to be protected.
life.author: Francis of Assisi

life.quote: Any child who is self-sufficient, who can tie his shoes, dress or undress himself, reflects in his joy and sense of achievement the image of human dignity which is derived from a sense of independence.
life.author: Maria Montessori

life.quote: He who works with his hands and his head and his heart is an artist
life.author: Francis of Assisi

life.quote: If I advance; follow me. If I retreat; kill me. If I die; avenge me! It is better to live one day as a lion than one-hundred years as a sheep!
life.author: Benito Mussolini

life.quote: If you have men who will exclude any of God's creatures from the shelter of compassion and pity, you will have men who will deal likewise with their fellow men.
life.author: Francis of Assisi

life.quote: I have never met a man so ignorant that I couldn't learn something from him.
life.author: Galileo Galilei

life.quote: Never help a child with a task at which he feels he can succeed.
life.author: Maria Montessori

life.quote: The first method for estimating the intelligence of a ruler is to look at the men he has around him.
life.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

life.quote: Not to hurt our humble brethren is our first duty to them, but to stop there is not enough. We have a higher mission - to be of service to them whenever they require it.
life.author: Francis of Assisi

life.quote: The lion cannot protect himself from traps, and the fox cannot defend himself from wolves. One must therefore be a fox to recognize traps, and a lion to frighten wolves.
life.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

life.quote: The sun, with all those planets revolving around it and dependent on it, can still ripen a bunch of grapes as if it had nothing else in the universe to do.
life.author: Galileo Galilei

life.quote: The laws of nature are written by the hand of God in the language of mathematics.
life.author: Galileo Galilei

life.quote: The first essential for the child’s development is concentration. The child who concentrates is immensely happy.
life.author: Maria Montessori

life.quote: We cannot teach people anything; we can only help them discover it within themselves.
life.author: Galileo Galilei

life.quote: Play is the work of the child.
life.author: Maria Montessori

life.quote: Do few things but do them well, simple joys are holy.
life.author: Francis of Assisi

life.quote: The child is truly a miraculous being, and this should be felt deeply by the educator.
life.author: Maria Montessori

life.quote: Knowing thyself, that is the greatest wisdom.
life.author: Galileo Galilei

life.quote: I desire to go to Hell and not to Heaven. In the former I shall enjoy the company of popes, kings and princes, while in the latter are only beggars, monks and apostles
life.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

life.quote: Children are human beings to whom respect is due, superior to us by reason of their innocence and of the greater possibilities of their future.
life.author: Maria Montessori

life.quote: To create something exceptional, your mindset must be relentlessly focused on the smallest detail.
life.author: Giorgio Armani

life.quote: The press of Italy is free, freer than the press of any other country, so long as it supports the regime.
life.author: Benito Mussolini

life.quote: The greater danger for most of us lies not in setting our aim too high and falling short; but in setting our aim too low, and achieving our mark.
life.author: Michelangelo

life.quote: Education cannot be effective unless it helps a child to open up himself to life.
life.author: Maria Montessori

life.quote: To be humane, we must ever be ready to pronounce that wise, ingenious and modest statement 'I do not know'.
life.author: Galileo Galilei

life.quote: Yes, a dictator can be loved. Provided that the masses fear him at the same time. The crowd love strong men. The crowd is like a woman.
life.author: Benito Mussolini

life.quote: To make a perfume, take some rose water and wash your hands in it, then take a lavender flower and rub it with your palms, and you will achieve the desired effect
life.author: Leonardo da Vinci

life.quote: Mistakes are part of the dues that one pays for a full life.
life.author: Sophia Loren

life.quote: The greatest danger for most of us is not that our aim is too high and we miss it, but that it is too low and we reach it.
life.author: Michelangelo

life.quote: Being willing is not enough. We must do.
life.author: Leonardo da Vinci

life.quote: Race? It is a feeling, not a reality. Ninety-five per cent, at least. Nothing will ever make me believe that biologically pure races can be shown to exist today.... National pride has no need of the delirium of race.
life.author: Benito Mussolini

life.quote: Mathematics is the language with which God has written the universe.
life.author: Galileo Galilei

life.quote: I try to have a different relationship with the bike. I don't give it a name, but I always speak with it. I don't know if the other riders do the same. This is not only a piece of metal - there is a soul. The bike talks back too. But not with a voice, with the components
life.author: Valentino Rossi

life.quote: The most important thing is to have a good relationship with the bike... you have to understand what she wants. I think of a motorcycle as a woman, and I know that sounds silly, but it's true.
life.author: Valentino Rossi

life.quote: Everyone sees what you appear to be, few experience what you really are.
life.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

life.quote: One test of the correctness of educational procedure is the happiness of the child.
life.author: Maria Montessori

life.quote: The things that we love tell us what we are.
life.author: Thomas Aquinas

life.quote: There are two days in the year that we can not do anything, yesterday and tomorrow
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: One individual may die for an idea, but that idea will, after his death, incarnate itself in a thousand lives.
life.author: Subhas Chandra Bose

life.quote: Everything is easy when you are busy. But nothing is easy when you are lazy.
life.author: Swami Vivekananda

life.quote: They may kill me, but they cannot kill my ideas. They can crush my body, but they will not be able to crush my spirit.
life.author: Bhagat Singh

life.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: No real change in history has ever been achieved by discussions.
life.author: Subhas Chandra Bose

life.quote: You can't change how people treat you or what they say about you. All you can do is change how you react to it.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: It is our duty to pay for our liberty with our own blood. The freedom that we shall win through our sacrifice and exertions, we shall be able to preserve with our own strength.
life.author: Subhas Chandra Bose

life.quote: I don't believe in taking right decisions. I take decisions and then make them right.
life.author: Ratan Tata

life.quote: Take Risks in Your Life If you Win, U Can Lead! If You Lose, You can Guide!
life.author: Swami Vivekananda

life.quote: If you want to change the world, start with yourself.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: Ups and downs in life are very important to keep us going, because a straight line even in an ECG means we are not alive
life.author: Ratan Tata

life.quote: If you cry because the sun has gone out of your life, your tears will prevent you from seeing the stars.
life.author: Rabindranath Tagore

life.quote: None can destroy iron, but its own rust can! Likewise none can destroy a person, but its own mindset can!
life.author: Ratan Tata

life.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: Seven Deadly Sins Wealth without work Pleasure without conscience Science without humanity Knowledge without character Politics without principle Commerce without morality Worship without sacrifice.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life - think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
life.author: Swami Vivekananda

life.quote: I will not let anyone walk through my mind with their dirty feet.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: Expansion is life, contraction is death. Love is life, hatred is death.
life.author: Swami Vivekananda

life.quote: The future depends on what we do in the present.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: Take the stones people throw at you, and use them to build a monument
life.author: Ratan Tata

life.quote: Love always elevates the character of man. It never lowers him, provided love be love
life.author: Bhagat Singh

life.quote: Clouds come floating into my life from other days no longer to shed rain or usher storm but to give colour to my sunset sky.
life.author: Rabindranath Tagore

life.quote: Allow failure to teach you A supreme lesson: Each sunset is the beginning Of a very, very bright And powerful sunrise.
life.author: Sri Chinmoy

life.quote: When I admire the wonders of a sunset or the beauty of the moon, my soul expands in the worship of the creator.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: Speak only if it improves upon the silence.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: You may never know what results come of your actions, but if you do nothing, there will be no results.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: Listen to the inner light;It will guide you.Listen to the inner Peace;It will feed you.Listen to the inner Love;It will transform you,It will divinise you,It will immortalise you.
life.author: Sri Chinmoy

life.quote: My grandfather once told me that there were two kinds of people: those who do the work and those who take the credit. He told me to try to be in the first group; there was much less competition.
life.author: Indira Gandhi

life.quote: Happiness is your nature. It is not wrong to desire it. What is wrong is seeking it outside when it is inside.
life.author: Ramana Maharshi

life.quote: Where the mind is without fear and the head is held high Where knowledge is free.
life.author: Rabindranath Tagore

life.quote: Society does not go down because of the activities of criminals,But because of the inactivities of the good people.
life.author: Swami Vivekananda

life.quote: Keep your words positive because your words become your behavior.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: When we stand, the Azad Hind Fauz has to be like a wall of granite; when we march, the Azad Hind Fauz has to be like a steamroller.
life.author: Subhas Chandra Bose

life.quote: Correcting oneself is correcting the whole world. The Sun is simply bright. It does not correct anyone. Because it shines, the whole world is full of light. Transforming yourself is a means of giving light to the whole world.
life.author: Ramana Maharshi

life.quote: If you want to be sad, no one in the world can make you happy. But if you make up your mind to be happy, no one and nothing on earth can take that happiness from you.
life.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

life.quote: Whatever is destined not to happen will not happen, try as you may. Whatever is destined to happen will happen, do what you may to prevent it. This is certain. The best course, therefore, is to remain silent.
life.author: Ramana Maharshi

life.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: Reality is, after all, too big for our frail understanding to fully comprehend. Nevertheless, we have to build our life on the theory which contains the maximum truth.We cannot sit still because we cannot, or do not , know the Absolute Truth.
life.author: Subhas Chandra Bose

life.quote: It's easy to stand with the crowd. It takes courage to stand alone.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: It is our own mental attitude which makes the world what it is for us. Our thought make things beautiful, our thoughts make things ugly. The whole world is in our own minds. Learn to see things in the proper light.
life.author: Swami Vivekananda

life.quote: Any young man, who makes dowry a condition to marriage, discredits his education and his country and dishonours womanhood.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: As long as we require someone else to make us happy, we are slaves.
life.author: Swami Vivekananda

life.quote: You must not lose faith in humanity. Humanity is an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: The greatness of a nation and its moral progress can be judged by the way its animals are treated.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: The enemy is fear. We think it is hate; But, it is fear.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: Thoughts come and go. Feelings come and go. Find out what it is that remains.
life.author: Ramana Maharshi

life.quote: When I asked God for strength, He gave me difficult situations to face.
life.author: Swami Vivekananda

life.quote: Your true nature is that of infinite spirit. The feeling of limitation is the work of the mind.
life.author: Ramana Maharshi

life.quote: Change yourself and you have done your part in changing the world
life.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

life.quote: Revolution is an inalienable right of mankind. Freedom is an imperishable birth right of all. Labor is the real sustainer of society, the sovereignty of the ultimate destiny of the workers.
life.author: Bhagat Singh

life.quote: Merciless criticism and independent thinking are the two necessary traits of revolutionary thinking.
life.author: Bhagat Singh

life.quote: Keep your thoughts positive because your thoughts become your words.
life.author: Mahatma Gandhi

life.quote: Every tiny molecule of Ash is in motion with my heat I am such a Lunatic that I am free even in Jail.
life.author: Bhagat Singh

life.quote: Everything comes to us that belongs to us if we create the capacity to receive it.
life.author: Rabindranath Tagore

life.quote: It is an illusion that photos are made with the camera... they are made with the eye, heart and head.
life.author: Henri Cartier-Bresson

life.quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
life.author: Nicolas Chamfort

life.quote: When God wants to judge a nation, He gives them wicked rulers.
life.author: John Calvin

life.quote: There is nothing more musical than a sunset.
life.author: Claude Debussy

life.quote: If you want to know who controls you, look at who you are not allowed to criticize.
life.author: Voltaire

life.quote: The wise man doesn't give the right answers, he poses the right questions.
life.author: Claude Levi-Strauss

life.quote: Cherish those who seek the truth but beware of those who find it.
life.author: Voltaire

life.quote: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes.
life.author: Marcel Proust

life.quote: It is dangerous to be right in matters where established men are wrong.
life.author: Voltaire

life.quote: The reading of all good books is like a conversation with the finest minds of past centuries.
life.author: Rene Descartes

life.quote: The mirror is a worthless invention. The only way to truly see yourself is in the reflection of someone else's eyes.
life.author: Voltaire

life.quote: Courage isn't having the strength to go on - it is going on when you don't have strength.
life.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

life.quote: Nobody realizes that some people expend tremendous energy merely to be normal.
life.author: Albert Camus

life.quote: We are our choices.
life.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

life.quote: Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend.
life.author: Albert Camus

life.quote: Divide each difficulty into as many parts as is feasible and necessary to resolve it.
life.author: Rene Descartes

life.quote: Judge a man by his questions rather than by his answers.
life.author: Voltaire

life.quote: Give me the patience for the small things of life, courage for the great trials of life. Help me to do my best each day and then go to sleep knowing God is awake.
life.author: Voltaire

life.quote: Moses has revealed the existence of God to his nation. Jesus Christ to the Roman world, Muhammad to the old continent.
life.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

life.quote: Six hours' sleep for a man, seven for a woman, and eight for a fool.
life.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

life.quote: Only the guy who isn't rowing has time to rock the boat.
life.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

life.quote: Whenever anyone has offended me, I try to raise my soul so high that the offense cannot reach it.
life.author: Rene Descartes

life.quote: Each player must accept the cards life deals him or her: but once they are in hand, he or she alone must decide how to play the cards in order to win the game.
life.author: Voltaire

life.quote: The only way to deal with an unfree world is to become so absolutely free that your very existence is an act of rebellion.
life.author: Albert Camus

life.quote: We shall never be clothed with the righteousness of Christ except we first know assuredly that we have no righteousness of our own.
life.author: John Calvin

life.quote: The most important decision you make is to be in a good mood.
life.author: Voltaire

life.quote: I don't feel that it is necessary to know exactly what I am. The main interest in life and work is to become someone else that you were not in the beginning.
life.author: Michel Foucault

life.quote: Man cannot remake himself without suffering, for he is both the marble and the sculptor.
life.author: Alexis Carrel

life.quote: If you would be a real seeker after truth, it is necessary that at least once in your life you doubt, as far as possible, all things.
life.author: Rene Descartes

life.quote: Whatever a person may be like, we must still love them because we love God.
life.author: John Calvin

life.quote: In general, the art of government consists of taking as much money as possible from one class of citizens to give to another.
life.author: Voltaire

life.quote: To be happy we must not be too concerned with others.
life.author: Albert Camus

life.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for something you are not.
life.author: Andre Gide

life.quote: The reason people find it so hard to be happy is that they always see the past better than it was, the present worse than it is, and the future less resolved than it will be. French translation
life.author: Marcel Pagnol

life.quote: I disapprove of what you say, but I will defend to the death your right to say it.
life.author: Voltaire

life.quote: Prayer doesn't change things - God changes things in answer to prayer.
life.author: John Calvin

life.quote: Always go too far, because that's where you'll find the truth.
life.author: Albert Camus

life.quote: A dog barks when his master is attacked. I would be a coward if I saw that God's truth is attacked and yet would remain silent.
life.author: John Calvin

life.quote: Let us be grateful to the people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
life.author: Marcel Proust

life.quote: Where there is power, there is resistance.
life.author: Michel Foucault

life.quote: If I believe in God and life after death and you do not, and if there is no God, we both lose when we die. However, if there is a God, you still lose and I gain everything.
life.author: Blaise Pascal

life.quote: Never interrupt your enemy when they are making a mistake.
life.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

life.quote: Black as the devil, hot as hell, pure as an angel, sweet as love.
life.author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand

life.quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
life.author: Victor Hugo

life.quote: Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake.
life.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

life.quote: When we revolt it’s not for a particular culture. We revolt simply because, for many reasons, we can no longer breathe.
life.author: Frantz Fanon

life.quote: Until you spread your wings, you'll have no idea how far you can fly.
life.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

life.quote: The more I read, the more I acquire, the more certain I am that I know nothing.
life.author: Voltaire

life.quote: Courage isn't having the strength to go on - it is going on when you don't have strength.
life.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

life.quote: The only way to comprehend what mathematicians mean by Infinity is to contemplate the extent of human stupidity.
life.author: Voltaire

life.quote: Words are like eyeglasses they blur everything that they do not make clear.
