life.author: Joseph Joubert

life.quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
life.author: Andre Gide

life.quote: Do not wait for life. Do not long for it. Be aware, always and at every moment, that the miracle is in the here and now.
life.author: Marcel Proust

life.quote: Go forward bravely. Fear nothing. Trust in God; all will be well.
life.author: Joan of Arc

life.quote: Only those who have learned well to be earnestly dissatisfied with themselves, and to be confounded with shame at their wretchedness truly understand the Christian gospel.
life.author: John Calvin

life.quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
life.author: Andre Gide

life.quote: Anyone who has the power to make you believe absurdities has the power to make you commit injustices.
life.author: Voltaire

life.quote: History is a set of lies agreed upon.
life.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

life.quote: The spirit of Ubuntu, that once led Haiti to emerge as the first independent black nation in 1804, helped Venezuela, Colombia and Ecuador attain liberty, and inspired our forefathers to shed their blood for the United States' independence, cannot die. Today, this spirit of solidarity must and will empower all of us to rebuild Haiti.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: In order for peace to reign, one must speak the truth, and that is why I have spoken of a political abduction, ... ... Far from my own country, but in deep communion with all Haitians, including Haitians abroad, I continue to launch an appeal for peaceful resistance.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: As we all know, many people remain buried under tons of rubble and debris, waiting to be rescued. When we think of their suffering, we feel deeply and profoundly that we should be there, in Haiti, with them, trying our best to prevent death.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: If one suffers we all suffer. Togetherness is strength. Courage.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: It is the destiny of the people of Haiti to suffer.
life.author: Jean Claude Duvalier

life.quote: We shall prepare the coffee of reconciliation through the filter of justice. Through reconciliation, streams of tears will come to our eyes.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: As far as we are concerned, we are ready to leave today, tomorrow, at any time, to join the people of Haiti, to share in their suffering, help rebuild the country, moving from misery to poverty with dignity.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: I am confident that I can serve my country without being involved as the president of the country now.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: Of course, learning is strengthened and solidified when it occurs in a safe, secure and normal environment.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: I will work to bring peace to everyone - whatever economic level - as long as you are Haitian.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: Peace in the head, peace in the stomach.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: We have not reached the consensus that to eat is a basic human right. This is an ethical crisis. This is a crisis of faith.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: Pa gen lape nan tet, si pa gen lape nan vant (there is no peace in the head if there is no peace in the stomach).
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: I respect religion and will respect any religion.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: I am still the only elected president of the country.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: Thirty-two coups d'etat are enough.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: Chopped down the tree of peace, but it will grow again.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: We are all equal, rich and poor and we need a society where the people enjoy their rights.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: When we say democracy we have to mean what we say.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: Haitians don't like to say they are hungry because we are proud.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: We have problems which will be addressed by Haitians.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: We must all make peace so that we can all live in peace.
life.author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

life.quote: The president is here, strong and firm as a monkey's tail.
life.author: Jean Claude Duvalier

life.quote: I want to encourage our people, to educate our people to have the courage to understand and fight for their rights.
life.author: Megawati Sukarnoputri

life.quote: The PBSI (Indonesian Badminton Association) have to work harder to widen the pool and find quality players. The present indifferent culture has to change.
life.author: Taufik Hidayat

life.quote: Religion must guard us rather than sin, but how many sins are committed in the name of religion?
life.author: R.A. Kartini

life.quote: Many things can bring you down. But the only thing that can really bring you down is your own attitude.
life.author: R.A. Kartini

life.quote: Respect all life, its rights, feelings.
life.author: R.A. Kartini

life.quote: Women's inequality is a result of being restricted from women's access to knowledge so that women become fools.
life.author: R.A. Kartini

life.quote: We believe, if someone dares to start, many will follow.
life.author: R.A. Kartini

life.quote: And education must not only be sharpened, but also must be enhanced.
life.author: R.A. Kartini

life.quote: No matter how you go, don't get tired of trying hard to defend all that is good at all times.
life.author: R.A. Kartini

life.quote: Intellectual development is still not a diploma for decency.
life.author: R.A. Kartini

life.quote: If boys are selfish, then it is not their fault, it lies in their education, they are made that way. They got everything, maybe everything and what they didn't take, it's good for girls.
life.author: R.A. Kartini

life.quote: What is the use of forcing men to save money, if women who hold households do not know the price of that money!
life.author: R.A. Kartini

life.quote: The ideal is to beautify human dignity, glorify it, draw closer to Perfection.
life.author: R.A. Kartini

life.quote: Whoever doesn't dare, he won't win, that's my motto! Up! All must start with courage! Dares win three-quarters of the world!
life.author: R.A. Kartini

life.quote: Dream on, dream on, with such things your heart feels happy, will you not?
life.author: R.A. Kartini

life.quote: I hope the BWF (Badminton World Federation) will seriously do something about the Olympic qualifying format or risk getting badminton dropped from the Games.
life.author: Taufik Hidayat

life.quote: The African Union has to act in order to put an end to armed conflicts that undermine the continent, to fight against the devastation caused by AIDS and other contagious diseases, to promote sustainable development of its member states.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: The free market economy is supposed to be the only path leading to the happiness of humanity by promoting wealth and prosperity, power and influence of nations.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: It is not right to associate the fight against international terrorist networks with an imaginary crusade against Islam.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: Globalization, far from putting an end to power diplomacy between States, has, on the contrary, intensified it.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: The introduction of political pluralism often quickly led to bad results.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: Do not forget that the Arab countries, starting with Algeria and Egypt, are the ones that have paid the heaviest toll because of Islamic terror.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: The world is now aware that the most unavoidable and most dangerous weapon that exists is the blind decisiveness of a man ready to sacrifice his life for an obscure cause.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: The most powerful State in the world, which up to now was relatively protected from terrorist violence, is no longer an inviolable sanctuary.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: Economic sanctions rarely achieve the desired results.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: The principle of responsibility and collective sanctions is incompatible with the Western concept of justice.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: I am in favor of complete freedom of information and of free access to the new communication tools, in particular the Internet.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: Because the world is in economic recession, which worsened since this drama happened, and our country will bear the burden of all of these consequences.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: The shock caused by the September 11 events has also lead to a thorough reflection on the existing disparity between rich and poor countries, on the misery of populations of the South.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: But the Western countries that link their partnership with the poorest countries with respect for democracy also have to consider that they have obligations towards these countries.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: For about ten years now, the struggle for democracy and the respect of human rights has been in the focus point - if not a commodity - of political groups aiming to rise to power.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: I'm not aiming for the Nobel Peace Prize!
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: My actions to promote peace, the mediation missions which I carried out during many conflicts, which very often occurred between brothers of the same country, are not driven by any ulterior motives or any calculations based on personal ambitions.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: In spite of our poverty and our economic dependence, we do not have to give in, neither because we are sometimes abandoned nor because of the wish of some nations to impose their economic or political models.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: Instead of ideological objectives of a political nature, today we are faced with ideological objectives of economic nature.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: It is important to stress: Africa is also a victim of the September 11 attacks.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: In brief, Western democracy, as other political models, is not exportable to all regions of the world.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: Certainly, Africa accounts for only l % of world trade, and we cannot assure our development on our own.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: I think that candidates who have pending cases of blood crimes and economic crimes must be definitely banned.
life.author: Francois Bozize

life.quote: We do not control the trade of our resources, which are an important factor of prosperity for the dominant nations.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: But it is important to observe that when Europe or the United Nations impose sanctions that are supposed to be aimed against a certain regime, usually generally millions of people end up being directly punished.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: When they favor the access of other people to education and health care, the countries of the North not only demonstrate generosity or solidarity, but also implement the principles of respecting and promoting human rights.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: The resources of our continent attract, more than ever, the interests of rich countries.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: Information on the Internet must be as free as in the newspapers.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: There is an idea of democracy produced by one-sided thinking.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: In short, we have, among African countries, a duty of solidarity.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: But since independence, Gabon is one of the few countries in Central Africa that enjoys peace and stability.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: It is up to African leaders to show their will and political courage in order to assure that this new pan-African institution becomes an efficient instrument and not a place for endless discussions.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: The birth of the African Union should encourage us to reexamine relations between African States.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: If the Soviet Union and the United States have not experienced direct military confrontations, on the other hand, they supported, armed and trained Africans, to fight other Africans.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: From the time of independences until the end of the Cold War, in spite of the participation of a considerable number of African states in the non-aligned movement, everyone in fact chose to align with one or another of the two major blocks.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: Therefore, every country has to understand that fighting against international terrorism is not for the sake of the United States, but for the sake of themselves, and, to a larger extent, in the name of stability of international relations.
life.author: Omar Bongo

life.quote: Don't be attracted to easy paths because the paths that make your feet bleed are the only way to get ahead in life.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: Politics is when you say you are going to do one thing while intending to do another. Then you do neither what you said nor what you intended.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: Women make up one half of society. Our society will remain backward and in chains unless its women are liberated, enlightened and educated.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: I call on you not to hate, because hate does not leave space for a person to be fair and it makes you blind and closes all doors of thinking.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: Nothing worse than Kurds in your milk. General, make sure i never see another Kurd again.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: You Americans, you treat the Third World in the way an Iraqi peasant treats his new bride. Three days of honeymoon, and then it's off to the fields.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: Don?t make decisions in anger or humiliate an enemy after defeating him.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: The United States must get a taste of its own poison.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: The most important thing about marriage is that the man must not let the woman feel downtrodden simply because she is a woman and he is a man.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: Those who fight in God's cause will be victorious.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: Palestine is Arab and must be liberated from the river to the sea and all the Zionists who emigrated to the land of Palestine must leave.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: The oil is a gift bestowed by God on the Arab nation, to use after centuries of poverty, backwardness and servitude - in raising its living standards, developing its economic, social and cultural conditions, and building up its own power to meet the challenges and conspiracies besetting it.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: Allah is on our side. That is why we will beat the aggressor.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: We are ready to sacrifice our souls, our children and our families so as not to give up Iraq. We say this so no one will think that America is capable of breaking the will of the Iraqis with its weapons.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: The west need someone to tell the man who walks around with the biggest stick in the world, that that stick can`t bring down God`s house.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: The complete emancipation of women from the ties which held them back in the past, during the ages of despotism and ignorance, is a basic aim of the Party and the Revolution. Women make up one half of society. Our society will remain backward and in chains unless its women are liberated, enlightened and educated.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: Our children should be taught to beware of everything foreign and not to disclose any state or party secrets to foreigners... for foreigners are eyes for their countries, and some of them are counterrevolutionary instruments [in the hands of imperialism].
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: Long live jihad and long live Palestine.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: Goyim were born only to serve us. Without that, they have no place in the world - only to serve the People of Israel,. Why are gentiles needed? They will work, they will plow, they will reap. We will sit like an effendi and eat. That is why gentiles were created.
life.author: Ovadia Yosef

life.quote: The issue of terrorism must be dealt with firmly. We must work very hard to avoid loss of life. We must work very hard to avoid civilian casualties. And those terrorists and Baathists are holding the people of Fallujah hostage. We must release the hostages.
life.author: Ahmed Chalabi

life.quote: We are not intimidated by the size of the armies, or the type of hardware the US has brought.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: The Kurdish people have the right of self-determination like every other nation in the world.
life.author: Jalal Talabani

life.quote: I didn't say 'former president,' I said 'president,' and I have the constitutional rights according to the constitution, including immunity from prosecution.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: The Kurdish people welcome the no-fly zone protection, contrary to the Iraqi regime that is against it.
life.author: Jalal Talabani

life.quote: If you want to control the world you need to control the oil. Therefore the destruction of Iraq is a prerequisite to controlling oil. That means the destruction of the Iraqi national identity, since the Iraqis are committed to their principles and rights according to international law and the U.N. charter.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: By God, we will make the fire eat up half of Isreal if it tries to do anything against Iraq.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: We do not have weapons of mass destruction.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: I am not guilty, I am innocent.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: Baghdad is determined to force the Mongols of our age to commit suicide at its gates.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: la ilaha il-Allah, wa Muhammadu... (There is no god but God and Muhammed [is His prophet
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: The fact is that as soon as they reach Baghdad gates, we will besiege them and slaughter them.
life.author: Mohammed Saeed al-Sahaf

life.quote: Until now they have refused to do battle with us. They are just going places.
life.author: Mohammed Saeed al-Sahaf

life.quote: Go forth from our holy land and go back to your families who are waiting for you impatiently, that you and we, as well, lead a peaceful life together.
life.author: Muqtada al Sadr

life.quote: Our gratitude to the American people is immense and we should never be embarrassed to express it.
life.author: Jalal Talabani

life.quote: Iraqis will never forget that on 8 August 1990 Kuwait became part of Iraq legally, constitutionally and actually. It continued to do so until last night, when withdrawal began.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: Historically, and since, 1520, eighteen Treaties have been concluded between the Persian State and its western neighbours regarding its relations therewith including the question of borders. On all occasions, the Persian State chose the opportunity to violate the said Treaties whether by word or deed.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: A military coup needs a sacrifice and courage that you can't find in an army without morale.
life.author: Jalal Talabani

life.quote: Oh sons of Arabs and the Arab Gulf, rebel against the foreigner...Take revenge for your dignity, holy places, security, interests and exalted values.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: Mines are equal opportunity weapons.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: Once again, the hopeless cowardly Americans were back to repeat their cowardly act hiding behind a technological advance that God, most gracious, wanted it to be their curse and cause for shame.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: The ideal revolutionary command should effectively direct all planning and implementation. It must not allow the growth of any other rival center of power. There must be one command pooling and directing the subsequent governmental departments, including the armed forces.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: Justice for the major perpetrators cannot be separated from the vindication of the rights of the individual victim.
life.author: Jalal Talabani

life.quote: I have said it many times: the policy of exclusion and the policy of marginalization must end in Iraq.
life.author: Muqtada al Sadr

life.quote: It is easy for a rabbi to establish prohibitions, but a rabbi's real strength is to teach Torah and rule on lawwith an emphasis on what is permitted.
life.author: Ovadia Yosef

life.quote: I said I'm the president of Iraq... I did not say deposed.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: There is much to be said for having an experienced international jurist who is entirely unconnected with the allied invaders, on the tribunal.
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: They are sick in their minds. They say they brought 65 tanks into center of city. I say to you this talk is not true. This is part of their sick mind.
life.author: Mohammed Saeed al-Sahaf

life.quote: Where there is Torah it sustains the world.
life.author: Ovadia Yosef

life.quote: It has been rumored that we have fired scud missiles into Kuwait. I am here now to tell you, we do not have any scud missiles and I don't know why they were fired into Kuwait.
life.author: Mohammed Saeed al-Sahaf

life.quote: The Iraqi people are capable of fighting to the victorious end which God wants... the blood of our martyrs will burn you!
life.author: Saddam Hussein

life.quote: Human beings are members of a whole,In creation of one essence and soul.If one member is afflicted with pain,Other members uneasy will remain.If you have no sympathy for human pain,The name of human you cannot retain.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: A wise man among the ignorant is as a beautiful girl in the company of blind men.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: Have patience. All things are difficult before they become easy.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: You who feel no pain at the suffering of others It is not fitting for you to be called human.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: I fear God the most, but after Him, I fear those who don't fear Him.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: When the belly is empty, the body becomes spirit; and when it is full, the spirit becomes body.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: The best loved by God are those that are rich, yet have the humility of the poor, and those that are poor and have the magnanimity of the rich.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: If a gem falls into mud it is still valuable. If dust ascends to heaven, it remains valueless.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: The sons of Adam are limbs of each other, Having been created of one essence. When the calamity of time affects one limb, the other limbs cannot remain at rest. If you have no sympathy for the troubles of others, You are unworthy to be called by the name of a human.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: The heart is like a musical instrument of many strings, all the chords of which require putting in harmony.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: The hand of liberality is stronger than the arm of power.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: Riches are for the comfort of life, and not life for the accumulation of riches. I asked a holy wise man, "Who is fortunate and who is unfortunate?" He replied: "He was fortunate who ate and sowed, and he was unfortunate who died without having enjoyed.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: A handsome woman is a jewel; a good woman is a treasure.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: Better is the sinner who hath thoughts about God, than the saint who hath only the show of sanctity.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: If one commits the act of sodomy with a cow, an ewe, or a camel, their urine and their excrements become impure, and even their milk may no longer be consumed. The animal must then be killed and as quickly as possible and burned.
life.author: Ayatollah Khomeini

life.quote: A grateful dog is better than an ungrateful man.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: Whoever gives advice to a heedless man is himself in need of advice.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: The idea of cultural relativism is nothing but an excuse to violate human rights.
life.author: Shirin Ebadi

life.quote: For hundreds of years Iranians have been migrating to many parts of the world. They took Islamic culture to other parts of the world and established it there.
life.author: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad

life.quote: When a man appreciates only eating and sleeping, what excellence has he over the reptiles?
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: Religion is only in the service of the people; it is not in the rosary and the prayer-carpet.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: If the invaders reach Iran, the country will turn into a burning hell for them.
life.author: Mohammad Khatami

life.quote: If the Holocaust that you talk about was real, why don't you allow the subject to be studied? One can freely research any issue, except for this issue, which is sealed. It is a black box, which they do not allow to be opened or reexamined. They do this in order to exploit it.
life.author: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad

life.quote: The world is not a courtroom There is no judge no jury no plaintiff. This is a caravan filled with eccentric beings telling wondrous stories about God.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: Ants, fighting together, will vanquish the lion.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: Lawyers have a dangerous job in Iran.
life.author: Shirin Ebadi

life.quote: Anger that has no limit causes terror, and unseasonable kindness does away with respect. Be not so severe as to cause disgust, nor so lenient as to make people presume.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: People are crying up the rich and variegated plumage of the peacock, and he is himself blushing at the sight of his ugly feet.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: When you see contention amongst your enemies, go and sit at ease with your friends; but when you see them of one mind, string your bow, and place stones upon the ramparts.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: You get a strange feeling when you're about to leave a place, I told him, like you'll not only miss the people you love but you'll miss the person you are now at this time and this place, because you'll never be this way ever again.
life.author: Azar Nafisi

life.quote: In the sea there are countless treasures,But if you desire safety, it is on the shore.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: A traveler without knowledge is a bird without wings.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: Whenever you argue with another wiser than yourself in order that others may admire your wisdom, they will discover your ignorance.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: Israel must be wiped off the map.
life.author: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad

life.quote: I want the standard of living in Iran in ten years' time to be exactly on a level with that in Europe today. In twenty years' time we shall be ahead of the United States.
life.author: Mohammed Reza Pahlavi

life.quote: Human rights is a universal standard. It is a component of every religion and every civilization.
life.author: Shirin Ebadi

life.quote: Those who believe in this type of thing [Paul the Octopus, who ‘predicted’ the result of World Cup matches] cannot be the leaders of the global nations that aspire, like Iran, to human perfection, basing themselves in the love of all sacred values.
life.author: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad

life.quote: I see people who talk about America, and then undermine it by not paying attention to its soul, to its poetry. I see polarization, reductionism and superficiality.
life.author: Azar Nafisi

life.quote: The winner must promote social jusitce, remove corruption and discrmination, and stand against political, cultural and economic plots.
life.author: Ayatollah Khamenei

life.quote: A man is insensible to the relish of prosperity until he has tasted adversity.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: Of journeying the benefits are many: the freshness it bringeth to the heart, the seeing and hearing of marvelous things, the delight of beholding new cities, the meeting of unknown friends, and the learning of high manners.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: We've never been anti-Semitic.
life.author: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad

life.quote: Iran can recruit hundreds of suicide bombers a day. Suicide is an invincible weapon. Suicide bombers in this land showed us the way, and they enlighten our future.
life.author: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad

life.quote: Dear Iranian nation, your children have placed the first indigenous satellite into orbit.
life.author: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad

life.quote: He who is intoxicated with wine will be sober again in the course of the night, but he who is intoxicated by the cupbearer will not recover his senses until the day of judgement.
life.author: Saadi

life.quote: People should have freedom in their pilgrimages and tours. They should come and visit historical monuments and sites - let's say the sites around Iran - where they can easily engage in wide- scale contacts with others.
life.author: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad

life.quote: My former health minister, Kamran Bagheri Lankarani, is like a peach. I love to eat him.
life.author: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad

life.quote: And God willing, with the force of God behind it, we shall soon experience a world without the United States and Zionism.
life.author: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad

life.quote: We thank God that our enemies are idiots.
life.author: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad

life.quote: My main mistake was to have made an ancient people advance by forced marches toward independence, health, culture, affluence, comfort.
life.author: Mohammed Reza Pahlavi

life.quote: The most important thing in life is to dare. The most complicated thing in life is to be afraid. The smartest thing in the world is to try to be a moral person.
life.author: Shimon Peres

life.quote: Optimists and pessimists die the exact same death, but they live very different lives!
life.author: Shimon Peres

life.quote: When you have two alternatives, the first thing you have to do is to look for the third that you didn't think about, that doesn't exist.
life.author: Shimon Peres

life.quote: It's better to be controversial for the right reasons, than to be popular for the wrong reasons.
life.author: Shimon Peres

life.quote: I read when I get up in the morning, when I can during the day and every single evening. Most of my weekends are spent reading great books. Books are my constant companions. If you eat three times a day you'll be fed. But if you read three times a day you'll be wise.
life.author: Shimon Peres

life.quote: If you want to make peace, you don't talk to your friends. You talk to your enemies.
life.author: Moshe Dayan

life.quote: Your own soul is nourished when you are kind, it is destroyed when you are cruel
life.author: King Solomon

life.quote: You don't make peace with friends. You make it with very unsavory enemies.
life.author: Shimon Peres

life.quote: When you say, 'I am a Christian,' you are saying, 'I am mashiach,' in the Hebrew. I am a little messiah walking on earth, in other words. That is a shocking revelation. ...May I say it like this? You are a little god on earth running around
life.author: Benny Hinn

life.quote: The Bible warns us clearly that we must not attack men of God no matter how sinful they may have become or wicked in our eyes.
life.author: Benny Hinn

life.quote: We do not rejoice in victories. We rejoice when a new kind of cotton is grown and when strawberries bloom in Israel.
life.author: Golda Meir

life.quote: One cannot and must not try to erase the past merely because it does not fit the present.
life.author: Golda Meir

life.quote: From my earliest youth, I have known that while one is obliged to plan with care the stages of one's journey, one is entitled to dream, and keep dreaming, of its destination.
life.author: Shimon Peres

life.quote: Do you know that every unbeliever is filled with a demon spirit?
life.author: Benny Hinn

life.quote: If you eat three times a day, you become fat. If you read three times a day, you become wise. It's better to be wise than fat.
life.author: Shimon Peres

life.quote: You must flow with the will of God, in the service of God, to obtain the power of God.
life.author: Benny Hinn

life.quote: There will be no sickness for the saint of God. ... If your body belongs to God, it does not and cannot belong to sickness.
life.author: Benny Hinn

life.quote: God will not move unless I say it. Why? because He has made us coworkers with Him. He set things up that way.
life.author: Benny Hinn

life.quote: We can forgive [the Arabs] for killing our children. We cannot forgive them for forcing us to kill their children. We will only have peace with [the Arabs] when they love their children more than they hate us...
life.author: Golda Meir

life.quote: The State of Israel will prove itself not by material wealth, not by military might or technical achievement, but by its moral character and human values.
life.author: David Ben-Gurion

life.quote: The present map of Palestine was drawn by the British mandate. The Jewish people have another map which our youth and adults should strive to fulfill: from the Nile to the Euphrates.
life.author: David Ben-Gurion

life.quote: The Holocaust is a great warning to us all. We shall never forget our sisters and brothers. We have to ensure it is not repeated and to ensure we never go back to the days when humans behaved as beasts. Forgetfulness is a menace, we must remember.
life.author: Shimon Peres

life.quote: Your own soul is nourished when you are kind; it is destroyed when you are cruel.
life.author: King Solomon

life.quote: Trust yourself. Create the kind of self that you will be happy to live with all your life.
life.author: Golda Meir

life.quote: Adam was a super being when God created him...he had dominion over the fowls of the air which means he used to fly...well of course how could you have dominion over the birds and not be able to do what they do. Adam flew into space, with one thought he would be on the moon.
life.author: Benny Hinn

life.quote: Let us not ignore the truth among ourselves ... politically we are the aggressors and they defend themselves... The country is theirs, because they inhabit it, whereas we want to come here and settle down, and in their view we want to take away from them their country.
life.author: David Ben-Gurion

life.quote: Let me first tell you one thing: It doesn't matter what the world says about Israel; it doesn't matter what they say about us anywhere else. The only thing that matters is that we can exist here on the land of our forefathers. And unless we show the Arabs that there is a high price to pay for murdering Jews, we won't survive.
life.author: David Ben-Gurion

life.quote: When we demonstrate our faith in God by our obedience, He not only promises to provide for us, He will provide.
life.author: Benny Hinn

life.quote: We regard it as our duty to declare that Jewish Jerusalem is an organic and inseparable part of the State of Israel, as it is an inseparable part of the history of Israel, of the faith of Israel.
life.author: David Ben-Gurion

life.quote: It's not enough to be up to date, you have to be up to tomorrow.
life.author: David Ben-Gurion

life.quote: Jesus Christ knew the only way He would stop Satan is by becoming one in nature with him...He became one with the nature of Satan, so all those who had the nature of Satan can partake of the nature of God.
life.author: Benny Hinn

life.quote: We were granted the right to exist by the God of our fathers at the glimmer of the dawn of human civilization nearly 4,000 years ago. For that right, which has been sanctified in Jewish blood from generation to generation, we have paid a price unexampled in the annals of the nations.
life.author: Menachem Begin

life.quote: Since I invoke Torah so often, let me state that I don't personally believe in the God it postulates ... I am not religious, nor were the majority of the early builders of Israel believers. Yet their passion for this land stemmed from the Book of Books ... [The Bible is] the single most important book in my life.
life.author: David Ben-Gurion

life.quote: No city in the world, not even Athens or Rome, ever played as great a role in the life of a nation for so long a time, as Jerusalem has done in the life of the Jewish people.
life.author: David Ben-Gurion

life.quote: The Egyptians could run to Egypt, the Syrians into Syria. The only place we could run was into the sea, and before we did that we might as well fight.
life.author: Golda Meir

life.quote: Why should the Arabs make peace? If I was an Arab leader I would never make terms with Israel. That is natural: we have taken their country. Sure God promised it to us, but what does that matter to them? Our God is not theirs.
life.author: David Ben-Gurion

life.quote: I do not bring forgiveness with me, nor forgetfulness. The only ones who can forgive are dead; the living have no right to forget.
life.author: Chaim Herzog

life.quote: Freedom is the oxygen of the soul.
life.author: Moshe Dayan

life.quote: The new creation is created after God in righteousness and true holiness. The new man is after God, like God, godlike, complete in Jesus Christ. The new creation is just like God. May I say it like this, "You are a little god on earth running around."
life.author: Benny Hinn

life.quote: We must do everything to ensure they [the Palestinians] never do return. The old will die and the young will forget,
life.author: David Ben-Gurion

life.quote: Don't be humble... you're not that great.
life.author: Golda Meir

life.quote: A Christian state should be established [in Lebanon], with its southern border on the Litani river. We will make an alliance with it. When we smash the Arab Legion's strength and bomb Amman, we will eliminate Transjordan too, and then Syria will fall. If Egypt still dares to fight on, we shall bomb Port Said, Alexandria and Cairo.
life.author: David Ben-Gurion

life.quote: Ours is a country built more on people than on territory. The Jews will come from everywhere: from France, from Russia, from America, from Yemen... Their faith is their passport.
life.author: David Ben-Gurion

life.quote: Independence is never given to a people, it has to be earned; and, once earned, must be defended.
life.author: Chaim Weizmann

life.quote: I must govern the clock, not be governed by it.
life.author: Golda Meir

life.quote: From the sea came a boat with some Israeli commando soldiers who took me by the commando boat to the yacht and put me on the yacht. In the yacht I asked people, who are you. And they said we are Israelis, French and British.
life.author: Mordechai Vanunu

life.quote: Television has made dictatorship impossible but democracy unbearable.
life.author: Shimon Peres

life.quote: To defeat ISIS and let Iran get nuclear weapons would be to win the battle and lose the war.
life.author: Benjamin Netanyahu

life.quote: Suffering makes a people greater, and we have suffered much. We had a message to give the world, but we were overwhelmed, and the message was cut off in the middle. In time there will be millions of us - becoming stronger and stronger - and we will complete the message.
life.author: David Ben-Gurion

life.quote: History teaches us that men and nations behave wisely once they have exhausted all other alternatives.
life.author: Abba Eban

life.quote: We can continue to fight. We can continue to kill - and continue to be killed. But we can also try to put a stop to this never-ending cycle of blood. We can also give peace a chance.
life.author: Yitzhak Rabin

life.quote: It is clear that we must find an African solution to our problems, and that this can only be found in African unity. Divided we are weak; united, Africa could become one of the greatest forces for good in the world.
life.author: Kwame Nkrumah

life.quote: As far as i am concerned, i am in the knowledge that death can never extinguish the torch which i have lit in Ghana and Africa. Long after i am dead and gone, the light will continue to burn and be borne aloft, giving light and guidance to all people
life.author: Kwame Nkrumah

life.quote: Capitalism is a development by refinement from feudalism, just as feudalism is development by refinement from slavery . Capitalism is but the gentlemen's method of slavery.
life.author: Kwame Nkrumah

life.quote: The independence of Ghana is meaningless unless it is linked-up with the total liberation of the African Continent
life.author: Kwame Nkrumah

life.quote: All people of African descent, whether they live in North or South America, the Caribbean, or in any part of the world are Africans and belong to the African nation.
life.author: Kwame Nkrumah

life.quote: Revolutions are brought about by men, by men who think as men of action and act as men of thought.
life.author: Kwame Nkrumah

life.quote: No people without a government of their own can expect to be treated on the same level as people of independent sovereign states. It is far better to be free to govern or misgovern yourself than to be governed by anybody else . . .
life.author: Kwame Nkrumah

life.quote: We may have different religions, different languages, different colored skin, but we all belong to one human race.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: It is far easier for the proverbial camel to pass through the needle's eye, hump and all, than for an erstwhile colonial administration to give sound and honest counsel of a political nature to its liberated territory.
life.author: Kwame Nkrumah

life.quote: We need to promote greater tolerance and understanding among the peoples of the world. Nothing can be more dangerous to our efforts to build peace and development than a world divided along religious, ethnic or cultural lines. In each nation, and among all nations, we must work to promote unity based on our shared humanity.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: We shall not defeat any of the infectious diseases that plague the developing world until we have also won the battle for safe drinking water, sanitation, and basic health care.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: ...there is no tool for development more effective than the empowerment of women.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: Education is, quite simply, peace-building by another name. It is the most effective form of defense spending there is.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: When women thrive, all of society benefits, and succeeding generations are given a better start in life.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: Ignorance and prejudice are the handmaidens of propaganda. Our mission, therefore, is to confront ignorance with knowledge, bigotry with tolerance, and isolation with the outstretched hand of generosity. Racism can, will, and must be defeated.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: For centuries, Europeans dominated the African continent. The white man arrogated to himself the right to rule and to be obeyed by the non-white; his mission, he claimed, was to "civilize" Africa. Under this cloak, the Europeans robbed the continent of vast riches and inflicted unimaginable suffering on the African people.
life.author: Kwame Nkrumah

life.quote: Africa is a paradox which illustrates and highlights neo-colonialism . Her earth is rich, yet the products that come from above and below the soil continue to enrich, not Africans predominantly, but groups and individuals who operate to Africa’s impoverishment.
life.author: Kwame Nkrumah

life.quote: The result of neo-colonialism is that foreign capital is used for the exploitation rather than for the development of the less developed parts of the world. Investment under neo-colonialism increases rather than decreases the gap between the rich and poor countries of the world.
life.author: Kwame Nkrumah

life.quote: Gender equality is more than a goal in itself. It is a precondition for meeting the challenge of reducing poverty, promoting sustainable development and building good governance.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: If globalization is to succeed, it must succeed for poor and rich alike. It must deliver rights no less than riches. It must provide social justice and equity no less than economic prosperity and enhanced communication.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: It has been said that arguing against globalization is like arguing against the laws of gravity.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: The essence of neo-colonialism is that the State which is subject to it is, in theory, independent and has all the outward trappings of international sovereignty. In reality its economic system and thus its political policy is directed from outside.
life.author: Kwame Nkrumah

life.quote: You're never too young to lead.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: Violence against women is perhaps the most shameful human rights violation, and it is perhaps the most pervasive. It knows no boundaries of geography, culture or wealth. As long as it continues, we cannot claim to be making real progress towards equality, development and peace
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: At long last, the battle has ended! And thus, Ghana, your beloved country is free forever!
life.author: Kwame Nkrumah

life.quote: ...let us continue to work together to develop and nurture in future generations a culture of human rights, to promote freedom, security and peace in all nations.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: For us Africans, literature must serve a purpose: to expose, embarrass, and fight corruption and authoritarianism. It is understandable why the African artist is utilitarian.
life.author: Ama Ata Aidoo

life.quote: A State in the grip of neo-colonialism is not master of its own destiny. It is this factor which makes neo-colonialism such a serious threat to world peace.
life.author: Kwame Nkrumah

life.quote: I am not afraid to dream. You first have to start with a dream. Build your castles in the air and give it foundation. Without a dream, you are not going to get anywhere.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: It is only the ending of capitalism, colonialism, imperialism and neocolonialism and the attainment of world communism that can provide the conditions under which the RACE question can finally be abolished and eliminated.
life.author: Kwame Nkrumah

life.quote: The Millennium Development Goals can be met by 2015, but only if all involved break with business as usual and dramatically accelerate and scale up action now.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: No one is born a good citizen or a good democrat or a good leader; it takes time and education.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: We all want a United Africa, United not only in our concept of what unity connotes, but united in our common desire to move forward together in dealing with all the problems that can best be solved only on a continental basis.
life.author: Kwame Nkrumah

life.quote: Literacy is a bridge from misery to hope.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: We must ensure that the global market is embedded in broadly shared values and practices that reflect global social needs, and that all the world's people share the benefits of globalization.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: Open markets offer the only realistic hope of pulling billions of people in developing countries out of abject poverty, while sustaining prosperity in the industrialized world.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: Poverty devastates families, communities and nations. It causes instability and political unrest and fuels conflict.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: Humans, not places, make memories.
life.author: Ama Ata Aidoo

life.quote: Above all else, we need a reaffirmation of political commitment at the highest levels to reducing the dangers that arise both from existing nuclear weapons and from further proliferation.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: Business, labor and civil society organizations have skills and resources that are vital in helping to build a more robust global community.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: I have always believed that on important issues, the leaders must lead. Where the leaders fail to lead, and people are really concerned about it, the people will take the lead and make the leaders follow.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: All I can say is, hey, if you have fun doing what you do, if you have fun playing soccer, the creativity is just going to come as time goes on.
life.author: Freddy Adu

life.quote: No one is born a good citizen; no nation is born a democracy. Rather, both are processes that continue to evolve over a lifetime. Young people must be included from birth. A society that cuts off from its youth severs its lifeline.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: Microfinance recognizes that poor people are remarkable reservoirs of energy and knowledge
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: The traditional face of Africa includes an attitude towards man which can only be described as being socialist
life.author: Kwame Nkrumah

life.quote: Microfinance recognizes that poor people are remarkable reservoirs of energy and knowledge, posing an untapped opportunity to create markets, bring people in from the margins and give them the tools with which to help themselves.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: Long before many of us were even conscious of our own degradation, these men [Marcus Garvey and W. E. B. DuBois] fought for African national and racial equality.
life.author: Kwame Nkrumah

life.quote: Africa is one continent, one people and one nation
life.author: Kwame Nkrumah

life.quote: Let us be good stewards of the Earth we inherited. All of us have to share the Earth's fragile ecosystems and precious resources, and each of us has a role to play in preserving them. If we are to go on living together on this earth, we must all be responsible for it.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: One must also acknowledge that there are moments in an organisation's development when fresh blood and new vision are required, which may imply that an outsider may be better suited to the leadership role.
life.author: Kofi Annan

life.quote: Excellence is never an accident. It is always the result of high intention, sincere effort, and intelligent execution; it represents the wise choice of many alternatives - choice, not chance, determines your destiny.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
life.author: Socrates

life.quote: Never discourage anyone who continually makes progress, no matter how slow.
life.author: Plato

life.quote: Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not; but remember that what you now have was once among the things you only hoped for.
life.author: Epicurus

life.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not; remember that what you now have was once among the things you only hoped for.
life.author: Epicurus

life.quote: Never discourage anyone who continually makes progress, no mater how slow.
life.author: Plato

life.quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
life.author: Euripides

life.quote: I don't need a friend who changes when I change and who nods when I nod; my shadow does that much better.
life.author: Plutarch

life.quote: Educating the mind without educating the heart is no education at all.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: The secret of happiness, you see, is not found in seeking more, but in developing the capacity to enjoy less.
life.author: Socrates

life.quote: Be a free thinker and don't accept everything you hear as truth. Be critical and evaluate what you believe in.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: Your silence gives consent.
life.author: Plato

life.quote: If you do not take an interest in the affairs of your government, then you are doomed to live under the rule of fools.
life.author: Plato

life.quote: One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives.
life.author: Euripides

life.quote: Criticism is something we can avoid easilyby saying nothing, doing nothing,and being nothing.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: That is the difference between good teachers and great teachers: good teachers make the best of a pupil's means; great teachers foresee a pupil's ends. My teacher was Ferruccio Cusinati
life.author: Maria Callas

life.quote: Learn to be silent. Let your quiet mind listen and absorb.
life.author: Pythagoras

life.quote: Illnesses do not come upon us out of the blue. They are developed from small daily sins against Nature. When enough sins have accumulated, illnesses will suddenly appear.
life.author: Hippocrates

life.quote: Before you heal someone, ask him if he's willing to give up the things that made him sick.
life.author: Hippocrates

life.quote: If someone wishes for good health, one must first ask oneself if he is ready to do away with the reasons for his illness. Only then is it possible to help him.
life.author: Hippocrates

life.quote: Stronger than lover's love is lover's hate. Incurable, in each, the wounds they make.
life.author: Euripides

life.quote: A wise man speaks because he has something to say; a fool because he has to say something.
life.author: Plato

life.quote: Good people do not need laws to tell them to act responsibly, while bad people will find a way around the laws.
life.author: Plato

life.quote: Our food should be our medicine and our medicine should be our food.
life.author: Hippocrates

life.quote: When the debate is lost, slander becomes the tool of the loser.
life.author: Socrates

life.quote: The first and greatest victory is to conquer yourself.
life.author: Plato

life.quote: It's far more important to know what person the disease has than what disease the person has.
life.author: Hippocrates

life.quote: Every heart sings a song, incomplete, until another heart whispers back. Those who wish to sing always find a song. At the touch of a lover, everyone becomes a poet.
life.author: Plato

life.quote: I know that I am intelligent, because I know that I know nothing.
life.author: Socrates

life.quote: No one is more hated than he who speaks the truth.
life.author: Plato

life.quote: Waste not fresh tears over old griefs.
life.author: Euripides

life.quote: If you are not your own doctor, you are a fool.
life.author: Hippocrates

life.quote: One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives.
life.author: Euripides

life.quote: Teenagers these days are out of control. They eat like pigs, they are disrespectful of adults, they interrupt and contradict their parents, and they terrorize their teachers.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: Is God willing to prevent evil, but not able? Then he is not omnipotent. Is he able, but not willing? Then he is malevolent. Is he both able and willing? Then whence cometh evil? Is he neither able nor willing? Then why call him God?
life.author: Epicurus

life.quote: Make a habit of two things: to help; or at least to do no harm.
life.author: Hippocrates

life.quote: Republics decline into democracies and democracies degenerate into despotisms.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: Poverty is the parent of revolution and crime.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: There is only one way to avoid criticism: Do nothing, Say nothing, and Be nothing.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: Anybody can become angry - that is easy, but to be angry with the right person and to the right degree and at the right time and for the right purpose, and in the right way - that is not within everybody's power and is not easy.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: The way to health is to have an aromatic bath and a scented massage every day.
life.author: Hippocrates

life.quote: Life contains but two tragedies. One is not to get your heart's desire; the other is to get it.
life.author: Socrates

life.quote: The Secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
life.author: Socrates

life.quote: Mathematics reveals its secrets only to those who approach it with pure love, for its own beauty.
life.author: Archimedes

life.quote: Educating the mind without educating the heart is no education at all.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: I count him braver who overcomes his desires than him who conquers his enemies; for the hardest victory is over self.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: The laws of nature are but the mathematical thoughts of God.
life.author: Euclid

life.quote: Enjoy life. There's plenty of time to be dead. Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a harder battle.
life.author: Plato

life.quote: The natural healing force within each one of us is the greatest force in getting well.
life.author: Hippocrates

life.quote: He who has never learned to obey cannot be a good commander.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: Walking is a man's best medicine.
life.author: Hippocrates

life.quote: We are what we repeatedly do; excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: Leave your drugs in the chemist's pot if you can heal the patient with food.
life.author: Hippocrates

life.quote: When there is no middle class, and the poor greatly exceed in number, troubles arise, and the state soon comes to an end.
life.author: Aristotle

life.quote: No prison can hold me; no hand or leg irons or steel locks can shackle me. No ropes or chains can keep me from my freedom.
life.author: Harry Houdini

life.quote: I always said marriage should be a fifty-fifty proposition. He should be at least fifty years old, and have at least fifty-million dollars.
life.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

life.quote: My Brain is the key that sets me free.
life.author: Harry Houdini

life.quote: Being jealous of a beautiful woman is not going to make you more beautiful.
life.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

life.quote: How many husbands have I had? You mean apart from my own?
life.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

life.quote: A man in love is incomplete until he has married. Then he's finished.
life.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

life.quote: Our whole life is solving puzzles.
life.author: Erno Rubik

life.quote: The Jews who will it shall achieve their State. We shall live at last as free men on our own soil, and in our own homes peacefully die. The world will be liberated by our freedom, enriched by our wealth, magnified by our greatness. And whatever we attempt there for our own benefit will redound mightily and beneficially to the good of all mankind.
life.author: Theodor Herzl

life.quote: Never try to fool children, they expect nothing, and therefore see everything.
life.author: Harry Houdini

life.quote: I want a man who's kind and understanding. Is that too much to ask of a millionaire?
life.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

life.quote: What is really important for a woman, you know, even more than being beautiful or intelligent, is to be entertaining.
life.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

life.quote: My husband said it was him or the cat. I miss him sometimes.
life.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

life.quote: If you are curious, you'll find the puzzles around you. If you are determined, you will solve them.
life.author: Erno Rubik

life.quote: I never hated a man enough to give him diamonds back.
life.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

life.quote: Were I to sum up the Basle Congress in a word- which I shall guard against pronouncing publicly- it would be this: 'At Basle, I founded the Jewish State. If I said this out loud today, I would be answered by universal laughter. If not in 5 years, certainly in 50, everyone will know it.'
life.author: Theodor Herzl

life.quote: I call everyone 'Darling' because I can't remember their names.
life.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

life.quote: With music, one's whole future life is brightened. This is such a treasure in life that it helps us over many troubles and difficulties. Music is nourishment, a comforting elixir. Music multiplies all that is beautiful and of value in life.
life.author: Zoltan Kodaly

life.quote: Beware of missing chances; otherwise it may be altogether too late some day.
life.author: Franz Liszt

life.quote: I don't take gifts from perfect strangers — but then, nobody is perfect.
life.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

life.quote: Teach music and singing at school in such a way that it is not a torture but a joy for the pupil; instill a thirst for finer music in him, a thirst which will last for a lifetime.
life.author: Zoltan Kodaly

life.quote: My piano is to me what a ship is to the sailor, what a steed is to the Arab. It is the intimate personal depository of everything that stirred wildly in my brain during the most impassioned days of my youth. It was there that all my wishes, all my dreams, all my joys, and all my sorrows lay.
life.author: Franz Liszt

life.quote: If whole branches of Jews must be destroyed, it is worth it, as long as a Jewish state in Palestine is created.
life.author: Theodor Herzl

life.quote: Once we realize that imperfect understanding is the human condition there is no shame in being wrong, only in failing to correct our mistakes.
life.author: George Soros

life.quote: Once we realize that imperfect understanding is the human condition, there is no shame in being wrong, only in failing to correct our mistakes.
life.author: George Soros

life.quote: My chief task has been to conquer fear. The public sees only the thrill of the accomplished trick; they have no conception of the tortuous preliminary self-training that was necessary to conquer fear.
life.author: Harry Houdini

life.quote: Music is a manifestation of the human spirit, similar to language. Its greatest practitioners have conveyed to mankind things not possible to say in any other language. If we do not want these things to remain dead treasures, we must do our utmost to make the greatest possible number of people understand their idiom.
life.author: Zoltan Kodaly

life.quote: There is no complete spiritual life without music, for the human soul has regions which can be illuminated only by music.
life.author: Zoltan Kodaly

life.quote: It is true that we aspire to our ancient land. But what we want in that ancient land is a new blossoming of the Jewish spirit.
life.author: Theodor Herzl

life.quote: For better or worse, our future will be determined in large part by our dreams and by the struggle to make them real.
life.author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

life.quote: Keep up your enthusiasm! There is nothing more contagious than exuberant enthusiasm.
life.author: Harry Houdini

life.quote: The greatest escape I ever made was when I left Appleton, Wisconsin.
life.author: Harry Houdini

life.quote: There is nothing wrong with a woman welcoming all men's advances as long as they are in cash
life.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

life.quote: I will give you my definition of a nation, and you can add the adjective 'Jewish.' A Nation is, in my mind, an historical group of men of a recognizable cohesion held together by a common enemy. Then, if you add to that the word 'Jewish' you have what I understand to be the Jewish nation.
life.author: Theodor Herzl

life.quote: An old trick well done is far better than a new trick with no effect.
life.author: Harry Houdini

life.quote: Flow is being completely involved in an activity for its own sake. The ego falls away. Time flies. Every action, movement, and thought follows inevitably from the previous one, like playing jazz.
life.author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

life.quote: But if you go from Moscow to Budapest you think you are in Paris.
life.author: Gyorgy Ligeti

life.quote: Research programmes, besides their negative heuristic, are also characterized by their positive heuristic.
life.author: Imre Lakatos

life.quote: It would be wrong to assume that one must stay with a research programme until it has exhausted all its heuristic power, that one must not introduce a rival programme before everybody agrees that the point of degeneration has probably been reached.
life.author: Imre Lakatos

life.quote: Poetry is plucking at the heartstrings, and making music with them.
life.author: Dennis Gabor

life.quote: The positive heuristic of the programme saves the scientist from becoming confused by the ocean of anomalies.
life.author: Imre Lakatos

life.quote: One must do no violence to nature, nor model it in conformity to any blindly formed chimera.
life.author: Janos Bolyai

life.quote: If you are interested in something, you will focus on it, and if you focus attention on anything, it is likely that you will become interested in it. Many of the things we find interesting are not so by nature, but because we took the trouble of paying attention to them.
life.author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

life.quote: East Hampton happens to have been the first place in the world where I was a star, a real star with a star pasted above my name on the dressing-room door.
life.author: Eva Gabor

life.quote: Why are numbers beautiful? It’s like asking why is Beethoven’s Ninth Symphony beautiful.If you don’t see why, someone can’t tell you. I know numbers are beautiful.If they aren’t beautiful, nothing is.
life.author: Paul Erdos

life.quote: A mathematician is a device for turning coffee into theorems.
life.author: Paul Erdos

life.quote: I believe I understand anti-Semitism which is a very complex movement. I see it as a Jew, but without hatred or fear. I recognize what is anti-Semitism is rude jesting, vulgar jealousy of métier, hereditary prejudice; but also what can be considered as in fact legitimate defence.
life.author: Theodor Herzl

life.quote: I'm not better than the next trader, just quicker at admitting my mistakes and moving on to the next opportunity.
life.author: George Soros

life.quote: Courage is never to let your actions be influenced by your fears.
life.author: Arthur Koestler

life.quote: A magician is only an actor - an actor pretending to be a magician.
life.author: Harry Houdini

life.quote: The secret of showmanship consists not of what you really do, but what the mystery-loving public thinks you do.
life.author: Harry Houdini

life.quote: Zionism demands a publicly recognized and legally secured homeland in Palestine for the Jewish people. This platform is unchangeable.
life.author: Theodor Herzl

life.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: Beware of false knowledge; it is more dangerous than ignorance.
life.author: George Bernard Shaw

life.quote: Everyone may not be good, but there's always something good in everyone. Never judge anyone shortly because every saint has a past and every sinner has a future.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: People trample over flowers, yet only to embrace a cactus.
life.author: James Joyce

life.quote: Religion is like a blind man looking in a black room for a black cat that isn't there, and finding it.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: Nothing good ever comes from worrying or sitting there feeling sorry for yourself... Keep positive and keep pushing on and things will turn good.
life.author: Conor McGregor

life.quote: Progress is impossible without change and those who cannot change their minds, cannot change anything.
life.author: George Bernard Shaw

life.quote: Women are made to be loved, not understood.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: At the end of the day you gotta feel some way. So why not feel unbeatable? Why not feel untouchable.
life.author: Conor McGregor

life.quote: We don't stop playing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop playing.
life.author: George Bernard Shaw

life.quote: If a thing is worth doing, it is worth doing well. If it is worth having, it is worth waiting for. If it is worth attaining, it is worth fighting for. If it is worth experiencing, it is worth putting aside time for.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: I learned long ago, never to wrestle with a pig. You get dirty, and besides, the pig likes it.
life.author: George Bernard Shaw

life.quote: People who say it cannot be done should not interrupt those who are doing it.
life.author: George Bernard Shaw

life.quote: Experience is the hardest kind of teacher. It gives you test first and the lesson afterward.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: It's beauty that captures your attention. personality which captures your heart.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: A life spent making mistakes is not only more honorable, but more useful than a life spent doing nothing.
life.author: George Bernard Shaw

life.quote: Don't lose faith. Promise yourself that you will be a success story, and I promise you that all the forces of the universe will unite to come to your aid; you might not feel today or for a while, but the longer you wait the bigger the prize.
life.author: George Bernard Shaw

life.quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
life.author: George Bernard Shaw

life.quote: Look out for those who look out for you. Loyalty is everything.
life.author: Conor McGregor

life.quote: If you are not too long, I will wait here for you all my life.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: You see things and you say, 'Why?'. But I dream things and I say, 'Why not?'.
life.author: George Bernard Shaw

life.quote: Write your Sad times in Sand,Write your Good times in Stone.
life.author: George Bernard Shaw

life.quote: I fear no man. If you breathe oxygen, I do not fear you.
life.author: Conor McGregor

life.quote: A cigarette is a pinch of tobacco rolled in paper with fire at one end and a fool at the other.
life.author: George Bernard Shaw

life.quote: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: I have visualised my imagination so clearly and so consistently that it has manifested itself into my reality.
life.author: Conor McGregor

life.quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: Never love anyone who treats you like you're ordinary.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: If you want to tell people the truth, make them laugh, otherwise they'll kill you.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: Appreciate your surroundings and be grateful for it and that's when good things happen.
life.author: Conor McGregor

life.quote: I'm just going to keep doing what I'm doing. Keep proving people wrong and proving myself right.
life.author: Conor McGregor

life.quote: The only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is for good men to do nothing.
life.author: Edmund Burke

life.quote: Anybody can sympathise with the sufferings of a friend, but it requires a very fine nature to sympathise with a friend's success.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: Ultimately, the bond of all companionship, whether in marriage or friendship, is conversation.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
life.author: Samuel Beckett

life.quote: The single biggest problem in communication is the illusion that it has taken place.
life.author: George Bernard Shaw

life.quote: I don't want to go to heaven. None of my friends are there.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: The final mystery is oneself. When one has weighed the sun in the balance, and measured the steps of the moon, and mapped out the seven heavens star by star, there still remains oneself. Who can calculate the orbit of his own soul?
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: There's never an end for the sea.
life.author: Samuel Beckett

life.quote: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
life.author: George Bernard Shaw

life.quote: Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: They've promised that dreams can come true - but forgot to mention that nightmares are dreams, too.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: I am cocky in prediction, I am confident in preparation but I am always humble in victory or defeat.
life.author: Conor McGregor

life.quote: Between men and women there is no friendship possible. There is passion, enmity, worship, love, but no friendship.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: People may fail many times, but they become failures only when they begin to blame someone else. Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: Life is a journey that must be traveled no matter how bad the roads and accommodations.
life.author: Oliver Goldsmith

life.quote: There are moments when one has to choose between living one's own life, fully, entirely, completely-or dragging out some false, shallow, degrading existence that the world in its hypocrisy demands.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: WIth freedom, books, flowers, and the moon, who could not be happy.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the grandest intention.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: Let us take one day only in hands at a time. Resolve to do good today and better tomorrow.
life.author: Catherine McAuley

life.quote: We are each our own devil, and we make this world our hell.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: Whenever one has anything unpleasant to say, one should always be quite candid.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: We live in an age when unnecessary things are our only necessities.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: We say that life is sweet, its satisfactions deep. All this we say, as we sleepwalk our time through years of days and nights. We let time cascade over us like a waterfall, believing it to be never-ending. Yet each day that touches us, and every man in the world, is unique; irredeemable; over. And just another Monday.
life.author: Josephine Hart

life.quote: I think it's very healthy to spend time alone. You need to know how to be alone and not be defined by another person
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: To be natural is such a very difficult pose to keep up.
life.author: Oscar Wilde

life.quote: Music can change the world because it can change people.
life.author: Bono

life.quote: Weak people revenge. Strong people forgive. Intelligent People Ignore.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
life.author: Albert Schweitzer

life.quote: Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: Men marry women with the hope they will never change. Women marry men with the hope they will change. Invariably they are both disappointed.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: Sometimes people don't want to hear the truth because they don't want their illusions destroyed.
life.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

life.quote: There comes a point in your life when you need to stop reading other people's book and write your own.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: The world will not be destroyed by those who do evil, but by those who watch them without doing anything.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or objects.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: Women always worry about things that men forget; men always worry about things women remember.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: The ideal subject of totalitarian rule is not the convinced Nazi or the dedicated communist, but people for whom the distinction between fact and fiction, true and false, no longer exists.
life.author: Hannah Arendt

life.quote: Success comes from curiosity, concentration, perseverance and self criticism.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: Whoever drinks beer, he is quick to sleep; whoever sleeps long, does not sin; whoever does not sin, enters Heaven! Thus, let us drink beer!
life.author: Martin Luther

life.quote: The primary cause of unhappiness is never the situation but your thoughts about it.
life.author: Eckhart Tolle

life.quote: God does not need your good works, but your neighbor does.
life.author: Martin Luther

life.quote: Rules for Happiness: something to do, someone to love, something to hope for.
life.author: Immanuel Kant

life.quote: I have held many things in my hands, and I have lost them all; but whatever I have placed in God's hands, that I still possess.
life.author: Martin Luther

life.quote: The intuitive mind is a sacred gift and the rational mind is a faithful servant. We have created a society that honors the servant and has forgotten the gift.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: Any fool can know. The point is to understand.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: I was in darkness, but I took three steps and found myself in paradise. The first step was a good thought, the second, a good word; and the third, a good deed.
life.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

life.quote: The world will not be destroyed by those who do evil, but by those who watch them without doing anything.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and the only way, it does not exist.
life.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

life.quote: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe. If you try it, you will be lonely often, and sometimes frightened. But no price is too high to pay for the privilege of owning yourself.
life.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

life.quote: Lord Jesus, You are my righteousness, I am your sin. You took on you what was mine; yet set on me what was yours. You became what you were not, that I might become what I was not.
life.author: Martin Luther

life.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: There will always be rocks in the road ahead of us. They will be stumbling blocks or stepping stones; it all depends on how you use them.
life.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

life.quote: I fear the day that technology will surpass our human interaction. The world will have a generation of idiots.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: I'm not upset that you lied to me, I'm upset that from now on I can't believe you.
life.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

life.quote: A religion that gives nothing, costs nothing, and suffers nothing, is worth nothing.
life.author: Martin Luther
