life.quote: In everyone's life, at some time, our inner fire goes out. It is then burst into flame by an encounter with another human being. We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.
life.author: Albert Schweitzer

life.quote: Enjoy life. This is not a dress rehearsal.
life.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

life.quote: No one can believe how powerful prayer is and what it can effect, except those who have learned it by experience. Whenever I have prayed earnestly, I have been heard and have obtained more than I prayed for. God sometimes delays, but He always comes.
life.author: Martin Luther

life.quote: The true man wants two things: danger and play. For that reason he wants woman, as the most dangerous plaything.
life.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

life.quote: Surround yourself with people who make you happy. People who make you laugh, who help you when you’re in need. People who genuinely care. They are the ones worth keeping in your life. Everyone else is just passing through.
life.author: Karl Marx

life.quote: A clever person solves a problem. A wise person avoids it.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: We can judge the heart of a man by his treatment of animals.
life.author: Immanuel Kant

life.quote: Show me a man who has never made a mistake, and I will show you one who has never tried anything.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: The whole being of any Christian is faith and love. Faith brings the person to God, love brings the person to people.
life.author: Martin Luther

life.quote: When Satan tells me I am a sinner he comforts me immeasurably, since Christ died for sinners.
life.author: Martin Luther

life.quote: Sometimes the easiest way to solve a problem is to stop participating in the problem.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: Mankind invented the atomic bomb,but no mouse would ever constructa mousetrap.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: Nobody is more inferior than those who insist on being equal.
life.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

life.quote: And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music.
life.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

life.quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: Sweat saves blood, blood saves lives, but brains saves both.
life.author: Erwin Rommel

life.quote: Don't wait for miracles, your whole life is a miracle.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: The woman who follows the crowd will usually go on further than the crowd. The woman who walks alone is likely to find herself in places no one has ever been before.
life.author: Albert Einstein

life.quote: A happy fart never comes from a miserable ass.
life.author: Martin Luther

life.quote: My solitude doesn’t depend on the presence or absence of people; on the contrary, I hate who steals my solitude without, in exchange, offering me true company.
life.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

life.quote: Don't fight a battle if you don't gain anything by winning.
life.author: Erwin Rommel

life.quote: The sin underneath all our sins is to trust the lie of the serpent that we cannot trust the love and grace of Christ and must take matters into our own hands
life.author: Martin Luther

life.quote: You can't measure success if you have never failed. My father has taught me that if you really do want to reach your goals, you can't spend any time worrying about whether you're going to win or lose. Focus only on getting better.
life.author: Steffi Graf

life.quote: One day you will ask me which is more important? My life or yours? I will say mine and you will walk away not knowing that you are my life.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: Life is like a camera. Focus on what's important. Capture the good times. And if things don't work out, just take another shot.
life.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

life.quote: If indeed you must be candid, be candid beautifully.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: If I could take your troublesI would toss them into the sea,But all these things I'm findingAre impossible for me.I cannot build a mountainOr catch a rainbow fair,But let me be what I know best,A friend that is always there.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: And God said, Love your enemy, & I obeyed Him & loved myself.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: Between what is said and not meant, and what is meant and not said, most of love is lost.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: Kindness is like snow - it beautifies everything it covers.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: And ever has it been known that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: If you reveal your secrets to the wind, you should not blame the wind for revealing them to the trees.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: Our anxiety does not come from thinking about the future, but from wanting to control it.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the greatest intention.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: We are limited, not by our abilities, but by our vision.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: Travel and tell no one, live a true love story and tell no one, live happily and tell no one, people ruin beautiful things.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: Keep me away from the wisdom which does not cry, the philosophy which does not laugh and the greatness which does not bow before children.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: Keep me away from the wisdom which does not cry, the philosophy which does not laugh, and the greatness which does not bow before children.
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: Keep your heart in wonder at the daily miracles of your life.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. And if they don't, they never were.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: Life is like photography. You need the negatives to develop.
life.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

life.quote: Our anxiety does not come from thinking about the future, but from wanting to control it.
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: It is wrong to think that love comes from long companionship and persevering courtship. Love is the offspring of spiritual affinity and unless that affinity is created in a moment, it will not be created for years or even generations.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: I have learned silence from the talkative, toleration from the intolerant, and kindness from the unkind; yet, strange, I am ungrateful to those teachers.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: How narrow is the vision that exalts the busyness of the ant above the singing of the grasshopper.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: To understand the heart and mind of a person, look not at what he has already achieved, but at what he aspires to.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: Love is the only flower that grows and blossoms without the aid of the seasons
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: There's no need to be perfect to inspire others. Let people get inspired by how you deal with your imperfections.
life.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

life.quote: And let the winds of the heavens dance between you.
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: And let the winds of the heavens dance between you.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: There must be something strangely sacred about salt. It is in our tears and in the sea.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: We choose our joys and sorrows long before we experience them.
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: Our worst fault is our preoccupation with the faults of others.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: Be like the flower, turn your face to the sun.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: When you are joyous, look deep into your heart and you shall find it is only that which has given you sorrow that is giving you joy. When you are sorrowful look again in your heart, and you shall see that in truth you are weeping for that which has been your delight.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: When you are sorrowful look again in your heart, and you shall see that in truth you are weeping for that which has been your delight.
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: Yesterday is but today's memory, and tomorrow is today's dream.
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: When you reach the end of what you should know, you will be at the beginning of what you should sense.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: The universe is my country and the human family is my tribe.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: Life is like an elevator. On your way up, sometimes you have to stop and let some people off.
life.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

life.quote: Beauty is not in the face; Beauty is a light in the heart.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: I love you when you bow in your mosque, kneel in your temple, pray in your church. For you and I are sons of one religion, and it is the spirit.
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossom and fruit.
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: The mother is everything - she is our consolation in sorrow, our hope in misery, and our strength in weakness. She is the source of love, mercy, sympathy, and forgiveness. He who loses his mother loses a pure soul who blesses and guards him constantly
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: If I accept the sunshine and warmth, then I must also accept the thunder and lightning.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: He who has not looked on sorrow will never see joy.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: If your heart is a volcano, how shall you expect flowers to bloom?
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: We wanderers, ever seeking the lonelier way, begin no day where we have ended another day; and no sunrise finds us where sunset left us.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: A little knowledge that acts is worth infinitely more than much knowledge that is idle.
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding.
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: Love is a magic ray emitted from the burning core of the soul and illuminating the surrounding earth. It enables us to perceive life as a beautiful dream between one awakening and another.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: Love is trembling happiness.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strangest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: Poetry is a deal of joy and pain and wonder, with a dash of the dictionary.
life.author: Khalil Gibran

life.quote: They consider me to have sharp and penetrating vision because I see them through the mesh of a sieve.
life.author: Kahlil Gibran

life.quote: My mission is a cosmic mission. My concern is for all of humanity, and not only this present world, but the world hereafter. My mission penetrates the past, present, and future, and encompasses all humanity.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: Even though we are deceived, still believe. Though we are betrayed, still forgive. Love completely even those who hate you.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: I served the famous professors and scholars, and eventually they learned that the Reverend Moon is superior to them. Even Nobel laureate academics who thought they were at the center of knowledge are as nothing in front of me.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: Those who are the most devout, outstanding Unification Church members are they the most beautiful people externally or just so-so? Very often, those who have the features of an Idaho potato are the most loyal members of the Unification Church.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: More precious than life is love, for there can be no life without love.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: Even the smallest and most trivial thing can bring you happiness when you do it for another.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: Up until today evil has lured goodness into evil, but goodness has not been able to lure evil into goodness. This may be the reason why up to today Christianity has not been able to boldly fulfill the Will of God.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: True Love comes into being when you practice the highest possible love in the lowest possible place. There you deal with impossible people and try to raise them into the highest possible people by showing them the highest possible standard. There is where True Love can be found and can start.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: If you convey God's words to someone only with the intention to utilize him in some way, you will never be able to establish the standard of the "Way." Give what you have to others with your sincere heart.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: Looking at the Moonies from the normal, common-sense point of view, we certainly appear to be a bunch of crazy people!
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: The true sovereign is not the American president nor the English king, but the Lord of the Second Advent.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: If there is illness in your home, do you not need a doctor from outside? If your home catches on fire, do you not need fire fighters from outside? God has sent me to America in the role of a doctor, in the role of a fire fighter.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: I created the Women's Federation for World Peace in order to restore all that woman originally lost. You American women don't need a man in the position of grandfather, parents, husband, elder or younger brother. You only need the true Adam.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: I can understand why Christians call us heretics. But most important, who will God call a heretic? From God's point of view, my revelation is deeply orthodox.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: No matter how difficult your situation may be you have to follow the Lord of the Second Advent completely.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: The democratic world has come to a dead end; likewise, the communist world has come to a dead end. But the Unification Church is just beginning!
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: Communism is trying to take the world by force. But God will take the world by love.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: A member must say that he is a member of the Unification Church and that he is the follower of Sun Myung Moon. If he doesn't have the courage to say it, he is not worthy of me.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: There are enough churches already, but the world still needs salvation.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: The day will come, however, when they will truly know the Unification Church and me. The day will come when the truth will be known and the message of love will be taught. On that day, their regret will be deep.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: Before children, even the most cynical people throw down their usual masks and become capable of feeling the purity and love which all human beings seek.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: Don't live your life as though you were measuring it with a ruler.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: The whole world is in my hand, and I will conquer and subjugate the world.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: In a way then, the Divine Principle, this new revelation, is the documentary of my life. It is my own life experience. The Divine Principle is in me, and I am in the Divine Principle.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: Am I foolish and insignificant or am I great? I gave all the individuals in the world cause to kneel down in front of me.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: If you tell a lie to make a person better, then that is not a sin.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: This is normal, to have pressure. It's how you respond. Take the pressure, use the pressure, have fun.
life.author: Chan Ho Park

life.quote: True religious movements prosper and flourish under tribulation.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: There are many crooked lines and one straight line. Which is the line of truth? Why the straight line? Truth is always the shortest distance between two points.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: Let's say there are 500 sons and daughters like you in each state. Then we could control the government.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: In restoring man from evil sovereignty, we must cheat.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: In my opinion, if we have not achieved peace, it is because people forget its most fundamental aspect. Before we talk about peace among nations, we must settle our peace with God.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: Every religious pioneer, including Jesus Christ, was persecuted by his contemporaries. But once people understand me, their turn can be dramatic like Saint Paul's.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: I'm just a big homebody and love word games like Scrabble and Boggle.
life.author: Sung Hi Lee

life.quote: A God who fits within the confines of our conception is useless. God cannot be comprehended by man's conception or logic. God is an eternal being who transcends the framework of man's limited logic.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: The time has come when the whole world must be concerned about me. From now on, American Christianity must follow me.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: My every action is to liberate God from his sorrow.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: I know the established Christian theology... I know the enemy, but the enemy doesn't know me. Thus the enemy has already lost the war.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: I did not come here to repeat what you already know. I have come to reveal something new. I want to share with you a new revelation from God.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: Throughout history no one has suffered more than God. He has suffered because his own children fell away from him. Ever since the Fall, God has been working tirelessly for the restoration of mankind. People do not know this brokenhearted aspect of God.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: If you refrain from judging your worst enemy, his children will come to your side. What more severe judgment could come upon an enemy than this?
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: Absolute faith is not the place of self-affirmation, but the place of self-negation. Life of faith is not limited to our spiritual life. What is important is how our spiritual sensitivity is applied to our relative environment.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: I would not be standing here today if my skin were white or my religion were Presbyterian. I am here today only because my skin is yellow and my religion is Unification Church. The ugliest things in this beautiful country of America are religious bigotry and racism.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: If the world had attended me after World War II, it would have been united within seven years, and there would have been no suffering of the Unification Church and no damage to the democratic world.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: Remember that the Unification Church rose, not in freedom, but from a prison, the pit of suffering.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: It's fun to be a girl, and get dressed up, but that's not how I really am.
life.author: Sung Hi Lee

life.quote: Give love and forget that you gave it.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: So telling a lie becomes a sin if you tell it to take advantage of a person, but if you tell a lie to do a good thing for him that is not a sin. Even God tells lies very often; you can see this throughout history.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: I want to be a starter again, I would really enjoy playing for the Phillies again, but my first consideration in making my decision is finding a circumstance that is right for me. I want to play for the Phillies again, but I also wouldn't mind joining a team I've never played with before.
life.author: Chan Ho Park

life.quote: Jesus said, "I am the way, the truth, and the life." In order for you yourself to become the way, the truth, and the life, you must embrace the whole universe and bring harmony to it.
life.author: Sun Myung Moon

life.quote: Leadership is a privilege to better the lives of others. It is not an opportunity to satisfy personal greed.
life.author: Mwai Kibaki

life.quote: You can make a lot of speeches, but the real thing is when you dig a hole, plant a tree, give it water, and make it survive. That's what makes the difference
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: You cannot protect the environment unless you empower people, you inform them, and you help them understand that these resources are their own, that they must protect them.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: When we plant trees, we plant the seeds of peace and seeds of hope.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: Every person who has ever achieved anything has been knocked down many times. But all of them picked themselves up and kept going, and that is what I have always tried to do.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: African women in general need to know that it's OK for them to be the way they are - to see the way they are as a strength, and to be liberated from fear and from silence.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: Its the little things citizens do. Thats what will make the difference.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: We cannot tire or give up. We owe it to the present and future generations of all species to rise up and walk!
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: The constitution is the ultimate custodian of social will and its making should be accorded all due diligence.
life.author: Mwai Kibaki

life.quote: We’re constantly being bombarded by problems that we face and sometimes we can get completely overwhelmed. [But] we should always feel like a hummingbird. I may feel insignificant, but I don’t want to be like the other animals watching the planet go down the drain. I’ll be a hummingbird, I’ll do the best I can.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: There are opportunities even in the most difficult moments.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: When I first started, it was really an innocent response to the needs of women in rural areas. When we started planting trees to meet their needs, there was nothing beyond that. I did not see all the issues that I have to come to deal with.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: Sometimes we become bound by other people's thoughts because we are not sure about ourselves.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: Let us reject violence and selfishness which could destroy our country's unity.
life.author: Mwai Kibaki

life.quote: We are called to assist the Earth to heal her wounds and in the process heal our own - indeed, to embrace the whole creation in all its diversity, beauty and wonder. This will happen if we see the need to revive our sense of belonging to a larger family of life, with which we have shared our evolutionary process.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: All of us have a God in us, and that God is the spirit that unites all life, everything that is on this planet. It must be this voice that is telling me to do something, and I am sure it's the same voice that is speaking to everybody on this planet - at least everybody who seems to be concerned about the fate of the world, the fate of this planet.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: I am ready to have dialogue with the concerned parties once the nation is calm and the political temperatures are lowered enough for constructive and productive engagement.
life.author: Mwai Kibaki

life.quote: May hard work, and justice, always cement our bonds of unity that we may get our country back to production.
life.author: Mwai Kibaki

life.quote: I am deeply disturbed by the senseless violence instigated by some leaders in pursuit of their personal political agenda.
life.author: Mwai Kibaki

life.quote: Those of us who have been privileged to receive education, skills, and experiences and even power must be role models for the next generation of leadership.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: The era of 'anything goes' is gone for ever.
life.author: Mwai Kibaki

life.quote: It is important to nurture any new ideas and initiatives which can make a difference for Africa.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: There is no room for communists in Kenya.
life.author: Mwai Kibaki

life.quote: Anybody can dig a hole and plant a tree. But make sure it survives. You have to nurture it, you have to water it, you have to keep at it until it becomes rooted so it can take care or itself. There are so many enemies of trees.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: The living conditions of the poor must be improved if we really want to save our environment
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: I am working to make sure we don't only protect the environment, we also improve governance.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: Those of us who witness the degraded state of the environment and the suffering that comes with it cannot afford to be complacent. We continue to be restless. If we really carry the burden, we are driven to action. We cannot tire or give up. We owe it to the present and future generations of all species to rise up and walk!
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: Education is a very empowering experience, so many people who went to school also managed to improve their quality of life much faster because they could get a job, they could get money. Once people see that you improve your life if you are educated, then education becomes a valuable tool and people want it.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: Government will no longer be run on the whims of individuals.
life.author: Mwai Kibaki

life.quote: If you make mistakes that is alright because we all make mistakes and we learn from those mistakes. You gain confidence from learning, failing and rising again.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: But when you have bad governance, of course, these resources are destroyed: The forests are deforested, there is illegal logging, there is soil erosion. I got pulled deeper and deeper and saw how these issues become linked to governance, to corruption, to dictatorship.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: Disempowerment - whether defined in terms of a lack of self-confidence , apathy, fear, or an inability to take charge of one's own life - is perhaps the most unrecognised problem in Africa today.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: The little grassroots people can change this world.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: Women are responsible for their children, they cannot sit back, waste time and see them starve.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: Because I was a woman, I was vulnerable. It was easy to vilify me and project me as a woman who was not following the tradition of a 'good African woman.'
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: For us who are now in power, we need to be challenged to serve the people and ignore our own egos and personal interests so that we can really demonstrate to other African states that it is possible to share power without going to war.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: Tradition sometimes excludes the girl child from inheriting; or single women may not want to be perceived as pursuing too much property. The law has come a long way in favor of the woman, but it is the tradition, the attitudes, that we often have to fight.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: Some say that AIDS came from the monkeys, and I doubt that because we have been living with monkeys from time immemorial, others say it was a curse from God, but I say it cannot be that.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: We can work together for a better world with men and women of goodwill, those who radiate the intrinsic goodness of humankind.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: It gradually became clear that the Green Belt Movement's work with communities to repair the degraded environment could not be done effectively without participants embracing a set of core spiritual values.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: That's the way I do things when I want to celebrate, I always plant a tree.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: The issue of carbon is one area where we really need to work together and if people don't have the technology they need, that technology needs to be made available and affordable.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: The essential role of the environment is still marginal in discussions about poverty. While we continue to debate these initiatives, environmental degradation, including the loss of biodiversity and topsoil, accelerates, causing development efforts to falter.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: We have a responsibility to protect the rights of generations, of all species, that cannot speak for themselves today. The global challenge of climate change requires that we ask no less of our leaders, or ourselves.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: The people are learning that you cannot leave decisions only to leaders. Local groups have to create the political will for change, rather than waiting for others to do things for them. That is where positive, and sustainable, change begins.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: There's a general culture in this country to cut all the trees. It makes me so angry because everyone is cutting and no one is planting.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: There are certain areas where foreign investors can help the local people to generate wealth, and improve their quality of life. Some companies, for example, Del Monte, which produces pineapples in Kenya, pay a huge amount of taxes, I am sure, to the Kenyan government, and they do create jobs for thousands of locals.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: When you think of all the conflicts we have - whether those conflicts are local, whether they are regional or global - these conflicts are often over the management, the distribution of resources. If these resources are very valuable, if these resources are scarce, if these resources are degraded, there is going to be competition.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: That's the way I do things when I want to celebrate, I always plant a tree. And so I got an indigenous tree, called Nandi flame, it has this beautiful red flowers. When it is in flower it is like it is in flame.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: For me, one of the major reasons to move beyond just the planting of trees was that I have tendency to look at the causes of a problem. We often preoccupy ourselves with the symptoms, whereas if we went to the root cause of the problems, we would be able to overcome the problems once and for all.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: It is wonderful when you don't have the fear, and a lot of the time I don't ... I focus on what needs to be done instead.
life.author: Wangari Maathai

life.quote: It is not cowardly, quite the contrary, to seek to meet the adversary and know his intentions. However, it is cowardly, shameful and treasonable to lay down arms.
life.author: King Hassan II

life.quote: I was a hero, and a second afterwards it was all over. Casartelli was dead so what I had achieved was worth nothing.
life.author: Richard Virenque

life.quote: You can say that climbers suffer the same as the other riders, but they suffer in a different way. You feel the pain, but you're glad to be there.
life.author: Richard Virenque

life.quote: I beg the Most High to allow me the favour of the double reward, but if God only finds me worthy of one reward, I will accept it in all humility.
life.author: King Hassan II

life.quote: I symbolized doping... My phone rarely rings. I can count on the fingers of one hand the number of riders who call me.
life.author: Richard Virenque

life.quote: Worrying gets you nowhere. If you turn up worrying about how you're going to perform, you've already lost. Train hard, turn up, run your best and the rest will take care of itself.
life.author: Usain Bolt

life.quote: If she's amazing, she won't be easy. If she's easy, she won't be amazing. If she's worth it, you wont give up. If you give up, you're not worthy. ... Truth is, everybody is going to hurt you; you just gotta find the ones worth suffering for.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: We must give up the silly idea of folding our hands and waiting on God to do everything for us. If God had intended for that, then he would not have given us a mind. Whatever you want in life, you must make up your mind to do it for yourself.
life.author: Marcus Garvey

life.quote: You never know how strong you are, until being strong is your only choice.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: The Black skin is not a badge of shame, but rather a glorious symbol of national greatness.
life.author: Marcus Garvey

life.quote: Easy is not a option..No days off..Never Quit..Be Fearless..Talent you have Naturally..Skill is only developed by hours and hours of Work
life.author: Usain Bolt

life.quote: Some people feel the rain, others just get wet.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: A people without the knowledge of their past history, origin and culture is like a tree without roots.
life.author: Marcus Garvey

life.quote: He's not perfect. You aren't either, and the two of you will never be perfect. But if he can make you laugh at least once, causes you to think twice, and if he admits to being human and making mistakes, hold onto him and give him the most you can.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: The biggest coward of a man is to awaken the love of a woman without the intention of loving her.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: Only once in your life, I truly believe, you find someone who can completely turn your world around. You tell them things that you've never shared with another soul and they absorb everything you say and actually want to hear more.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: Judge not, before you judge yourself.Judge not, if you're not ready for judgment.The Road of life is rocky and you may stumble too,so while you talk about me, someone else is judging you.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: If we as a people realized the greatness from which we came we would be less likely to disrespect ourselves.
life.author: Marcus Garvey

life.quote: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: Money is numbers and numbers never end. If it takes money to be happy, your search for happiness will never end.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: I trust that you will so live today as to realize that you are masters of your own destiny, masters of your fate; if there is anything you want in this world, it is for you to strike out with confidence and faith in self and reach for it.
life.author: Marcus Garvey

life.quote: The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth he acquires, but in his integrity and his ability to affect those around him positively.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: The most beautiful curve on a woman’s body is her smile.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: Love, friendship, laughter... Some of the best things in life really are free.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: The most beautiful things are not perfect, they are special
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: Some people feel the rain. Other just get wet.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: Do not remove the kinks from your hair--remove them from your brain.
life.author: Marcus Garvey

life.quote: The man who is not able to develop and use his mind is bound to be the slave of the other man who uses his mind
life.author: Marcus Garvey

life.quote: Why drink and drive if I can smoke and fly?
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: Every man has a right to his own opinion. Every race has a right to its own action; therefore let no man persuade you against your will, let no other race influence you against your own.
life.author: Marcus Garvey

life.quote: The truth is, everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: Some people feel the rain. Others just get wet.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: Better to die fighting for freedom than be a prisoner all the days of your life.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: The white man has succeeded in subduing the world by forcing everybody to think his way....The white man's propaganda has made him the master of the world, and all those who have come in contact with it and accepted it have become his slaves.
life.author: Marcus Garvey

life.quote: love the life you live. live the life you love.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: beginnings are usually scary, and endings are usually sad, but its everything in between that makes it all worth living.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: One good thing about music, when it hits you, you feel no pain.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: Love hard when there is love to be had. Because perfect guys don’t exist, but there’s always one guy that is perfect for you.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: Believe in your dreams and that anything is possible.
life.author: Usain Bolt

life.quote: If you don't start somewhere, you're gonna go nowhere.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: to love is to risk, not being loved in return. to hope is to risk pain. to try is to risk failure. but risk must be taken because the greatest hazard in my life is to risk nothing.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: My philosophy is: if you don't bear a cross, you can't wear a crown so you gotta go through some form of humiliation to reach tribulation.
life.author: Peter Tosh

life.quote: I think sometimes, when you're on top and all you do is win, win, win, win, win, you get lazy and lose focus. When you lose it opens your eyes and you get serious. There is always a time when it is good to lose, at the right time for you.
life.author: Usain Bolt

life.quote: At the end of the day, you can have something in your head, something in your hand, or something in your heart. What are you choosing?
life.author: Mooji

life.quote: Live for yourself and you will live in vain; Live for others, and you will live again.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: If you don't start somewhere, you're gonna go nowhere.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: The things that seem insignificant to most people such as note, song, or walk become invaluable trasures kept safe in your heart to cherish forever.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: Better to die fighting for freedom then be a prisoner all the days of your life.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: Music is a science, it heals depression, it awakens, most people don't know, they just take music for an entertainment, something to dance to, and enjoy yourself and you go to bed and forget it tomorrow, music must never be forgotten, it's like a fountain that keeps on flowing
life.author: Peter Tosh

life.quote: You may not be her first, her last, or her only. She loved before she may love again. But if she loves you now, what else matters?
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: All the ups and downs are grace in different wrappings, sent to refine consciousness. Say thanks to them all.
life.author: Mooji

life.quote: You find that being vulnerable is the only way to allow your heart to feel true pleasure that's so real it scares you. You find strength in knowing you have a true friend and possibly a soul mate who will remain loyal to the end.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: Emancipate yourselves from mental slavery, none but ourselves can free our minds!
life.author: Marcus Garvey

life.quote: You say you love rain, but you use an umbrella to walk under it. You say you love sun, but you seek shade when it is shining. You say you love wind, but when it comes you close your window. So that's why I'm scared when you say you love me.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: None but ourselves can free our minds.
life.author: Bob Marley

life.quote: There are better starters than me but I’m a strong finisher.
life.author: Usain Bolt

life.quote: In the beginning there was the word. The word was Jah. The word is in I, Jah is in I. I make what is good, better, and what is better, best. I follow this in every aspect of life.
life.author: Peter Tosh

life.quote: My songs is hard stuff which politicians don't want on them radio station because they still want people to live in ignorancy.
life.author: Peter Tosh

life.quote: I don't need no peace. I need equal rights and justice.
life.author: Peter Tosh

life.quote: For me, I'm focused on what I want to do. I know what I need to do to be a champion, so I'm working on it.
life.author: Usain Bolt

life.quote: Feelings are just visitors. Let them come and go.
life.author: Mooji

life.quote: There can be no peace among men and nations, so long as the strong continues to oppress the weak, so long as injustice is done to other peoples, just so long we will have cause for war, and make a lasting peace an impossibility.
life.author: Marcus Garvey

life.quote: I've got to pick myself up Dust myself off And start all over again.
life.author: Peter Tosh

life.quote: Jordan has a strange, haunting beauty and a sense of timelessness. Dotted with the ruins of empires once great, it is the last resort of yesterday in the world of tomorrow. I love every inch of it.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: God willing, we shall come to a stage where the world looks at the Palestinian question, and Palestinian rights on Palestinian national soil, as well as the questions of the occupied Syrian and Lebanese territories. These are the bases on which peace will be built.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: God help us from those who believe that they are the sole possessors of truth. How we manage at times to agree willingly to become prisoners within our own minds and souls of beliefs and ideas on which we can never be flexible.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: I am totally against the idea that a Muslim woman should not have the same opportunities as a Muslim man to learn, to open up, to work, help shape the future. To close Islam down to a sexist approach is totally intolerable and ridiculous. It's not Islam.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: Real victories are those that protect human life, not those that result from its destruction or emerge from its ashes.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: I have said this in the past and I will continue to repeat it as long as I live: Whoever tries to hurt our national unity is my enemy until the day of judgement.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: It would behoove the world to become used to this fact: that without a just solution to the Palestine tragedy, there can be no stable peace in the Middle East.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: Jordan seeks to play only one role, that of a model state. It is our aim to set an example for our Arab brethren, not one that they need follow but one that will inspire them to seek a higher, happier destiny within their own borders.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: Personality is reduced and deformed with depleted thoughts and stagnant mind.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: It is my firm belief that I have a link with the past and a responsibility to the future. I cannot give up. I cannot despair. There's a whole future, generations to come. I have to keep trying.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: For our part, we shall continue to work for the new dawn when all the Children of Abraham and their descendants are living together in the birthplace of their three great monotheistic religions, a life free from fear, a life free from want - a life in peace.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: It is my firm belief that I have a link with the past and a responsibility to the future. I cannot give up. I cannot despair. There's a whole future, generations to come. I have to keep trying.
life.author: King Hussein

life.quote: Prime Minister Sharon, Prime Minister Abbas, I urge you today to end the designs of those who seek destruction, annihilation and occupation, and I urge you to have the will and the courage to begin to realize our dreams of peace, prosperity and coexistence.
life.author: Abdallah II

life.quote: The absence and suppression of justice can only open the way for extremists to exploit such a condition to perpetrate acts of violence against innocents.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: Prime Minister Sharon, Prime Minister Abbas, I urge you today to end the designs of those who seek destruction, annihilation and occupation, and I urge you to have the will and the courage to begin to realize our dreams of peace, prosperity and coexistence.
life.author: King Abdullah II

life.quote: I want to say a simple thing, that the dividing line exists not between Jordan and Israel, but between the proponents of peace and the opponents of peace.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: I am ever mindful of the legacy of my grandfather, the founder of this Kingdom, who had said to me that he perceived his life as a link in a continuous chain of those who served our nation and that he expected me to be a new and strong link in the same chain.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: We should face reality and our past mistakes in an honest, adult way. Boasting of glory does not make glory, and singing in the dark does not dispel fear.
life.author: King Hussein

life.quote: I have found in my experience that expediency, whether it is practical or not, is an unreliable guide for behavior. Human behavior must be guided by a higher principle. Practicality has its place but only within a framework of values, which all men of good will share.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: We should face reality and our past mistakes in an honest, adult way. Boasting of glory does not make glory, and singing in the dark does not dispel fear.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: What does a man seek in this world? A position, or a throne? Man seeks peace of mind and the fear of Almighty God. As long as one knows that there is ajudgement day, he tries to keep his conscience clear and do what he can.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: Let me say this loud and clear. There is a world of difference between terrorist acts and the Islamic Shari'a. Islam is not only a religion, but a way of life. And at its heart lie the sacred principles of tolerance and dialogue.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: In this life struggle, here I am among you fully cognizant that a true believer has no fear of what God has ordained for him. Those who are visited by fear live only for their present, under the illusion that the world began with them and will end with their departure.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: We respect opposition to any position or policy. But we believe that the opinion that should prevail and be respected is that of the majority.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: Together, we can create a world in which peace is real; in which every human being can thrive; in which all share the promise of our century. I believe we can succeed.
life.author: Abdallah II

life.quote: Fundamentalism as it is called is not confined to the Muslim world. It is something that we have seen in different parts of the world. Let us hope that a dialogue between the followers of the three great monotheistic religions could help in putting an end to this.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: We believe democracy to be the only real guarantor of stability and we have sought to create a 'Jordanian model' that might also inspire others in our region. I wish democracy and peace to be my legacy to my people and the shield of generations to come.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: Without peace and without the overwhelming majority of people that believe in peace defending it, working for it, believing in it, security can never really be a reality.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: We have peace with Israel. We're actually the last man standing. So there is going to be immense pressure and people asking, 'Why are we having this relationship when it's not benefiting anybody?' Obviously, my answer is you always benefit from peace.
life.author: Abdallah II

life.quote: Extremists, who thrive on conflict; who do not tolerate diversity; who seek power through division and destruction. The global system they hope to create is one of new walls and new isolation, and radically smaller horizons. It is an anti-democratic, anti-economic-growth, and anti-progress agenda.
life.author: Abdallah II

life.quote: I wish to say to you that the life of an enlightened people and a vibrant nation cannot be measured by the life of an individual. A successful person is one who manages to lay down a new stone, a brick that would help firm up his nation's existence.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: We want to be, I think, an example for the rest of the Arab world, because there are a lot of people who say that the only democracy you can have in the Middle East is the Muslim Brotherhood.
life.author: King Abdullah II

life.quote: I think the success of democracy is not really police security; it's the presence of a broad middle class. The stronger the middle class of a people is, the less you have to worry about one group coming in and exploiting the democratic process for its own ends.
life.author: Abdallah II

life.quote: Historic changes and challenges. Breakthroughs in human knowledge and opportunity. And yet, for vast numbers across the globe, the daily realities have not altered.
life.author: Abdallah II

life.quote: The monarchy that I hand over to my son is not going to be the same one that I have inherited.
life.author: Abdallah II

life.quote: It's a tremendous responsibility to be direct descendants of the prophet Muhammad. This family has had the burden of leadership on its shoulders for 1,400 years. I'm not going to drop the ball on my shift.
life.author: Abdallah II

life.quote: The Middle East has the highest unemployment percentage of any region in the world we have the largest youth cohort of history coming into the market place that frustration does translate into the political sphere when people are hungry and without jobs.
life.author: Abdallah II

life.quote: When there's a status quo, usually what shakes everybody up is some sort of military confrontation, at which point we all come running and screaming to pick up the pieces.
life.author: Abdallah II

life.quote: We have no right to dictate, through irresponsible action or narrow-mindedness, the future of our children, and our children's children. There has been enough destruction, enough death, enough waste.
life.author: Abdallah II

life.quote: In our view, successful reform is not an event. It is a sustainable process that will build on its own successes - a virtuous cycle of change.
life.author: Abdallah II

life.quote: Earth's dispossessed are vulnerable targets for extremists: those who teach that global justice is meaningless; that satisfaction can come only in violence, division, and intellectual isolation.
life.author: Abdallah II

life.quote: Over the past few years, the road to confrontation has shown its consequences: loss of innocent lives, destruction and fear. Most costly, however, was the loss of hope. The most precious gift that you can present to your peoples over the coming weeks is renewed hope born out of tangible progress on the ground.
life.author: King Abdullah II

life.quote: Many will view the compromises that will be made during your negotiations as painful concessions. But why not view them as peace offerings, ones that will provide in return the priceless gifts of hope, security and freedom for our children and our children's?
life.author: King Abdullah II

life.quote: Remember you don't do anything in isolation.
life.author: Abdallah II

life.quote: When I talk to people in need, they tell me they want to hope; they are eager for opportunity; they are ready for better days. And I can tell you that every time their hopes are disappointed, all nations lose.
life.author: Abdallah II

life.quote: No matter what's happening in the Middle East - the Arab Spring, et cetera, the economic challenges, high rates of unemployment - the emotional, critical issue is always the Israeli-Palestinian one.
life.author: King Abdullah II

life.quote: Blowing up buses will not induce the Israelis to move forward, and neither will the killing of Palestinians or the demolition of their homes and their future. All this needs to stop. And we pledge that Jordan will do its utmost to help achieve it.
life.author: King Abdullah II

life.quote: Political development should start at the grassroots.
life.author: Abdallah II

life.quote: If you look at military and intelligence positions from the 1950s, the Israeli-Palestinian conflict has always been against American national interests.
life.author: Abdallah II

life.quote: We belong to the camp of peace. We believe in peace. We believe that our one God wishes us to live in peace and wishes peace upon us, for these are His teachings to all the followers of the three great monotheistic religions, the Children of Abraham.
life.author: King Hussein I

life.quote: The motto should not be: Forgive one another; rather understand one another.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: The most violent element in society is ignorance.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: People have only as much liberty as they have the intelligence to want and the courage to take.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: Only when human sorrows are turned into a toy with glaring colors will baby people become interested - for a while at least. The people are a very fickle baby that must have new toys every day.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: I demand the independence of woman, her right to support herself; to live for herself; to love whomever she pleases, or as many as she pleases. I demand freedom for both sexes, freedom of action, freedom in love and freedom in motherhood.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: If love does not know how to give and take without restrictions, it is not love, but a transaction that never fails to lay stress on a plus and a minus.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: The most violent element in society is ignorance.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: To the moralist prostitution does not consist so much in the fact that the woman sells her body, but rather that she sells it out of wedlock.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: The demand for equal rights in every vocation of life is just and fair; but, after all, the most vital right is the right to love and be loved.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: I'd rather have roses on my table than diamonds on my neck.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: If voting changed anything, they'd make it illegal.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: It is a tragedy, I feel, that people of a different sexual type are caught in a world which shows so little understanding for homosexuals and is so crassly indifferent to the various gradations and variations of gender and their great significance in life.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: Before we can forgive one another, we have to understand one another.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: The history of progress is written in the blood of men and women who have dared to espouse an unpopular cause, as, for instance, the black man's right to his body, or woman's right to her soul.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: Anarchism stands for the liberation of the human mind from the dominion of religion and liberation of the human body from the coercion of property; liberation from the shackles and restraint of government. It stands for a social order based on the free grouping of individuals.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: I believe that if it were left to artists to choose their own labels, most would choose none.
life.author: Ben Shahn

life.quote: Politicians promise you heaven before election and give you hell after
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: Above all, you must fight conceit, envy, and every kind of ill-feeling in your heart.
life.author: Abraham Cahan

life.quote: Jealousy is indeed a poor medium to secure love, but it is a secure medium to destroy one's self-respect. For jealous people, like dope-fiends, stoop to the lowest level and in the end inspire only disgust and loathing.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: Merely external emancipation has made of the modern woman an artificial being. Now, woman is confronted with the necessity of emancipating herself from emancipation, if she really desires to be free.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: The ultimate end of all revolutionary social change is to establish the sanctity of human life, the dignity of man, the right of every human being to liberty and well-being.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: I want freedom, the right to self-expression , everybody's right to beautiful, radiant things.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: wealth means power: the power to subdue, to crush, to exploit, the power to enslave, to outrage, to degrade.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: The State is the altar of political freedom and, like the religious altar, it is maintained for the purpose of human sacrifice.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: The State, every government whatever its form, character or color - be it absolute or constitutional, monarchy or republic, Fascist, Nazi or bolshevik - is by its very nature conservative, static, intolerant of change and opposed to it.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: Religion! How it dominates man's mind, how it humiliates and degrades his soul. God is everything, man is nothing, says religion.But out of that nothing God has created a kingdom so despotic, so tyrannical, so cruel, so terribly exacting that naught but gloom and tears and blood have ruled the world since gods began.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: No great idea in its beginning can ever be within the law. How can it be within the law? The law is stationary. The law is fixed. The law is a chariot wheel which binds us all regardless of conditions or place or time.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: No one has yet realized the wealth of sympathy, the kindness and generosity hidden in the soul of a child. The effort of every true education should be to unlock that treasure.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: ...The greatest bulwark of capitalism is militarism.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: To the indefinite, uncertain mind of the American radical the most contradictory ideas and methods are possible. The result is a sad chaos in the radical movement, a sort of intellectual hash, which has neither taste nor character.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: Life without an ideal is spiritual death.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: Someone has said that it requires less mental effort to condemn than to think.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: It is essential that we realize once and for all that man is much more of a sex creature than a moral creature. The former is inherent, the other is grafted on.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: Art is a part of the rebellion against the realities of its unfulfilled desire.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: 'What I believe' is a process rather than a finality. Finalities are for gods and governments, not for the human intellect.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: The spirit of militarism has already permeated all walks of life. Indeed, I am convinced that militarism is a greater danger here than anywhere else, because of the many bribes capitalism holds out to those whom it wishes to destroy.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: Every daring attempt to make a great change in existing conditions, every lofty vision of new possibilities for the human race, has been labeled Utopian.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: I do not believe in God, because I believe in man. Whatever his mistakes, man has for thousands of years been working to undo the botched job your god has made.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: How long would authority ... exist, if not for the willingness of the mass to become soldiers, policemen, jailers, and hangmen.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: The most unpardonable sin in society is independence of thought.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: If a man is tongue-tied, don't laugh at him, but, rather, feel pity for him, as you would for a man with broken legs.
life.author: Abraham Cahan

life.quote: If not for the direct action of a John Brown and his comrades, America would still trade in the flesh of the black man.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: Anarchism, then, really stands for the liberation of the human mind from the dominion of religion.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: Religion, the dominion of the human mind; Property, the dominion of human needs; and Government, the dominion of human conduct, represent the stronghold of man's enslavement and all the horrors it entails.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: Rather would I have the love songs of romantic ages, rather Don Juan and Madame Venus, rather an elopement by ladder and rope on a moonlight night, followed by the father's curse, mother's moans, and the moral comments of neighbors, than correctness and propriety measured by yardsticks.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: Conceit, arrogance, and egotism are the essentials of patriotism.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: The people are urged to be patriotic ... by sacrificing their own children. Patriotism requires allegience to the flag, which means obedience and readiness to kill father, mother, brother, sister.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: Remember that it is not enough to abstain from lying by word of mouth; for the worst lies are often conveyed by a false look, smile, or act.
life.author: Abraham Cahan

life.quote: Lack of fairness to an opponent is essentially a sign of weakness.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: true emancipation ... will have to do away with the absurd notion of the dualism of the sexes, or that man and woman represent two antagonistic worlds.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: In modern capitalism economic exploitation rather than political oppression is the real enemy of the people.
life.author: Emma Goldman

life.quote: Truth is not what you want it to be; it is what it is, and you must bend to its power or live a lie.
life.author: Miyamoto Musashi

life.quote: No Fear, No Hesitation, No Surprise, No Doubt
life.author: Miyamoto Musashi

life.quote: Fixation is the way to death. Fluidity is the way to life.
life.author: Miyamoto Musashi

life.quote: In time, all things work to your advantage when you pursue them with an open heart.
life.author: Miyamoto Musashi

life.quote: Do not think dishonestly... Distinguish between gain and loss in worldly matters. Develop intuitive judgement and understanding for everything. Perceive those things which cannot be seen. Pay attention even to trifles. Do nothing which is of no use.
life.author: Miyamoto Musashi

life.quote: A man cannot understand the art he is studying if he only looks for the end result without taking the time to delve deeply into the reasoning of the study.
life.author: Miyamoto Musashi

life.quote: A polka-dot has the form of the sun, which is a symbol of the energy of the whole world and our living life, and also the form of the moon, which is calm. Round, soft, colourful, senseless and unknowing. Polka-dots can't stay alone; like the communicative life of people, two or three polka-dots become movement... Polka-dots are a way to infinity.
life.author: Yayoi Kusama

life.quote: Whatever your determination or will power, it is foolish to try to change the nature of things. Things work the way they do because that is the way of things
life.author: Miyamoto Musashi

life.quote: True warriors are fierce because their training is fierce.
life.author: Miyamoto Musashi

life.quote: And once the storm is over, you won’t remember how you made it through, how you managed to survive. You won’t even be sure, whether the storm is really over. But one thing is certain. When you come out of the storm, you won’t be the same person who walked in. That’s what this storm’s all about.
life.author: Haruki Murakami

life.quote: I fight pain, anxiety, and fear every day, and the only method I have found that relieves my illness is to keep creating art. I followed the thread of art and somehow discovered a path that would allow me to live.
life.author: Yayoi Kusama

life.quote: There is nothing outside of yourself. That can ever enable you to get better, stronger, richer, quicker or smarter. Everything is within. Everything exists. Seek nothing outside of yourself.
life.author: Miyamoto Musashi

life.quote: The true science of martial arts means practicing them in such a way that they will be useful at any time, and to teach them in such a way that they will be useful in all things.
life.author: Miyamoto Musashi

life.quote: What we see before us is just one tiny part of the world. We get in the habit of thinking, this is the world, but that's not true at all. The real world is a much darker and deeper place than this, and much of it is occupied by jellyfish and things.
life.author: Haruki Murakami

life.quote: Become one with eternity.Become part of your environment.Take off your clothes.Forget yourself. Make love.Self-destruction is the onlyway to peace.
life.author: Yayoi Kusama

life.quote: In battle, if you you make your opponent flinch, you have already won.
life.author: Miyamoto Musashi

life.quote: There is nothing outside of yourself that can ever enable you to get better, stronger, richer, quicker, or smarter. Everything is whithin. Everything exists. Seek nothing outside of yourself.
life.author: Miyamoto Musashi

life.quote: It's important to create what you desire to, not what people expect you to.
life.author: Shigeru Miyamoto

life.quote: The whole moon and the entire sky are reflected in one dewdrop on the grass.
life.author: Dogen

life.quote: Do not follow the ideas of others, but learn to listen to the voice within yourself. Your body and mind will become clear and you will realize the unity of all things.
life.author: Dogen

life.quote: Polka dots can't stay alone. When we obliterate nature and our bodies with polka dots, we become part of the unity of our environments.
life.author: Yayoi Kusama

life.quote: Life is growth. If we stop growing, technically and spiritually, we are as good as dead.
life.author: Morihei Ueshiba

life.quote: Unclose your mind. You are not a prisoner. You are a bird in flight, searching the skies for dreams.
life.author: Haruki Murakami

life.quote: If you cannot find the truth right where you are, where else do you expect to find it?
life.author: Dogen

life.quote: Do not seek to follow in the footsteps of the wise. Seek what they sought.
life.author: Matsuo Basho

life.quote: Life and death are of supreme importance. Time swiftly passes by and opportunity is lost. Each of us should strive to awaken. Awaken. Take heed, do not squander your life.
life.author: Dogen

life.quote: A flower falls, even though we love it; and a weed grows, even though we do not love it.
life.author: Dogen

life.quote: But do not ask me where I am going, As I travel in this limitless world, Where every step I take is my home.
life.author: Dogen

life.quote: Children learn to smile from their parents.
life.author: Shinichi Suzuki

life.quote: If you lose today, win tomorrow. In this never-ending spirit of challenge is the heart of a victor.
life.author: Daisaku Ikeda

life.quote: Individually, we are one drop. Together, we are an ocean.
life.author: Ryunosuke Satoro

life.quote: If you lose today, win tomorrow. In this never-ending spirit of challenge is the heart of a victor.
life.author: Daisaku Ikeda

life.quote: I have a million things to talk to you about. All I want in this world is you. I want to see you and talk. I want the two of us to begin everything from the beginning.
life.author: Haruki Murakami

life.quote: Real poetry, is to lead a beautiful life. To live poetry is better than to write it.
life.author: Matsuo Basho

life.quote: There is a simple way to become buddha: When you refrain from unwholesome actions, are not attached to birth and death, and are compassionate toward all sentient beings, respectful to seniors and kind to juniors, not excluding or desiring anything, with no designing thoughts or worries, you will be called a buddha. Do not seek anything else.
life.author: Dogen

life.quote: Instead of being afraid of the challenge and failure, be afraid of avoiding the challenge and doing nothing
life.author: Soichiro Honda

life.quote: Those who are skilled in combat do not become angered, those who are skilled at winning do not become afraid. thus the wise win before the fight, while the ignorant fight to win.
life.author: Morihei Ueshiba

life.quote: Step by step walk the thousand-mile road.
life.author: Miyamoto Musashi

life.quote: All men are brothers, like the seas throughout the world; So why do winds and waves clash so fiercely everywhere?
life.author: Hirohito

life.quote: My art originates from hallucinations only I can see. I translate the hallucinations and obsessional images that plague me into sculptures and paintings. All my works in pastels are the products of obsessional neurosis and are therefore inextricably connected to my disease. I create pieces even when I don’t see hallucinations, though.
life.author: Yayoi Kusama

life.quote: Leave your front door and your back door open.Allow your thoughts to come and go.Just don't serve them tea.
life.author: Shunryu Suzuki

life.quote: I probably still haven’t completely adapted to the world. I don’t know, I feel like this isn’t the real world. The people, the scene: they just don’t seem real to me.
life.author: Haruki Murakami

life.quote: Always believe in yourself. Do this and no matter where you are, you will have nothing to fear.
life.author: Hayao Miyazaki

life.quote: Every day is a journey, and the journey itself is home.
life.author: Matsuo Basho

life.quote: I made efforts to swallow tears and to protect the species of the Japanese nation.
life.author: Hirohito

life.quote: Like water which can clearly mirror the sky and the trees only so long as its surface is undisturbed, the mind can only reflect the true image of the Self when it is tranquil and wholly relaxed.
life.author: Indra Devi

life.quote: We must keep both our femininity and our strength.
life.author: Indra Devi

life.quote: When you ask a person to jump, his attention is mostly directed toward the act of jumping and the mask falls so that the real person appears.
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: American capitalism finds its sharpest and most expressive reflection in the American cinema.
life.author: Sergei Eisenstein

life.quote: The profession of film director can and should be such a high and precious one; that no man aspiring to it can disregard any knowledge that will make him a better film director or human being.
life.author: Sergei Eisenstein

life.quote: This fascination with the human face has never left me... Every face I see seems to hide and sometimes, fleetingly, to reveal the mystery of another human being... Capturing this revelation became the goal and passion of my life.
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: No photographer should be blamed when, instead of capturing reality, he tries to show things he has seen only in his imagination. Photography is the youngest art form. All attempts to enlarge its frontiers are important and should be encouraged.
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: In a jump, the subject, in a sudden burst of energy, overcomes gravity. He cannot simultaneously control his expressions, his facial and his limb muscles. The mask falls. The real self becomes visible. One only has to snap it with the camera.
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: We women must listen to our inner voice. It is easier for women to do this as they are not afraid to say what they feel.
life.author: Indra Devi

life.quote: Yoga is the art and science of living.
life.author: Indra Devi

life.quote: In my serious work I am striving for the essence of things and for goals which are possibly unobtainable. On the other hand, everything humorous has great attraction for me, and a childish streak leads me into all kinds of frivolous endeavour.
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: Yoga means union, in all its significances and dimensions.
life.author: Indra Devi

life.quote: Men have to descend from their pedestal and learn how to be more broadminded and spiritual.
life.author: Indra Devi

life.quote: It becomes necessary to learn how to clear the mind of all clouds, to free it of all useless ballast and debris by dismissing the burden of too much concern with material things.
life.author: Indra Devi

life.quote: Most people stiffen with self-consciousness when they pose for a photograph. Lighting and fine camera equipment are useless if the photographer cannot make them drop the mask, at least for a moment, so he can capture on his film their real, undistorted personality and character.
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: Tell your husbands any bad news when everything is calm, not just as they come through the door.
life.author: Indra Devi

life.quote: Now why should the cinema follow the forms of theater and painting rather than the methodology of language, which allows wholly new concepts of ideas to arise from the combination of two concrete denotations of two concrete objects?
life.author: Sergei Eisenstein

life.quote: I know of few actresses who have this incredible talent for communicating with a camera lens. She would try to seduce a camera as if it were a human being.
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: With a woman I try to photograph her beauty; with a man I try to show his character. Once I photographed a man with a big nose (Jimmy Durante), and emphasized his nose, and he was very pleased with the picture. That could not happen with a woman. The most intelligent woman will reject a portrait if it doesn't flatter her.
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: [Revealing character] can't be done by pushing the person into position or arranging his head at a certain angle. It must be accomplished by provoking the victim, amusing him with jokes, lulling him with silence, or asking impertinent questions which his best friend would be afraid to voice.
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: Books are attracted to me. They make a beeline for me, and stick to me. I have been so fond of them that at last they have begun to reciprocate. In my hands books burst like ripe fruit. Like magic flowers they unfold their petals to show me the vital thought, the suggestive word, the confirming quotation, the decisive illustration.
life.author: Sergei Eisenstein

life.quote: Women must not shout back when their husbands come home and shout at them for any reason.
life.author: Indra Devi

life.quote: For example, in painting the form arises from abstract elements of line and color, while in cinema the material concreteness of the image within the frame presents - as an element - the greatest difficulty in manipulation.
life.author: Sergei Eisenstein

life.quote: Even in a less exaggerated description, any verbal account of a person is bound to find itself employing an assortment of waterfalls, lightning rods, landscapes, birds, etc.
life.author: Sergei Eisenstein

life.quote: A true portrait should, today and a hundred years from today, the Testimony of how this person looked and what kind of human being he was.
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: Laughter drives shouting away.
life.author: Indra Devi

life.quote: It is art's task to make manifest the contradictions of Being
life.author: Sergei Eisenstein

life.quote: The immortal photographers will be straightforward photographers, those who do not rely on tricks or special techniques.
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: A good portrait is incredibly hard to create, there is too much temptation to pander to the individual rather than portray them as they really were
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: Marilyn was history's most phenomenal love goddess.
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: The head of the photographer is more important than his camera
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: I make the woman look at the camera as a symbol of all the eyes that will see the picture I am making.
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: I drifted into photography like one drifts into prostitution. First I did it to please myself, then I did it to please my friends, and eventually I did it for the money.
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: The word "photography" can be interpreted as "writing with light" or "drawing with light." Some photographers are producing beautiful photographs by drawing with light.. Some other photographers are trying to tell something with their photographs. They are writing with light.
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: Freedom is living without chains.
life.author: Indra Devi

life.quote: Sri Krishnamacharya used to tell me: 'Do the Headstand when you are tired and in need of a tonic; when you are unable to fall asleep; when you are hungry, nervous and unhappy. Do it when in need of relaxation, when the brain is clouded, when you are in low spirits. Do it when your thoughts are distracted and you cannot concentrate properly or meditate.'
life.author: Indra Devi

life.quote: I do not belong to any religion. Everything is between God and myself.
life.author: Indra Devi

life.quote: Tranquillizers do not change our environment, nor do they change our personalities. They merely reduce our responsiveness to stimuli. They dull the keen edge of the angers, fears, or anxiety with which we might otherwise react to the problems of living. Once the response has been dulled, the irritating surface noise of living muted or eliminated, the spark and brilliance are also gone.
life.author: Indra Devi

life.quote: I am often asked which picture is my favorite. This is like asking a mother which child she likes the most.
life.author: Philippe Halsman
