life.quote: Dali likes me taking his picture because he is interested in pictures that do not simply reproduce reality. Even in photos he prefers to appear outside reality .That is surrealistic!
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: Herein lies the main objective of portraiture and also its main difficulty. The photographer probes for the innermost. The lens sees only the surface... .
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: Language is much closer to film than painting is.
life.author: Sergei Eisenstein

life.quote: Of the thousands of people, celebrated and unknown, who have sat before my camera, I am often asked who was the most difficult subject, or the easiest, or which picture is my favorite. This last question is like asking a mother which child she likes the most.
life.author: Philippe Halsman

life.quote: I'd rather die on my feet, than live on my knees.
life.author: Emiliano Zapata

life.quote: Passion is the bridge that takes you from pain to change.
life.author: Frida Kahlo

life.quote: I am my own muse. I am the subject I know best. The subject I want to better.
life.author: Frida Kahlo

life.quote: I wanted to tell you that my whole being opened for you. Since I fell in love with you everything is transformed and is full of beauty... love is like an aroma, like a current, like rain.
life.author: Frida Kahlo

life.quote: I want to die a slave to principles. Not to men.
life.author: Emiliano Zapata

life.quote: I love you more than my own skin and even though you don’t love me the same way, you love me anyways, don’t you? And if you don’t, I’ll always have the hope that you do, and i’m satisfied with that. Love me a little. I adore you.
life.author: Frida Kahlo

life.quote: Take a lover who looks at you like maybe you are magic.
life.author: Frida Kahlo

life.quote: The enemies of the country and of freedom of the people have always denounced as bandits those who sacrifice themselves for the noble causes of the people.
life.author: Emiliano Zapata

life.quote: Take a lover who looks at you like maybe you are a bourbon biscuit.
life.author: Frida Kahlo

life.quote: To be an artist, one must . . . never shirk from the truth as he understands it, never withdraw from life
life.author: Diego Rivera

life.quote: I drank to drown my sorrows, but the damned things learned how to swim.
life.author: Frida Kahlo

life.quote: As an artist I have always tried to be faithful to my vision of life, and I have frequently been in conflict with those who wanted me to paint not what I saw but what they wished me to see.
life.author: Diego Rivera

life.quote: Everyone's opinions about things change over time. Nothing is constant. Everything changes. And to hold onto some dogged idea forever is a little rigid and maybe naive.
life.author: Frida Kahlo

life.quote: At the end of the day, we can endure much more than we think we can.
life.author: Frida Kahlo

life.quote: I want a storm to come and flood us into a song that no one wrote.
life.author: Frida Kahlo

life.quote: I am not sick. I am broken. But I am happy as long as I can paint.
life.author: Frida Kahlo

life.quote: I forgive those who murder and steal because they did it out of necessity, but a traitor never.
life.author: Emiliano Zapata

life.quote: Nothing is worth more than laughter. It is strength to laugh and to abandon oneself, to be light. Tragedy is the most ridiculous thing.
life.author: Frida Kahlo

life.quote: An artist is above all a human being, profoundly human to the core. If the artist can't feel everything that humanity feels, if the artist isn't capable of loving until he forgets himself and sacrifices himself if necessary, if he won't put down his magic brush and head the fight against the oppressor, then he isn't a great artist.
life.author: Diego Rivera

life.quote: The Mexican...is familiar with death. [He] jokes about it, caresses it, sleeps with it, celebrates it. It is one of his favorite toys and his most steadfast love.
life.author: Octavio Paz

life.quote: Better to die on ones feet than to live on ones knees.
life.author: Emiliano Zapata

life.quote: There is nothing more precious than laughter
life.author: Frida Kahlo

life.quote: Solitude is the profoundest fact of the human condition. Man is the only being who knows he is alone.
life.author: Octavio Paz

life.quote: The most valuable possession you can own is an open heart. The most powerful weapon you can be is an instrument of peace.
life.author: Carlos Santana

life.quote: Looking back upon my work today, I think the best I have done grew out of things deeply felt, the worst from a pride in mere talent.
life.author: Diego Rivera

life.quote: The guitar is your first wings. It's assigned and designed to unfold your vision and imagination.
life.author: Carlos Santana

life.quote: I found enormous opposition to my religion. It's like if you want to strengthen your biceps, you lift heavy weight, as heavy as you can handle, and work your muscles against resistance until it grows strong. I had to do that with my religion.
life.author: Ricardo Montalban

life.quote: Better to die on one's feet than to live on one's knees.
life.author: Emiliano Zapata

life.quote: I leave you my portrait so that you will have my presence all the days and nights that I am away from you.
life.author: Frida Kahlo

life.quote: Just imagine becoming the way you used to be as a very young child, before you understood the meaning of any word, before opinions took over your mind. The real you is loving, joyful, and free. The real you is just like a flower, just like the wind, just like the ocean, just like the sun.
life.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

life.quote: If you carry joy in your heart, you can heal any moment.
life.author: Carlos Santana

life.quote: Art is like ham-it nourishes people.
life.author: Diego Rivera

life.quote: There's never one sunrise the same or one sunset the same.
life.author: Carlos Santana

life.quote: I paint flowers so they will not die.
life.author: Frida Kahlo

life.quote: Your wrinkles either show that you're nasty, cranky, and senile, or that you're always smiling.
life.author: Carlos Santana

life.quote: Feet, what do I need you for when I have wings to fly?
life.author: Frida Kahlo

life.quote: I paint self-portraits because I am so often alone, because I am the person I know best.
life.author: Frida Kahlo

life.quote: One day there will be no borders, no boundaries, no flags and no countries and the only passport will be the heart
life.author: Carlos Santana

life.quote: Use the power of your word in the direction of truth and love.
life.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

life.quote: I say that the most liberating thing about beauty is realizing that you are the beholder.
life.author: Salma Hayek

life.quote: If there is no justice for the people, there be no peace for the government.
life.author: Emiliano Zapata

life.quote: Happiness is not a destination or an experience. It's a decision.
life.author: Carlos Santana

life.quote: There is no point to samba if it doesn't make you smile.
life.author: Alma Guillermoprieto

life.quote: The supreme value is not the future but the present. The future is a deceitful time that always says to us, 'Not Yet,' and thus denies us... Whoever builds a house for future happiness builds a prison for the present.
life.author: Octavio Paz

life.quote: Hunting is not a sport. In a sport, both sides should know they're in the game.
life.author: Paul Rodriguez

life.quote: Most people are prisoners, thinking only about the future or living in the past. They are not in the present, and the present is where everything begins.
life.author: Carlos Santana

life.quote: Humans believe so many lies because we aren’t aware. We ignore the truth or we just don’t see the truth. When we are educated, we accumulate a lot of knowledge, and all that knowledge is just like a wall of fog that doesn’t allow us to perceive the truth, what really is.
life.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

life.quote: I paint flowers so they will not die.
life.author: Frida Kahlo

life.quote: July 13, 1954 was the most tragic day of my life. I had lost my beloved Frida forever. To late now I realized that the most wonderful part of my life had been my love for Frida.
life.author: Diego Rivera

life.quote: A flower without a stem, is beauty waiting to die. A heart without love, is a tear waiting to cry.
life.author: Octavio Paz

life.quote: La cucaracha, la cucaracha, Ya no quieres caminar, Porque no tienes, Porque le falta, Marihuana que fumar.
life.author: Pancho Villa

life.quote: We cannot choose one desktop over the other - Gnome or KDE - because there's users for both code bases.
life.author: Miguel de Icaza

life.quote: Don't let it end like this. Tell them I said something.
life.author: Pancho Villa

life.quote: I think we risk becoming the best informed society that has ever died of ignorance.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: Hitting is an art, but not an exact science.
life.author: Rod Carew

life.quote: If I fall, pick up the flag, kiss it, and keep on going.
life.author: Omar Torrijos Herrera

life.quote: Getting hit motivates me. It makes me punish the guy more. A fighter takes a punch, hits back with three punches.
life.author: Roberto Duran

life.quote: I don't like Communism because it hands out wealth through rationing books.
life.author: Omar Torrijos Herrera

life.quote: I want to thank America. You opened your heart so I could enter. Thank you everybody who lives in the United States, who saw me grow into becoming a world champion.
life.author: Roberto Duran

life.quote: I think we risk becoming the best informed society that has ever died of ignorance.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: What is interesting in this is the exchange of music that occurred between New Orleans and Cuba, I mean, they had ferries that would go from one port to another.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: Do you believe you're a starter or a benchwarmer? Do you believe you're an all-star or an also- ran? If the answers to these questions are the latter, your play on the field will reflect it. But when you've learned to shut off outside influences and believe in yourself, there's no telling how good a player you can be.
life.author: Rod Carew

life.quote: Every band had their own distinctive sound, but it was pretty much dancing music and rhythmic music with a tremendous emphasis on copying the Cuban models.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: They're making a ton of money, and no one is getting a nickel.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: And, he'd seen me in Panama, and he talked about maybe doing something in New York so I hooked it up when I came here and I recorded in 1969 my first album with Pete Rodriguez.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: I was a kid, and I remember my mother singing. She was also a radio soap opera actress, but my mother sang.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: People are a lot smarter than anyone gives them credit for being.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: So that I saw music as a way of documenting realities from the urban cities of Latin America.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: So I went to Miami in '74 with my family and while I was there it became obvious that we needed money and we needed to do something, because my family, we left without anything really, and we didn't have any money to begin with.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: So that when I came from Panama... my family was exiled in 1973 and they went to Miami.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: So that when I came to New York again, it was, I'm not too sure right now, but it was '74 or '75. I went to Miami in '74 and then I came to New York, I think, at the end of '74.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: Anywhere you had a commerce center, you had a lot of music.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: De La Hoya doesn't know about salsa. He should keep on singing mariachis and leave the salsa to me. I'm good at salsa.
life.author: Roberto Duran

life.quote: There is a special sensation in getting good wood on the ball and driving a double down the left-field line as the crowd in the ballpark rises to its feet and cheers. But, I also remember how much fun I had as a skinny barefoot kid hitting a tennis ball with a broomstick on a quiet, dusty street in Panama.
life.author: Rod Carew

life.quote: There was a point at which I thought I'd never get the most valuable player, especially the years I played at Minnesota. We never won a pennant there, we were far away from the big media centers of Los Angeles and New York, and I wasn't a flashy power hitter but a guy who hit to spots, who bunted and stole bases.
life.author: Rod Carew

life.quote: What I do not accept is the fact that so many people's talents were ripped off.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: I was born in Panama, the Republic of Panama, on July 16, 1948 in Panama City, in an area called San Felipe.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: When you've learned to believe in yourself, there's no telling how good a player you can be. That's because you have the mental edge.
life.author: Rod Carew

life.quote: I am not an animal in my personal life. But in the ring there is an animal inside me. Sometimes it roars when the first bell rights. Sometimes it springs out later in a fight. But i can always feel it there, driving me and pushing me forward. It is what makes me win. It makes me enjoy fighting.
life.author: Roberto Duran

life.quote: There was a lot of stuff happening in Havana that was being heard and appreciated by New Orleans musicians because of this situation. And vice versa.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: I do not fight for free. But I was born to be a fighter.
life.author: Roberto Duran

life.quote: I am not going to become crazy in the ring, because I am already crazy. And I am not going to die in the ring. I am going to die in bed as an old man.
life.author: Roberto Duran

life.quote: Every time I stepped into the ring, somebody wanted to kill me.
life.author: Roberto Duran

life.quote: The wind is old, but it keeps blowing.
life.author: Roberto Duran

life.quote: The way they dress here (California), your head is always in the stands. All those bikinis, your eyes get tired.
life.author: Rod Carew

life.quote: I am not God but something similar
life.author: Roberto Duran

life.quote: Everyone comes back. It makes no difference how far we wander, we always have our country, our land, in our souls and our minds.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: It was very interesting, and we went to Germany and we toured Germany like we were a German band in 1985.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: You know, it was uncomfortable doing the same thing. I don't like a rut.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: A lot of times you're just conditioned by what's around you.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: I didn't do drugs, I never did do drugs. Never. I don't have any story of drugs, you know, to speak of. Never did drugs, never was interested in drugs and then I wasn't interested in the people around the drugs.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: I think in New York we had respect and we would pretty much fill up the places where we went, but I never got the sense that we really were Number 1 here in New York among the Latin crowds.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: We had something to say. Whenever we played, people didn't dance, they listened.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: I decided we should book ourselves, so I started booking the band.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: The grandmother, the mother, the worker, the student, the intellectual, the professional, the unemployed, everybody identified with the songs because they were descriptions of life in the city.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: I was the first person to come into New York with a Latin American point of view which was also very much influenced by political happenings in Latin America.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: In those days the big U.S. labels didn't have any particular interest in the Latin market.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: It doesn't make sense for me to be a lawyer in a place where there is no law.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: So that in 1974, when I graduated as a lawyer, I figured I'm not going to be a lawyer under a military regime.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: Yes, I was going to law school and it was closed in '69.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: So everything that ever happened, we knew about in Panama.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: It's almost as if people think that in Latin America we're not hip to what's happening here.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: But, when I was about thirteen, I began to sort of sing in my neighborhood.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: Rock is young music, it is youth oriented. It just speaks for a generation.
life.author: Ruben Blades

life.quote: It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
life.author: Edmund Hillary

life.quote: Some believe it is only great power that can hold evil in check, but that is not what I have found. I found it is the small everyday deeds of ordinary folk that keep the darkness at bay small acts of kindness and love.
life.author: Peter Jackson

life.quote: You don't have to be a hero to accomplish great things---to compete. You can just be an ordinary chap, sufficiently motivated to reach challenging goals.
life.author: Edmund Hillary

life.quote: Mount Everest, you beat me the first time, but I'll beat you the next time because you've grown all you are going to grow... but I'm still growing!
life.author: Edmund Hillary

life.quote: All of physics is either impossible or trivial. It is impossible until you understand it, and then it becomes trivial.
life.author: Ernest Rutherford

life.quote: Worrying is like a rocking chair, it gives you something to do, but it gets you nowhere.
life.author: Glenn Turner

life.quote: It is not the mountain we conquer but ourselves
life.author: Edmund Hillary

life.quote: If the going is tough and the pressure is on, If the reserves of strength have been drained and the summit is still not in sight, then the quality to seek in the person is neither great strength nor quickness of hand, but rather a resolute mind firmly set on its purpose that refuses to let its body slack or rest.
life.author: Edmund Hillary

life.quote: One does not simply walk into Mordor.
life.author: Peter Jackson

life.quote: While on top of Everest, I looked across the valley towards the great peak Makalu and mentally worked out a route about how it could be climbed. It showed me that even though I was standing on top of the world, it wasn't the end of everything. I was still looking beyond to other interesting challenges.
life.author: Edmund Hillary

life.quote: I want, by understanding myself, to understand others. I want to be all that I am capable of becoming.
life.author: Katherine Mansfield

life.quote: When we have found how the nucleus of atoms is built up we shall have found the greatest secret of all — except life. We shall have found the basis of everything — of the earth we walk on, of the air we breathe, of the sunshine, of our physical body itself, of everything in the world, however great or however small — except life.
life.author: Ernest Rutherford

life.quote: If only one could tell true love from false love as one can tell mushrooms from toadstools.
life.author: Katherine Mansfield

life.quote: All science is either physics or stamp collecting.
life.author: Ernest Rutherford

life.quote: The sexual deviance - I'd be lying if I said I didn't miss that; but we do have hints of it but in a more psychological way and therefore more human way, arguably. Or certainly to the extent that the animated series takes that sexuality.
life.author: Marton Csokas

life.quote: I was on dialysis for 18 months before the transplant, so it was important I tried to look ahead to days like my comeback this Saturday. You need those big goals to drive you on.
life.author: Jonah Lomu

life.quote: Good planning is important. I've also regarded a sense of humor as one of the most important things on a big expedition. When you're in a difficult or dangerous situation, or when you're depressed about the chances of success, someone who can make you laugh eases the tension.
life.author: Edmund Hillary

life.quote: We live at the edge of the world, so we live on the edge. Kiwis will always sacrifice money and security for adventure and challenge.
life.author: Lucy Lawless

life.quote: Challenge is what makes men. It will be the end when men stop looking for new challenges.
life.author: Edmund Hillary

life.quote: New Zealand was colonised initially by those Australians who had the initiative to escape.
life.author: Robert Muldoon

life.quote: When women are able to live in a safe and secure environment, they can participate effectively in the economy and society. This helps overcome poverty, reduces inequalities and is beneficial for children's nutrition, health and school attendance. Every woman and girl has the right to live in safety in her home and community.
life.author: Helen Clark

life.quote: The explorers of the past were great men and we should honour them. But let us not forget that their spirit lives on. It is still not hard to find a man who will adventure for the sake of a dream or one who will search, for the pleasure of searching, not for what he may find.
life.author: Edmund Hillary

life.quote: I have been seriously afraid at times but have used my fear as a stimulating factor rather than allowing it to paralyse me. My abilities have not been outstanding, but I have had sufficient strength and determination to meet my challenges and have usually managed to succeed with them.
life.author: Edmund Hillary

life.quote: Could we change our attitude, we should not only see life differently, but life itself would come to be different.
life.author: Katherine Mansfield

life.quote: It's been a long road back to health and fitness for me. I am just glad to have been given the opportunity to do what I love most.
life.author: Jonah Lomu

life.quote: A theory that you can't explain to a bartender is probably no damn good.
life.author: Ernest Rutherford

life.quote: An alleged scientific discovery has no merit unless it can be explained to a barmaid.
life.author: Ernest Rutherford

life.quote: Make it a rule of life never to regret and never to look back. Regret is an appalling waste of energy, you can't build on it it's only good for wallowing in.
life.author: Katherine Mansfield

life.quote: You know, a few months ago, I made a terrible mistake. I realized something, and instead of crushing the thought the moment it came I... I let it hang on, and now I know it to be true. And I'm afraid it's stuck in my head forever. These are the best days of our lives. It's a terrible thing to know, but I know it.
life.author: Richard Curtis

life.quote: I have discovered that my freedom is within me, and nothing can destroy it.
life.author: Janet Frame

life.quote: It was almost as incredible as if you fired a 15-inch shell at a piece of tissue paper and it came back and hit you.
life.author: Ernest Rutherford

life.quote: If your experiment needs statistics, you ought to have done a better experiment.
life.author: Ernest Rutherford

life.quote: Cause if you shoot a bullet someone dies. If you drop a bomb many die. You hit a woman, love dies. But if you say the F-word... nothing actually happens.
life.author: Richard Curtis

life.quote: There is a probably natural and learned reticence with myself talking about my early life.
life.author: Pamela Stephenson

life.quote: They have a word in Finnish called sisu, which basically means guts. It’s the strongest word in the Finnish language. You tell a Finn he doesn’t have sisu, that’s like spitting in his face.
life.author: Arthur Lydiard

life.quote: The big-budget blockbuster is becoming one of the most dependable forms of filmmaking.
life.author: Peter Jackson

life.quote: How hard it is to escape from places. However carefully one goes they hold you — you leave little bits of yourself fluttering on the fences — like rags and shreds of your very life.
life.author: Katherine Mansfield

life.quote: I always felt that the great high privilege, relief and comfort of friendship was that one had to explain nothing.
life.author: Katherine Mansfield

life.quote: Oh, impossible. Fancy cream puffs so soon after breakfast. The very idea made one shudder. All the same, two minutes later Jose and Laura were licking their fingers with that absorbed inward look that only comes from whipped cream.
life.author: Katherine Mansfield

life.quote: No one remembers who climbed Mount Everest the second time.
life.author: Edmund Hillary

life.quote: The only possible conclusion the social sciences can draw is: some do, some don't.
life.author: Ernest Rutherford

life.quote: Grounded in international human rights, gender equality doesn’t just improve the lives of individual women, girls, and their families; it makes economic sense, strengthens democracy, and enables long-term sustainable progress.
life.author: Helen Clark

life.quote: I must confess it was very unexpected and I am very startled at my metamorphosis into a chemist.
life.author: Ernest Rutherford

life.quote: All science is either physics or stamp collecting.
life.author: Ernest Rutherford

life.quote: I adore Life. What do all the fools matter and all the stupidity. They do matter but somehow for me they cannot touch the body of Life. Life is marvellous. I want to be deeply rooted in it - to live - to expand - to breathe in it - to rejoice - to share it. To give and to be asked for Love.
life.author: Katherine Mansfield

life.quote: I have a saying 'train, don't strain.' The Americans have the saying 'no pain, no gain' and that's why they have no distance running champions. They get down to the track with a stopwatch and flog their guts out thinking that it'll make them a champion, but they'll never make a champion that way.
life.author: Arthur Lydiard

life.quote: I don’t really like the Hollywood blockbuster bandwagon that exists right now. The industry and the advent of all the technology, has kind of lost its way. It’s become very franchise driven and superhero driven.
life.author: Peter Jackson

life.quote: So many people suffer from abuse, and suffer alone.
life.author: Pamela Stephenson

life.quote: Risk! Risk anything! Care no more for the opinions of others, for those voices. Do the hardest thing on earth for you. Act for yourself. Face the truth.
life.author: Katherine Mansfield

life.quote: In all science, error precedes the truth, and it is better it should go first than last.
life.author: Hugh Walpole

life.quote: I think the really good mountaineer is the man with the technical ability of the professional and with the enthusiasm and freshness of approach of the amateur.
life.author: Edmund Hillary

life.quote: I want to be all that I am capable of becoming.
life.author: Katherine Mansfield

life.quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
life.author: Marie Curie

life.quote: Be less curious about people and more curious about ideas.
life.author: Marie Curie

life.quote: First principle: never to let one's self be beaten down by persons or by events.
life.author: Marie Curie

life.quote: To know that we know what we know, and to know that we do not know what we do not know, that is true knowledge.
life.author: Nicolaus Copernicus

life.quote: ...morally speaking, there is no limit to the concern one must feel for the suffering of human beings, that indifference to evil is worse than evil itself, that in a free society, some are guilty, but all are responsible.
life.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

life.quote: Let us remember the past with gratitude, live the present with enthusiasm, and look forward to the future with confidence.
life.author: Pope John Paul II

life.quote: It's better to cry than to be angry; because anger hurts others, while tears flow silently through the soul and cleanses the heart.
life.author: Pope John Paul II

life.quote: The ultimate test of your greatness is the way you treat every human being.
life.author: Pope John Paul II

life.quote: I plead with you--never, ever give up on hope, never doubt, never tire, and never become discouraged. Be not afraid.
life.author: Pope John Paul II

life.quote: A scientist in his laboratory is not a mere technician: he is also a child confronting natural phenomena that impress him as though they were fairy tales.
life.author: Marie Curie

life.quote: You cannot hope to build a better world without improving the individuals.
life.author: Marie Curie

life.quote: When faith is completely replaced by creed, worship by discipline, love by habit; when the crisis of today is ignored because of the splendors of the past; when faith becomes an heirloom rather than a living fountain; when religion speaks only in the name of authority rather than with the voice of compassion, its message becomes meaningless.
life.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

life.quote: I never see what has been done; I only see what remains to be done.
life.author: Marie Curie

life.quote: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
life.author: Stanislaw Lec

life.quote: For many of us the march from Selma to Montgomery was about protest and prayer. Legs are not lips and walking is not kneeling. And yet our legs uttered songs. Even without words, our march was worship. I felt my legs were praying.
life.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

life.quote: Each of us must work for his own improvement, and at the same time share a general responsibility for all humanity.
life.author: Marie Curie

life.quote: We must have perseverance and above all confidence in ourselves.
life.author: Marie Curie

life.quote: Do not forget that true love sets no conditions; it does not calculate or complain, but simply loves.
life.author: Pope John Paul II

life.quote: The way Jesus shows you is not easy. Rather, it is like a path winding up a mountain. Do not lose heart! The steeper the road, the faster it rises towards ever wider horizons.
life.author: Pope John Paul II

life.quote: We are closer to God when we are asking questions than when we think we have the answers.
life.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

life.quote: It's only those who do nothing that make no mistakes I suppose.
life.author: Joseph Conrad

life.quote: Racism is man's gravest threat to man - the maximum of hatred for a minimum of reason.
life.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

life.quote: Prayer is meaningless unless it is subversive, unless it seeks to overthrow and to ruin the pyramids of callousness, hatred, opportunism, falsehoods. The liturgical movement must become a revolutionary movement seeking to overthrow the forces that continue to destroy the promise, the hope, the vision.
life.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

life.quote: The older one gets, the more one feels that the present must be enjoyed; it is a precious gift, comparable to a state of grace
life.author: Marie Curie

life.quote: Prayer cannot bring water to parched fields, or mend a broken bridge, or rebuild a ruined city; but prayer can water an arid soul, mend a broken heart, and rebuild a weakened will.
life.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

life.quote: Dear Lord, grant me the grace of wonder. Surprise me, amaze me, awe me in every crevice of your universe. Each day enrapture me with your marvelous things without number. ...I do not ask to see the reason for it all: I ask only to share the wonder of it all.
life.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

life.quote: Life is not easy for any of us. But what of that? We must have perseverance and above all confidence in ourselves.
life.author: Marie Curie

life.quote: It is the duty of every man to uphold the dignity of every woman.
life.author: Pope John Paul II

life.quote: Allow the light and the healing presence of Christ to shine brightly through your lives. In that way, all those who come in contact with you will discover the loving kindness of God.
life.author: Pope John Paul II

life.quote: A test of a people is how it behaves toward the old. It is easy to love children. Even tyrants and dictators make a point of being fond of children. But the affection and care for the old, the incurable, the helpless are the true gold mines of a culture.
life.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

life.quote: I wish I could throw off the thoughts which poison my happiness.
life.author: Frederic Chopin

life.quote: In any free society where terrible wrongs exist, some are guilty - all are responsible.
life.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

life.quote: All my life through, the new sights of Nature made me rejoice like a child.
life.author: Marie Curie

life.quote: To know the mighty works of God, to comprehend His wisdom and majesty and power; to appreciate, in degree, the wonderful workings of His laws, surely all this must be a pleasing and acceptable mode of worship to the Most High, to whom ignorance cannot be more grateful than knowledge.
life.author: Nicolaus Copernicus

life.quote: Money changes all the iron rules into rubber bands.
life.author: Ryszard Kapuscinski

life.quote: Now is the time to understand more, so we fear less.
life.author: Marie Curie

life.quote: When I was young, I admired clever people. Now that I am old, I admire kind people.
life.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

life.quote: There is no evil to be faced that Christ does not face with us. There is no enemy that Christ has not already conquered. There is no cross to bear that Christ has not already borne for us, and does not now bear with us.
life.author: Pope John Paul II

life.quote: I am among those who think that science has great beauty. A scientist in his laboratory is not only a technician: he is also a child placed before natural phenomena which impress him like a fairy tale. We should not allow it to be believed that all scientific progress can be reduced to mechanisms, machines, gearings, even though such machinery has its own beauty.
life.author: Marie Curie

life.quote: I am among those who think that science has great beauty.
life.author: Marie Curie

life.quote: Nothing is more beautiful than a guitar, except, possibly two.
life.author: Frederic Chopin

life.quote: We must believe that we are gifted for something, and that this thing, at whatever cost, must be attained.
life.author: Marie Curie

life.quote: Freedom consists not in doing what we like, but in having the right to do what we ought.
life.author: Pope John Paul II

life.quote: Faith is not the clinging to a shrine but an endless pilgrimage of the heart. Audacious longing, burning songs, daring thoughts, an impulse overwhelming the heart, usurping the mind--these are all a drive towards serving Him who rings our hearts like a bell. It is as if He were waiting to enter our empty, perishing lives.
life.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

life.quote: Every light has its shadow, and every shadow hath a succeeding morning.
life.author: Nicolaus Copernicus

life.quote: Social justice cannot be attained by violence. Violence kills what it intends to create.
life.author: Pope John Paul II

life.quote: For I am not so enamoured of my own opinions that I disregard what others may think of them.
life.author: Nicolaus Copernicus

life.quote: Bach is like an astronomer who, with the help of ciphers, finds the most wonderful stars . . . Beethoven embraced the universe with the power of his spirit . . . I do not climb so high. A long time ago I decided that my universe will be the soul and heart of man.
life.author: Frederic Chopin

life.quote: I tell my piano the things I used to tell you.
life.author: Frederic Chopin

life.quote: From Mary we learn to surrender to God's Will in all things. From Mary we learn to trust even when all hope seems gone. From Mary we learn to love Christ her Son and the Son of God!
life.author: Pope John Paul II

life.quote: I tell my piano the things I used to tell you
life.author: Frederic Chopin

life.quote: It's better to cry than be angry, because anger hurts others while tears flow silently through the soul and cleans the heart.
life.author: Pope John Paul II

life.quote: Even in winter it shall be green in my heart.
life.author: Frederic Chopin

life.quote: Indifference to evil is more insidious than evil itself. It is a silent justification affording evil acceptability in society.
life.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

life.quote: Our goal should be to live life in radical amazement. ....get up in the morning and look at the world in a way that takes nothing for granted. Everything is phenomenal; everything is incredible; never treat life casually. To be spiritual is to be amazed.
life.author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

life.quote: The worst prison would be a closed heart.
life.author: Pope John Paul II

life.quote: Solidarity is not a feeling of vague compassion or shallow distress at the misfortunes of so many people, both near and far. On the contrary, it is a firm and persevering determination to commit oneself to the common good; that is to say to the good of all and of each individual, because we are all really responsible for all
life.author: Pope John Paul II

life.quote: Put all your soul into it, play the way you feel!
life.author: Frederic Chopin

life.quote: When I put on my uniform, I feel I am the proudest man on earth.
life.author: Roberto Clemente

life.quote: After all these years, it's still embarrassing for me to play on the American golf tour. Like the time I asked my caddie for a sand wedge and he came back ten minutes later with a ham on rye.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: They claim red meat is bad for you. But I never saw a sick-looking tiger.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: If you have a chance to accomplish something that will make things better for people coming behind you, and you don’t do that, you are wasting your time on this Earth.
life.author: Roberto Clemente

life.quote: The first time I played the Masters, I was so nervous I drank a bottle of rum before I teed off. I shot the happiest 83 of my life.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: I've heard people say putting is 50 percent technique and 50 percent mental. I really believe it is 50 percent technique and 90 percent positive thinking, see, but that adds up to 140 percent, which is why nobody is 100 percent sure how to putt.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: Golf is the most fun you can have with out taking your clothes off.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: Only fools live in the past or carry envy to the present.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: Remember you have to be comfortable. Golf is not a life or death situation. It's just a game and should be treated as such. Stay loose.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: I am from the poor people; I represent the poor people. I like workers. I like people that suffer because these people have a different approach to life from the people that have everything and don't know what suffering is.
life.author: Roberto Clemente

life.quote: I believe staying young at heart is all in one's personal attitude... you can't instill that in anyone.
life.author: Rita Moreno

life.quote: When a man retires, his wife gets twice the husband but only half the income.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: I am a millionaire today and my wife deserves all of the credit. Before I met her I was a multi-millionaire.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: Bigger than life is not difficult for me. I am bigger than life.
life.author: Rita Moreno

life.quote: In a way, I was born twice. I was born in 1934 and again in 1955 when I came to Pittsburgh. I am thankful to say that I lived two lives.
life.author: Roberto Clemente

life.quote: Puerto Ricans are many colors - we are Spanish, we're French, we're Thai, Indian, we're almost black, some of us.
life.author: Rita Moreno

life.quote: The sweetest two words are 'next time.' The sourest word is 'if.'
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: I don't fear death, but I sure don't like those three-footers for par.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: When you're having trouble and topping the ball, it means the ground is moving on you.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: People tell me I look good these days. I look good because I feel good. I know people who are older than I am who are twenty-five... It's all about attitude. To me, age is just a number.
life.author: Rita Moreno

life.quote: I'm an actress, and I am Latina.
life.author: Rita Moreno

life.quote: I would be lost without baseball. I don't think I could stand being away from it as long as I was alive.
life.author: Roberto Clemente

life.quote: I'm one of the most joyous people I've ever met.
life.author: Rita Moreno

life.quote: Golf is the only sport that a professional can enjoy playing with his friends.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: I think you learn. You learn from your mistakes. You learn from things you do and try to stay away from the negatives in your life. I think I've grown.
life.author: Jorge Posada

life.quote: I'm getting so old, I don't even buy green bananas anymore.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: I never exaggerate. I just remember big.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: A golf ball is like a clock. Always hit it at 6 o'clock and make it go toward 12 o'clock. But make sure you're in the same time zone.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: Red meat is not bad for you. Now blue-green meat, that's bad for you!
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: There's no difference between me and you. You need something, a glove, a place to live, you let me know.
life.author: Roberto Clemente

life.quote: La vida es un regalo de Dios, disfrútala. La vida es una oportunidad, aprovéchala. La vida es belleza, la vida es un sueño, realízalo.
life.author: Walter Mercado

life.quote: Golf is a thinking man's game. You can have all the shots in the bag, but if you don't know what to do with them, you've got troubles.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: I don't exaggerate - I just remember big.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: Many things inspire me, but at this moment in my life, my daughter is my greatest inspiration. Working hard has taken on a whole new meaning since I had her. I want to make a great life for myself so she can have a great life.
life.author: Roselyn Sanchez

life.quote: To the people here, we are outsiders. Foreigners.
life.author: Roberto Clemente

life.quote: When I used to gamble, I looked for players with head covers on their irons. Those guys I could beat.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: Take less time to read the scorecard and more time to read the hole.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: Ten cuidado con quien te desahogas, sólo algunas personas les importa lo que sucede. El resto solo tiene curiosidad.
life.author: Walter Mercado

life.quote: I am more valuable to my team hitting .330 then swinging for home runs.
life.author: Roberto Clemente

life.quote: The best wood in most amateurs' bags is the pencil.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: Nobody does anything better than me in baseball (said before the 1971 World Series).
life.author: Roberto Clemente

life.quote: If I would be happy, I would be a bad ballplayer. With me, when I get mad, it puts energy in my body.
life.author: Roberto Clemente

life.quote: I never pray to God to make a putt. I pray to God to help me react good if I miss a putt.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: The only thing that matters is when the team wins.
life.author: Jorge Posada

life.quote: I was on the dance floor but I couldn't hear the band.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: Jack Nicklaus is a legend in his spare time.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: Playing golf is not hot work. Cutting sugar cane for a dollar a day - that's hot work. Hotter than my first wrist watch.
life.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

life.quote: You gotta take care of yourself; you cant do anything in excess.
life.author: Jorge Posada

life.quote: But some people act like they think I live in the jungle someplace.
life.author: Roberto Clemente

life.quote: My mother always gives the best advice. When I left Puerto Rico to pursue my dreams, she always supported me and said to me, 'I'm never going to cut your wings, so don't let anyone else do that to you.' That has been my philosophy through life. I want to share that valuable lesson with my little girl someday.
life.author: Roselyn Sanchez

life.quote: Be aware of your own worth, use all of your power to achieve it. Create an ocean from a dewdrop. Do not beg for light from the moon, obtain it from the spark within you.
life.author: Muhammad Iqbal

life.quote: India is using troops in Kashmir. They are losing the battle of heart and minds. It's like treating cancer with dispirin.
life.author: Imran Khan

life.quote: We are now all Pakistanis — not Baluchis, Pathans, Sindhis, Bengalis, Punjabis and so on — and as Pakistanis, we must feet behave and act, and we should be proud to be known as Pakistanis and nothing else.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: People who have no hold over their process of thinking are likely to be ruined by liberty of thought. If thought is immature, liberty of thought becomes a method of converting men into animals.
life.author: Muhammad Iqbal

life.quote: I do not believe in taking the right decision, I take a decision and make it right.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: There are two powers in the world; one is the sword and the other is the pen. There is a great competition and rivalry between the two. There is a third power stronger than both, that of the women.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: Life is too short to spend worrying about people who opposed you.
life.author: Benazir Bhutto

life.quote: From your past emerges the present, and from the present is born your future.
life.author: Muhammad Iqbal

life.quote: Character, courage, industry and perseverance are the four pillars on which the whole edifice of human life can be built and failure is a word unknown to me.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: No nation can rise to the height of glory unless your women are side by side with you.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: With faith, discipline and selfless devotion to duty, there is nothing worthwhile that you cannot achieve.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: Think 100 times before you take a decision, But once that decision is taken, stand by it as one man.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: Life is a struggle and not a matter of privilege. It is nothing but one's knowledge of the temporal and the spiritual world.
life.author: Muhammad Iqbal

life.quote: There is no power on earth that can undo Pakistan.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: I insist you to strive. Work, Work and only work for satisfaction with patience, humbleness and serve thy nation.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: Why is it, that giving guns is so easy, but giving books is so hard?
life.author: Malala Yousafzai

life.quote: My message to you all is hope, courage and confidence.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: I am not going to respect... gray hairs unless there is wisdom beneath them.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: The great majority of us are Muslims. We follow the teachings of the Prophet Mohammed (may peace be upon him). We are members of the brotherhood of Islam in which all are equal in rights, dignity and self-respect. Consequently, we have a special and a very deep sense of unity. But make no mistake: Pakistan is not a theocracy or anything like it.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: When the thinking of a people becomes corrupt, the pure silver becomes impure in its hands.
life.author: Muhammad Iqbal

life.quote: The story of Pakistan, its struggle and its achievement, is the very story of great human ideals, struggling to survive in the face of great odds and difficulties.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: You can imprison a man, but not an idea. You can exile a man, but not an idea.You can kill a man, but not an idea.
life.author: Benazir Bhutto

life.quote: Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: When the whole world is silent, even one voice becomes powerful.
life.author: Malala Yousafzai

life.quote: I have full faith in my people that they will rise to every occasion worthy of our past Islamic history, glory and traditions.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: You are free; you are free to go to your temples, you are free to go to your mosques or to any other place or worship in this State of Pakistan. You may belong to any religion or caste or creed - that has nothing to do with the business of the State.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: Being nice should never be perceived as being weak. It's not a sign of weakness, it's a sign of courtesy, manners, grace, a woman's ability to make everyone...feel at home, and it should never be construed as weakness.
life.author: Benazir Bhutto

life.quote: One child, one teacher, one book and one pen can change the world.
life.author: Malala Yousafzai

life.quote: It is true that we are made of dust. And the world is also made of dust. But the dust has motes rising.
life.author: Muhammad Iqbal

life.quote: Extremists have shown what frightens them most. A girl with a book.
life.author: Malala Yousafzai

life.quote: I lead no party; I follow no leader. I have given the best part of my life to careful study of Islam, its law and polity, its culture, its history and its literature.
life.author: Muhammad Iqbal

life.quote: Democracy needs support and the best support for democracy comes from other democracies. Democratic nations should come together in an association designed to help each other and promote what is a universal value - democracy.
life.author: Benazir Bhutto

life.quote: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.
life.author: Malala Yousafzai

life.quote: It gives a message to people of love... it does not matter what's the colour of your skin, what language do you speak, what religion do you believe in. It is that we should all consider each other as human beings and we should respect each other.
life.author: Malala Yousafzai

life.quote: The best hijab is in the eyes of the beholder.
life.author: Benazir Bhutto

life.quote: With guns you can kill terrorists, with education you can kill terrorism.
life.author: Malala Yousafzai

life.quote: Clearly it's not easy for woman in modern society, no matter where we live. We still have to go extra mile to prove that we are equal to men. We have to work longer hours and make more sacrifices. And we must emotionally protect ourselves from unfair, often vicious attacks made on us.
life.author: Benazir Bhutto

life.quote: Any idea of a United India could never have worked and in my judgment it would have led us to terrific disaster.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: We are victims of evil customs. It is a crime against humanity that our women are shut up within the four walls of the houses as prisoners. There is no sanction anywhere for the deplorable condition in which our women have to live.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: In distinguishing between Islamic teachings and social taboos, we must remember that Islam forbids injustice; Injustice against people, against nations, against women. It shuns race, color, and gender as a basis of distinction amongst fellowmen. It enshrines piety as the sole criteria for judging humankind.
life.author: Benazir Bhutto

life.quote: A people inspired by democracy, human rights and economic opportunity will turn their back decisively against extremism.
life.author: Benazir Bhutto

life.quote: The intellect of two thousand asses cannot bring forth a single man's thought.
life.author: Muhammad Iqbal

life.quote: It is only with united effort and faith in our destiny that we shall be able to translate the Pakistan of our dreams into reality.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: I do not have any fears, no fear of dying, of failure, of anything; that means I am very dangerous for my opponents.
life.author: Imran Khan

life.quote: Never give up, no matter how hard life gets no matter how much pain you feel. Pain will eventually subside, nothing remains forever, so keep going and don't give up.
life.author: Imran Khan

life.quote: Preserve your history and become everlasting; receive new life from the times that have gone by.
life.author: Muhammad Iqbal

life.quote: No struggle can ever succeed without women participating side by side with men.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: Become dust - and they will throw thee in the air; Become stone - and they will throw thee on glass.
life.author: Muhammad Iqbal

life.quote: Compromise for your Dream but NEVER Compromise on your Dream.
life.author: Imran Khan

life.quote: Pakistan not only means freedom and independence but the Muslim Ideology which has to be preserved, which has come to us as a precious gift and treasure and which, we hope other will share with us.
life.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

life.quote: It is not defeat that destroys you,it is being demoralized by defeat that destroy you.
life.author: Imran Khan

life.quote: The most important thing in our war preparations is to teach all our people to hate U.S. imperialism. Otherwise, we will not be able to defeat the U.S. imperialists who boast of their technological superiority.
life.author: Kim Il-sung

life.quote: Nothing is impossible for a man with a strong will. The possible is in store only for a man who loves the future. There is no word "impossible" in the Korean language.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: My God is none other than the people. Only the popular masses are omniscient and omnipotent and almighty on earth. Therefore my lifetime motto is: "The people are my God."
life.author: Kim Il-sung

life.quote: Overall relations between the North and the South have developed in favor of national reconciliation, unity and reunification.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: To make revolution in Korea we must know Korean history and geography as well as the customs of the Korean people. Only then is it possible to educate our people in a way that suits them and to inspire in them an ardent love for their native place and their motherland.
life.author: Kim Il-sung

life.quote: One can live without candy, but one cannot live without bullets.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: Peace secured by slavish submission is not peace.
life.author: Kim Il-sung

life.quote: In their day, Marx, Engels, Lenin, and Stalin represented the aspirations and demands of the exploited working masses, and the cause of socialism was inseparably linked with their names.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: It is necessary to expose the false propaganda of the imperialists and thoroughly dispel the illusion that the imperialists will give up their positions in the colonies and dependent countries with good will.
life.author: Kim Il-sung

life.quote: I am the object of criticism around the world. But I think that since I am being discussed, then I am on the right track.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: We oppose the reactionary policies of the U.S. government but we do not oppose the American people. We want to have many good friends in the United States.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: We are opposed to the line of compromise with imperialism. At the same time, we cannot tolerate the practice of only shouting against imperialism, but, in actual fact, being afraid to fight it.
life.author: Kim Il-sung

life.quote: While there are still imperialist aggressors, the state that has no defense power of its own to protect its sovereignty against the internal and external enemies is, in fact, not a fully independent and sovereign state.
life.author: Kim Il-sung

life.quote: A man who dreads trials and difficulties cannot become a revolutionary. If he is to become a revolutionary with an indomitable fighting spirit, he must be tempered in the arduous struggle from his youth. As the saying goes, early training means more than late earning.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: A film with an untidy plot cannot grip the audience and define their emotional response.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: Imperialist aid is a noose of plunder and subjugation, aimed at robbing 10 and even 100 things for one thing that is given.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: Karl Marx made a great contribution to the liberation cause of mankind, and because of his immortal exploits his name is still enshrined in the hearts of the working class and peoples of all countries.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: It is wrong to try to avoid the struggle against imperialism under the pretext that independence and revolution are important, but that peace is still more precious.
life.author: Kim Il-sung

life.quote: The peoples of Asia, Africa, and Latin America have common interest and are in the position to support each other in their anti-imperialist and anti-U.S. struggle. As long as Africa and Latin America are not free.
life.author: Kim Il-sung

life.quote: The liquidation of colonialism is a trend of the times which no force can hold back.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: South Koreans who have seen and praised the mass games should remember the hardship of tearful children. Teachers drive them hard with curses and orders to repeat and repeat. When the children return home in the evening, they can hardly walk.
life.author: Kim Il-sung

life.quote: National defense is the sacred duty of the young and all other people.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: No faction is better or worse than any other. All come from the same mould; they are all products of capitalist influence in the working class movement. And they are a poison that destroys our Party and the working class movement in Korea.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: Great ideology creates great times.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: The revolution is carried out by means of one's thought, not through one's family background.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: The physical life of an individual person is limited, but the life of the masses united as an independent social-political organism is immortal. Only when an individual becomes a member of this community can he acquire the immortal social-political life.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: It is my greatest wish to enable our people to live with nothing to envy at the earliest possible date, and it is my greatest pleasure to work energetically, sharing my joys and sorrows with our people, on the road of translating my wish into reality.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: The oppressed peoples can liberate themselves only through struggle. This is a simple and clear truth confirmed by history.
life.author: Kim Il-sung

life.quote: The cinema occupies an important place in the overall development of art and literature.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: No production of high ideological and artistic value can evolve out of a creative group whose members are not united ideologically and in which discipline and order have not been established.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: Everything is decided bya person's thoughts and if he is ideologically motivated, there is nothing he cannot do.
life.author: Kim Il-sung

life.quote: In a nutshell, the idea of Juche means that the masters of the revolution and the work of construction are the masses of the people and that they are also the motive force of the revolution and the work of construction. In other words, one is responsible for one's own destiny and one has also the capacity for hewing out one's own destiny.
life.author: Kim Il-sung

life.quote: The people are the masters of the revolution in each country. It is like putting a cart before the horse that foreigners carry out the revolution for them. The revolution can neither be exported nor imported.
life.author: Kim Il-sung

life.quote: The basis of the Juche Idea is that man is the master of all things and the decisive factor in everything.
life.author: Kim Il-sung

life.quote: The core in the Juche outlook on the revolution is loyalty to the party and the leader. The cause of socialism and communism is started by the leader and is carried out under the guidance of the party and the leader.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: Glory to the heroic soldiers of the Korean People's Army!
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: Our Party's Songun-based revolutionary leadership, Songun-based politics, is a revolutionary mode of leadership and socialist mode of politics that gives top priority to military affairs, and defends the country, the revolution and socialism and dynamically pushes ahead with overall socialist construction by dint of the revolutionary mettle and combat capabilities of the People's Army.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: I'm an Internet expert too. It's all right to wire the industrial zone only, but there are many problems if other regions of the North are wired.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: Although the Great Leader told us that we have to let the people eat rice with meat soup, wear silk clothes and live in a tiled roof house, we have not accomplished his will. We have already reached the status of a strong country in the military field, let alone politics and ideology, but there are still quite a number of things lacking in people's lives. I am trying to implement his will by solving these problems.
life.author: Kim Jong Il

life.quote: The people are the masters of the revolution in each country.
life.author: Kim Il-sung

life.quote: Lenin lived, Lenin lives, Lenin will live.
life.author: Kim Il-sung

life.quote: Orientalism can be discussed and analyzed as the corporate institution for dealing with the Orient—dealing with it by making statements about it, authorizing views of it, describing it, by teaching it, settling it, ruling over it: in short, Orientalism as a Western style for dominating, restructuring, and having authority over the Orient.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: You cannot continue to victimize someone else just because you yourself were a victim once—there has to be a limit
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: What we must eliminate are systems of representation that carry with them the authority which has become repressive because it doesn't permit or make room for interventions on the part of those represented.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: Humanism is the only - I would go so far as saying the final- resistance we have against the inhuman practices and injustices that disfigure human history.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: Ideas, cultures, and histories cannot seriously be understood or studied without their force, or more precisely their configurations of power, also being studied.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: The history of other cultures is non-existent until it erupts in confrontation with the United States.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: Don't you see that the lion is silent and yet feared, while the dog barks constantly and is despised?
life.author: Imam Shafi'i

life.quote: Power, after all, is not just military strength. It is the social power that comes from democracy, the cultural power that comes from freedom of expression and research, the personal power that entitles every Arab citizen to feel that he or she is in fact a citizen, and not just a sheep in some great shepherd's flock.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: Beginning is not only a kind of action. It is also a frame of mind, a kind of work, an attitude, a consciousness.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: Part of the main plan of imperialism... is that we will give you your history, we will write it for you, we will re-order the past...What's more truly frightening is the defacement, the mutilation, and ultimately the eradication of history in order to create... an order that is favorable to the United States.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: I am for peace. And I am for a negotiated peace. But this accord is not a just peace.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: Don't you see that the lion is silent and yet feared, while the dog barks constantly and is despised?
life.author: Imam Shafi'i

life.quote: I have a coach but there's nobody at my level in Gaza. I have to do most of my training sessions on my own.
life.author: Nader al-Masri

life.quote: The time has come to end the suffering and the plight of millions of Palestine refugees in the homeland and the Diaspora, to end their displacement and to realize their rights, some of them forced to take refuge more than once in different places of the world.
life.author: Mahmoud Abbas

life.quote: We never had planned to hijack a ship. We never thought of any war plans outside the Palestinian lands. We wished that the program had not failed and then the warriors could have achieved their goals.
life.author: Abu Abbas

life.quote: Just as none of us is outside or beyond geography, none of us is completely free from the struggle over geography. That struggle is complex and interesting because it is not only about soldiers and cannons but also about ideas, about forms, about images and imaginings.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: A partnership was established between Hitler's Nazis and the leadership of the Zionist movement... [the Zionists] gave permission to every racist in the world, led by Hitler and the Nazis, to treat Jews as they wish, so long as it guarantees immigration to Palestine.
life.author: Mahmoud Abbas

life.quote: I have been unable to live an uncommitted or suspended life. I have not hesitated to declare my affiliation with an extremely unpopular cause.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: I simply want tomorrow to be better than today. I want Palestine to be independent and sovereign... Do not let the olive branch fall from my hand.
life.author: Mahmoud Abbas

life.quote: What is quite worrisome is the absence of analysis and reflection. Take the word "terrorism." It has become synonymous now with anti-Americanism, which, in turn, has become synonymous with being critical of the United States, which, in turn, has become synonymous with being unpatriotic. That's an unacceptable series of equations.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: Our efforts are not aimed at isolating Israel or de-legitimizing it; rather we want to gain legitimacy for the cause of the people of Palestine. We only aim to de-legitimize the settlement activities and the occupation and apartheid and the logic of ruthless force, and we believe that all the countries of the world stand with us in this regard.
life.author: Mahmoud Abbas

life.quote: I don't remember when exactly I read my first comic book, but I do remember exactly how liberated and subversive I felt as a result.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: Look at situations as contingent, not as inevitable, look at them as the result of a series of historical choices made by men and women, as facts of society made by human beings, and not as natural or god-given, therefore unchangeable, permanent, irreversible.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: All of this wasn't enough - the Zionist movement led a broad campaign of incitement against the Jews living under Nazi rule to arouse the government's hatred of them, to fuel vengeance against them and to expand the mass extermination.
life.author: Mahmoud Abbas

life.quote: The core issue here is that the Israeli government refuses to commit to terms of reference for the negotiations that are based on international law and United Nations resolutions, and that it frantically continues to intensify building of settlements on the territory of the State of Palestine.
life.author: Mahmoud Abbas

life.quote: It [9/11 event] was aimed at symbols: the World Trade Center, the heart of American capitalism, and the Pentagon, the headquarters of the American military establishment. But it was not meant to be argued with. It wasn't part of any negotiation. No message was intended with it. It spoke for itself, which is unusual.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: We cannot build a viable state with a country that is disintegrating into small pieces.
life.author: Mahmoud Abbas

life.quote: The little jihad is over, and now we have the bigger jihad - the bigger battle is achieving security and economic growth
life.author: Mahmoud Abbas

life.quote: We always have hoped that American diplomacy deploys itself in dialogue and persuasion rather than by ultimatums. That is the path we want in international relations.
life.author: Mahmoud Abbas

life.quote: The United States that has been involved first in the Gulf War and then in the tremendously damaging sanctions against Iraqi civilians. The United States that is the supporter of Israel against the Palestinians.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: I emphasize in it [my Orientalism] accortdingly that neither the term Orient nor the concept of the West has any ontological stability; each is made up of human effort, partly affirmation, partly identification of the Other.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: If you run from a leaking roof you'll end up with a flood.
life.author: Mahmoud Abbas

life.quote: It's very hard, for example, to justify the thirty-four-year occupation of the West Bank and Gaza. It's very hard to justify 140 Israeli settlements and roughly 400,000 settlers.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: We are at a point in our work when we can no longer ignore empires and the imperial context in our studies. (p. 5)
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: From here [the Gaza withdrawal], our people begin the march towards establishing an independent Palestinian state with Jerusalem as its capital
life.author: Mahmoud Abbas

life.quote: Osama bin Laden, who is a Saudi, feels himself to be a patriot because the U.S. has forces in Saudi Arabia, which is sacred because it is the land of the prophet Mohammed.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: Most Arabs and Muslims feel that the United States hasn't really been paying much attention to their desires. They think it has been pursuing its policies for its own sake and not according to many of the principles that it claims are its own - democracy, self-determination, freedom of speech, freedom of assembly, international law.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: It was thought that to rally Islam against godless communism would be doing the Soviet Union a very bad turn indeed, and that, in fact, transpired.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: We have lost a very important religious figure who dedicated his life to peace and justice for all. [on the death of Pope John Paul II
life.author: Mahmoud Abbas

life.quote: The just response to this terrible event [9/11] should be to go immediately to the world community, the United Nations. The rule of international law should be marshaled, but it's probably too late because the United States has never done that; it's always gone it alone.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: [Roots of terrorism] come out of a long dialectic of U.S. involvement in the affairs of the Islamic world, the oil-producing world, the Arab world, the Middle East - those areas that are considered to be essential to U.S. interests and security.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: These actions were taken with the support and financing of the United States. How can you say this is part of U.S. adherence to international law and U.N. resolutions? The result is a kind of schizophrenic picture of the United States.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: There's been essentially the same analysis over and over again and very little allowance made for different views and interpretations and reflections.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: The people who perpetrated the terror of the World Trade Center and Pentagon bombings are something different because these people were obviously not desperate and poor refugee dwellers. They were middle class, educated enough to speak English, to be able to go to flight school, to come to America, to live in Florida.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: If you live in the [Middle East] area, you see [U.S actions] as part of a continuing drive for dominance, and with it a kind of obduracy, a stubborn opposition to the wishes and desires and aspirations of the people there.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: Ironically, many of people, including Osama bin Laden and the mujahedeen, were, in fact, nourished by the United States in the early eighties in its efforts to drive the Soviets out of Afghanistan.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: It was thought that to rally Islam against godless communism would be doing the Soviet Union a very bad turn indeed, and that, in fact, transpired. In 1985, a group of mujahedeen came to Washington and was greeted by President [Ronald] Reagan, who called them "freedom fighters."
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: The Hamas movement will lead Intifada after Intifada until we liberate Palestine – all of Palestine, Allah willing.
life.author: Ismail Haniyeh

life.quote: Density, complexity, and historical-semantic value that is so strong as to make politics possible... Gramsci's insight is to have recognised that subordination, fracturing, diffusion, reproducing, as much as producing, creating, forcing, guiding, are necessary aspects of elaboration.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: Uninformed and yet open to appeals for justice as they are, Americans are capable of reacting as they did to the ANC campaign against apartheid, which finally changed the balance of forces inside South Africa.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: Speaking as a New Yorker, I found it a shocking and terrifying event [9/11], particularly the scale of it. At bottom, it was an implacable desire to do harm to innocent people. It was aimed at symbols: the World Trade Center, the heart of American capitalism, and the Pentagon, the headquarters of the American military establishment.
life.author: Edward Said

life.quote: You are a Universe of Universes And your Soul a source of Songs.
life.author: Ruben Dario

life.quote: The tree is happy because it is scarcely sentient;the hard rock is happier still, it feels nothing:there is no pain as great as being alive,no burden heavier than that of conscious life.
life.author: Ruben Dario

life.quote: I seek a form that my style cannot discover,a bud of thought that wants to be a rose.
life.author: Ruben Dario

life.quote: Pity for him who one day looks uponhis inward sphinx and questions it. He is lost.
life.author: Ruben Dario

life.quote: The treacheries of ambition never cease.
life.author: Ruben Dario

life.quote: We are close to God when we are close to people. If we think of God as something in favor of the betterment of human beings, and if we act in a way that brings about that betterment-if we do not cling to riches, selfishness, or greed-then I believe we are getting closer to God.
life.author: Daniel Ortega

life.quote: One has to bear in mind that during my childhood and adolescence, I suffered the repression of the Somoza dictatorship in every way: economically, socially, as well as at the hands of the police -- because if we went out on the street to play baseball, for example, the police would come and beat us up and put us in prison.
life.author: Daniel Ortega

life.quote: Without the United States, there simply would not have been an armed uprising in our country.
life.author: Daniel Ortega

life.quote: Before consulting the hotheads who present various military options such as a military invasion: remember, President Reagan, Rambo only exists in the movies.
life.author: Daniel Ortega

life.quote: Sweet as sweetest Grecian honey will my song be when I sing, O Beloved, in the season of the Spring!
life.author: Ruben Dario

life.quote: The people of Nicaragua were suffering oppression. This made us develop an awareness which eventually led us to commit ourselves to the struggle against the domination of the capitalists of our country in collusion with the U.S. government, i.e. imperialism.
life.author: Daniel Ortega

life.quote: Conditions are ripe for triumph. We will win. And we will wield great power here.
life.author: Daniel Ortega

life.quote: The America of Moctezuma and Atahualpa,the aromatic America of Columbus,Catholic America, Spanish America,the America where noble Cuauhtémoc said: "I am not on a bed of roses"-our America trembling with hurricanes, trembling with Love: O men with Saxon eyes and barbarous souls, our America lives. And dreams. And loves. And it is the daughter of the Sun. Be careful.
life.author: Ruben Dario

life.quote: Legalisation doesn't make sense.
life.author: Daniel Ortega

life.quote: If we do not cling to riches, selfishness or greed - then I believe we are getting closer to God.
life.author: Daniel Ortega

life.quote: Rambo only exists in the movies.
life.author: Daniel Ortega

life.quote: My idol was Sandino, and also Christ. I was brought up a Christian, but I regarded Christ as a rebel, a revolutionary.
life.author: Daniel Ortega

life.quote: Poetry will exist as long as there is a problem of life and death
life.author: Ruben Dario

life.quote: Of course, the kind of support that Cuba could give us was very limited when it came to building up our army, since they didn't manufacture armaments in the quantities that we required. So we turned to Algeria and the Soviet Union for support.
life.author: Daniel Ortega

life.quote: There is that great proverb — that until the lions have their own historians, the history of the hunt will always glorify the hunter.
life.author: Chinua Achebe

life.quote: We cannot trample upon the humanity of others without devaluing our own. The Igbo, always practical, put it concretely in their proverb Onye ji onye n'ani ji onwe ya: 'He who will hold another down in the mud must stay in the mud to keep him down.'
life.author: Chinua Achebe

life.quote: The white man is very clever. He came quietly and peaceably with his religion. We were amused at his foolishness and allowed him to stay. Now he has won our brothers, and our clan can no longer act like one. He has put a knife on the things that held us together and we have fallen apart.
life.author: Chinua Achebe

life.quote: Mosquito [...] had asked Ear to marry him, whereupon Ear fell on the floor in uncontrollable laughter. "How much longer do you think you will live?" she asked. "You are already a skeleton." Mosquito went away humiliated, and any time he passed her way he told Ear that he was still alive.
life.author: Chinua Achebe

life.quote: A man who calls his kinsmen to a feast does not do so to save them from starving. They all have food in their own homes. When we gather together in the moonlit village ground it is not because of the moon. Every man can see it in his own compound. We come together because it is good for kinsmen to do so.
life.author: Chinua Achebe

life.quote: Become familiar with your home, but know also about your neighbors. The young man who never went anywhere thinks his mother is the greatest cook.
life.author: Chinua Achebe

life.quote: A man who makes trouble for others is also making trouble for himself.
