life.quote: My discovery of Tarkovsky's first film was like a miracle. Suddenly, I found myself standing at the door of a room the keys of which had, until then, never been given to me. It was a room I had always wanted to enter and where he was moving freely and fully at ease.
life.author: Ingmar Bergman

life.quote: We think that the Kyoto protocol is a necessary document, necessary process. I am convinced that we will agree to disagree about substance.
life.author: Goran Persson

life.quote: Never measure the height of a mountain until you have reached the top. Then you will see how low it was.
life.author: Dag Hammarskjold

life.quote: Scientists tend to resist interdisciplinary inquiries into their own territory. In many instances, such parochialism is founded on the fear that intrusion from other disciplines would compete unfairly for limited financial resources and thus diminish their own opportunity for research.
life.author: Hannes Alfven

life.quote: On big issues like war in Iraq, but in many other issues they simply must be multilateral. There's no other way around. You have the instances like the global warming convention, the Kyoto protocol, when the U.S. went its own way.
life.author: Hans Blix

life.quote: Every single moment of a person's life, both of the understanding and of the will, is a new beginning.
life.author: Emanuel Swedenborg

life.quote: To design a desk which may cost $1,000 is easy for a furniture designer but to design a functional and good desk which shall cost only $50 can only be done by the very best
life.author: Ingvar Kamprad

life.quote: Never, for the sake of peace and quiet, deny your own experience or convictions.
life.author: Dag Hammarskjold

life.quote: Be yourself. The world worships the original.
life.author: Ingrid Bergman

life.quote: Globalisation has made us more vulnerable. It creates a world without borders, and makes us painfully aware of the limitations of our present instruments, and of politics, to meet its challenges.
life.author: Anna Lindh

life.quote: Nature is man's teacher. She unfolds her treasures to his search, unseals his eye, illumes his mind, and purifies his heart; an influence breathes from all the sights and sounds of her existence.
life.author: Alfred Nobel

life.quote: My dynamite will sooner lead to peace than a thousand world conventions. As soon as men will find that in one instant, whole armies can be utterly destroyed, they surely will abide by golden peace.
life.author: Alfred Nobel

life.quote: I have never experienced being madly in love the way most people seem to have been, although it is not something I would miss. Instead I have had an enormous ability to love my children and my grandchildren and my great grandchildren.
life.author: Astrid Lindgren

life.quote: Old age is like climbing a mountain. You climb from ledge to ledge. The higher you get, the more tired and breathless you become, but your views become more extensive.
life.author: Ingmar Bergman

life.quote: Peace has in it trust in the Lord, that He governs all things, provides all things, and leads to a good end.
life.author: Emanuel Swedenborg

life.quote: Let our New Year's resolution be this: we will be there for one another as fellow members of humanity, in the finest sense of the word.
life.author: Goran Persson

life.quote: The demons are innumerable, arrive at the most inappropriate times and create panic and terror. But I have learned that if I can master the negative forces and harness them to my chariot, then they can work to my advantage. Lilies often grow out of carcasses' arseholes.
life.author: Ingmar Bergman

life.quote: IKEA is not completely perfect. It irritates me to hear it said that IKEA is the best company in the world. We are going the right way to becoming it but we are not there yet.
life.author: Ingvar Kamprad

life.quote: My path has not been determined. I shall have more experiences and pass many more milestones.
life.author: Agnetha Faltskog

life.quote: Anyone who has a continuous smile on his face conceals a toughness that is almost frightening.
life.author: Greta Garbo

life.quote: My greatest point is my persistence. I never give up in a match. However down I am, I fight until the last ball. My list of matches shows that I have turned a great many so-called irretrievable defeats into victories.
life.author: Bjorn Borg

life.quote: Not everyone is capable of madness; and of those lucky enough to be capable, not many have the courage for it.
life.author: August Strindberg

life.quote: Only someone who is well prepared has the opportunity to improvise.
life.author: Ingmar Bergman

life.quote: Don't let them get you down. Be cheeky. And wild. And wonderful.
life.author: Astrid Lindgren

life.quote: The wild, cruel beast is not behind the bars of the cage. He is in front of it.
life.author: Axel Munthe

life.quote: We make each other alive; it doesn’t make a difference if it hurts.
life.author: Ingmar Bergman

life.quote: Film as dream, film as music. No art passes our conscience in the way film does, and goes directly to our feelings, deep down into the dark rooms of our souls.
life.author: Ingmar Bergman

life.quote: When you love someone, you love the person as they are, and not as you'd like them to be.
life.author: Leo Tolstoy

life.quote: When I miss class for one day, I know it. When I miss class for two days, my teacher knows it. When I miss class for three days, the audience knows it.
life.author: Rudolf Nureyev

life.quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world, but no one thinks of changing himself.
life.author: Leo Tolstoy

life.quote: Ideas are more powerful than guns. We would not let our enemies have guns, why should we let them have ideas.
life.author: Joseph Stalin

life.quote: Great Britain provided time; the United States provided money and Soviet Russia provided blood.
life.author: Joseph Stalin

life.quote: This creature softened my heart of stone. She died and with her died my last warm feelings for humanity.
life.author: Joseph Stalin

life.quote: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.
life.author: Ayn Rand

life.quote: Education is a weapon the effect of which is determined by the hands which wield it, by who is to be struck down.
life.author: Joseph Stalin

life.quote: When we hang the capitalists they will sell us the rope we use.
life.author: Joseph Stalin

life.quote: The best way to keep a prisoner from escaping is to make sure he never knows he's in prison.
life.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

life.quote: Many a calm river begins as a turbulent waterfall, yet none hurtles and foams all the way to the sea.
life.author: Mikhail Lermontov

life.quote: When there's a person, there's a problem. When there's no person, there's no problem. Josef Stalin
life.author: Joseph Stalin

life.quote: Pain and suffering are always inevitable for a large intelligence and a deep heart. The really great men must, I think, have great sadness on earth.
life.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

life.quote: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
life.author: Leo Tolstoy

life.quote: Destiny may ride with us today, but there is no reason for it to interfere with lunch.
life.author: Peter The Great

life.quote: There is no difference between communism and socialism, except in the means of achieving the same ultimate end: communism proposes to enslave men by force, socialism - by vote. It is merely the difference between murder and suicide.
life.author: Ayn Rand

life.quote: The mystery of human existence lies not in just staying alive, but in finding something to live for.
life.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

life.quote: The only real power comes out of a long rifle.
life.author: Joseph Stalin

life.quote: Seize the moments of happiness, love and be loved! That is the only reality in the world, all else is folly.
life.author: Leo Tolstoy

life.quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
life.author: Ayn Rand

life.quote: Wrong does not cease to be wrong because the majority share in it.
life.author: Leo Tolstoy

life.quote: The press is our chief ideological weapon.
life.author: Nikita Khrushchev

life.quote: The life of a character should be an unbroken line of events and emotions, but a play only gives us a few moments on that line - we must create the rest to portray a convincing life.
life.author: Constantin Stanislavski

life.quote: Soldiers' bellies are not satisfied with empty promises and hopes.
life.author: Peter The Great

life.quote: Politicians are the same all over. They promise to build bridges even when there are no rivers.
life.author: Nikita Khrushchev

life.quote: I believe in one thing only, the power of human will.
life.author: Joseph Stalin

life.quote: What is hell? I maintain that it is the suffering of being unable to love.
life.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

life.quote: We are asleep until we fall in love
life.author: Leo Tolstoy

life.quote: If you wish to glimpse inside a human soul and get to know a man ... just watch him laugh. If he laughs well, he's a good man.
life.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

life.quote: I can prophecy that your grandchildren in America will live under socialism -- Our firm conviction is that sooner or later Capitalism will give way to Socialism. Whether you like it or not, history is on our side. We will bury you.
life.author: Nikita Khrushchev

life.quote: What is hell? I maintain that it is the suffering of being unable to love.
life.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

life.quote: Create your own method. Don't depend slavishly on mine. Make up something that will work for you! But keep breaking traditions, I beg you.
life.author: Constantin Stanislavski

life.quote: The United States will eventually fly the Communist red flag…The American people will hoist it themselves.
life.author: Nikita Khrushchev

life.quote: Learning to love is hard and we pay dearly for it. It takes hard work and a long apprenticeship, for it is not just for a moment that we must learn to love, but forever.
life.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

life.quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.
life.author: Ayn Rand

life.quote: Happiness is that you have three things: something you do, something you love, and something you aspire to.
life.author: Leo Tolstoy

life.quote: If the truth shall kill them, let them die.
life.author: Ayn Rand

life.quote: Nothing in this world is harder than speaking the truth, nothing easier than flattery.
life.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

life.quote: You can do a lot more with weapons and politeness than just politeness.
life.author: Vladimir Putin

life.quote: People speak sometimes about the "bestial" cruelty of man, but that is terribly unjust and offensive to beasts, no animal could ever be so cruel as a man, so artfully, so artistically cruel.
life.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

life.quote: It's better to be hanged for loyalty than be rewarded for betrayal.
life.author: Vladimir Putin

life.quote: Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice.
life.author: Anton Chekhov

life.quote: When I orbited the Earth in a spaceship, I saw for the first time how beautiful our planet is. Mankind, let us preserve and increase this beauty, and not destroy it!
life.author: Yuri Gagarin

life.quote: Remember this practical piece of advice: Never come into the theatre with mud on your feet. Leave your dust and dirt outside. Check your little worries, squabbles, petty difficulties with your outside clothing - all the things that ruin your life and draw your attention away from your art - at the door.
life.author: Constantin Stanislavski

life.quote: There are decades where nothing happens; and there are weeks where decades happen.
life.author: Vladimir Lenin

life.quote: Everybody wants to change the world, but nobody thinks about changing himself.
life.author: Leo Tolstoy

life.quote: The more a man knows, the more he forgives.
life.author: Catherine II

life.quote: Looking at the earth from afar you realize it is too small for conflict and just big enough for co-operation.
life.author: Yuri Gagarin

life.quote: Happiness does not depend on outward things, but on the way we see them.
life.author: Leo Tolstoy

life.quote: If you cannot convince a Fascist, acquaint his head with the pavement.
life.author: Leon Trotsky

life.quote: If you are a Christian, you are in danger. If you decided to abandon your faith and become an atheist, you also are to be liquidated according to their concept. You are in danger if you decide to become a Muslim. It is not going to save you anyway because they believe traditional Islam is hostile to their goals.
life.author: Vladimir Putin

life.quote: Any idiot can face a crisis - it's day to day living that wears you out.
life.author: Anton Chekhov

life.quote: We are all different, but when we ask for the Lord's blessings, we must not forget that God created us equal.
life.author: Vladimir Putin

life.quote: It is better to be unhappy and know the worst, than to be happy in a fool's paradise.
life.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

life.quote: The darker the night, the brighter the stars,The deeper the grief, the closer is God!
life.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

life.quote: Inspiration is a guest that does not willingly visit the lazy.
life.author: Tchaikovsky

life.quote: I trust no one, not even myself.
life.author: Joseph Stalin

life.quote: Do silly things. Foolishness is a great deal more vital and healthy than our straining and striving after a meaningful life.
life.author: Anton Chekhov

life.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Everything we hear is an opinion, not a fact. Everything we see is a perspective, not the truth.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: If you are distressed by anything external, the pain is not due to the thing itself, but to your estimate of it; and this you have the power to revoke at any moment.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: You always own the option of having no opinion. There is never any need to get worked up or to trouble your soul about things you can't control. These things are not asking to be judged by you. Leave them alone.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The best revenge is not to be like your enemy.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Whenever you are about to find fault with someone, ask yourself the following question: What fault of mine most nearly resembles the one I am about to criticize?
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The object of life is not to be on the side of the majority, but to escape finding oneself in the ranks of the insane.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Patience is the companion of wisdom.
life.author: Saint Augustine

life.quote: To fall in love with God is the greatest romance; to seek him the greatest adventure; to find him, the greatest human achievement.
life.author: Saint Augustine

life.quote: A Christian is: a mind through which Christ thinks, a heart through which Christ loves, a voice through which Christ speaks, and a hand through which Christ helps.
life.author: Saint Augustine

life.quote: I hope to arrive to my death, late, in love and a little drunk.
life.author: Atticus

life.quote: Death smiles at us all, all a man can do is smile back.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Most of what we say and do is not essential. If you can eliminate it, you'll have more time, and more tranquillity. Ask yourself at every moment, 'Is this necessary?'
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Take care of your body as if you were going to live forever; and take care of your soul as if you were going to die tomorrow.
life.author: Saint Augustine

life.quote: The truth is like a lion; you don’t have to defend it. Let it loose; it will defend itself.
life.author: Saint Augustine

life.quote: Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new strategy.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Because God has made us for Himself, our hearts are restless until they rest in Him.
life.author: Saint Augustine

life.quote: Pray as though everything depended on God. Work as though everything depended on you.
life.author: Saint Augustine

life.quote: Faith is to believe what you do not see; the reward of this faith is to see what you believe.
life.author: Saint Augustine

life.quote: What we do in life ripples in eternity.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Wise men learn more from fools than fools from the wise.
life.author: Cato The Elder

life.quote: Though liberty is established by law, we must be vigilant, for liberty to enslave us is always present under that very liberty. Our Constitution speaks of the "general welfare of the people." Under that phrase all sorts of excesses can be employed by lusting tyrants to make us bondsmen.
life.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

life.quote: What good are wings withou the courage to fly.
life.author: Atticus

life.quote: Cowards die many times before their actual deaths
life.author: Julius Caesar

life.quote: Hope has two beautiful daughters; their names are Anger and Courage. Anger at the way things are, and Courage to see that they do not remain as they are.
life.author: Saint Augustine

life.quote: A nation can survive its fools, even the ambitious. But it cannot survive treason from within....for the traitor appears not to be a traitor...he rots the soul of a nation...he infects the body politic so that it can no longer resist.
life.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

life.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts: therefore, guard accordingly, and take care that you entertain no notions unsuitable to virtue and reasonable nature.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Poor is the nation that has no heroes, but poorer still is the nation that having heroes, fails to remember and honor them.
life.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

life.quote: It is a great thing to know the season for speech and the season for silence.
life.author: Seneca

life.quote: It is the peculiar quality of a fool to perceive the faults of others and to forget his own.
life.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

life.quote: Silence is one of the great arts of conversation.
life.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

life.quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good person should be. Be one.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The things you think about determine the quality of your mind. Your soul takes on the color of your thoughts.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: One of the recurring themes in Marcus' handbook is leadership's responsibility to work intelligently with what it is given and not waste time fantasizing about a world of flawless people and perfect choices.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: What does love look like? It has the hands to help others. It has the feet to hasten to the poor and needy. It has eyes to see misery and want. It has the ears to hear the sighs and sorrows of men. That is what love looks like.
life.author: Saint Augustine

life.quote: Habits change into character.
life.author: Ovid

life.quote: I came, I saw, I conquered.
life.author: Julius Caesar

life.quote: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: If someone can prove me wrong and show me my mistake in any thought or action, I shall gladly change. I seek the truth, which never harmed anyone: the harm is to persist in one's own self-deception and ignorance.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Our anger and annoyance are more detrimental to us than the things themselves which anger or annoy us.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: It's not because things are difficult that we dare not venture. It's because we dare not venture that they are difficult.
life.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

life.quote: It is better to create than to learn! Creating is the essence of life.
life.author: Julius Caesar

life.quote: It is better to create than to learn! Creating is the essence of life.
life.author: Julius Caesar

life.quote: Do not indulge in dreams of having what you have not, but reckon up the chief of the blessings you do possess, and then thankfully remember how you would crave for them if they were not yours.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Never esteem anything as of advantage to you that will make you break your word or lose your self-respect.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Read at every wait; read at all hours; read within leisure; read in times of labor; read as one goes in; read as one goest out. The task of the educated mind is simply put: read to lead.
life.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

life.quote: Our life is what our thoughts make it.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Never let the future disturb you. You will meet it, if you have to, with the same weapons of reason which today arm you against the present.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: We are more often frightened than hurt; and we suffer more from imagination than from reality.
life.author: Marcus Annaeus Seneca Seneca The Elder

life.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: Dwell on the beauty of life. Watch the stars, and see yourself running with them.
life.author: Marcus Aurelius

life.quote: The Jews belong to a dark and repulsive force. One knows how numerous this clique is, how they stick together and what power they exercise through their unions. They are a nation of rascals and deceivers.
life.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

life.quote: Let us make future generations remember us as proud ancestors just as, today, we remember our forefathers.
life.author: Roh Moo-hyun

life.quote: At times, we were forced to go through a history of dependence, unable to determine our own destiny. But today, we are at the threshold of a new turning point.
life.author: Roh Moo-hyun

life.quote: I have done a lot of things outside of Science Fiction, but there has been an almost disproportionate amount of that genre in my body of work. I don't know what to make of it.
life.author: Daniel Dae Kim

life.quote: I like to think that I'm not as ominous in real life.
life.author: Daniel Dae Kim

life.quote: My wife will tell you it's the little things, like driving my boys to school on my days off so she can rest. We're not into PDA, but every time we end a phone conversation, we say 'sarang,' which means love in Korean.
life.author: Daniel Dae Kim

life.quote: There is as much wisdom in listening as there is in speaking - and that goes for all relationships, not just romantic ones.
life.author: Daniel Dae Kim

life.quote: The Age of Northeast Asia is fast approaching.
life.author: Roh Moo-hyun

life.quote: We must regain the confidence and drive to decide our own destiny.
life.author: Roh Moo-hyun

life.quote: I've had some surgery and shoulder problems.
life.author: Im Dong-Hyun

life.quote: Having to know the answers puts in terrible positions from which to learn.
life.author: Daniel Dae Kim

life.quote: I do hope after my crossing that more people will follow suit.
life.author: Roh Moo-hyun

life.quote: I reached a situation in which I cannot conduct the presidency.
life.author: Roh Moo-hyun

life.quote: We are a people who can bring about miracles if united.
life.author: Roh Moo-hyun

life.quote: If there is a doubt, I believe that I must put myself forward and undergo the people's judgment.
life.author: Roh Moo-hyun

life.quote: Even if we encounter some shameful events in the past, we shouldn't avoid or hide them.
life.author: Roh Moo-hyun

life.quote: You must constantly change and adapt to a new environment.
life.author: Jong-yong Yun

life.quote: I try not to push myself too hard, but I also need to perform and earn the results.
life.author: Im Dong-Hyun

life.quote: I had a strong desire to become an archer from the very first time I tried it. I forgot my other ambitions. I just wanted to compete in the Olympics.
life.author: Im Dong-Hyun

life.quote: I used to play football at school, and I enjoyed really physical sports, but I now try to avoid any sports that might build up different muscles. That might have a negative impact on my archery.
life.author: Im Dong-Hyun

life.quote: Archery requires very sensitive muscles.
life.author: Im Dong-Hyun

life.quote: Archery is not a sport for everyone. The equipment costs a lot, and it is not easy for everyone to find a place to play. It is perhaps similar to golf, but of course there are more golf courses than archery fields.
life.author: Im Dong-Hyun

life.quote: If I couldn't see the colors, now that would be a problem.
life.author: Im Dong-Hyun

life.quote: When I look down the range at the target all I can do is try to distinguish between the different colors.
life.author: Im Dong-Hyun

life.quote: For me, seeing the target and not seeing the target doesn't make any difference.
life.author: Im Dong-Hyun

life.quote: There's something about being in a house with an audience, and having that immediate feedback. I started acting because of that energy; it's what feeds me on stage and informs my choices.
life.author: Daniel Dae Kim

life.quote: What's great in theater is that you can sustain the arc of a character for a full three hours, whereas in film or TV, you have to create that arc in little pieces, and usually out of sequence.
life.author: Daniel Dae Kim

life.quote: But with two boys and a new puppy, we don't get out much. We're usually home doing stuff together as a family, like watching 'Modern Family.'
life.author: Daniel Dae Kim

life.quote: I'm funny at home too, but not deliberately. My wife is usually laughing at me rather than with me.
life.author: Daniel Dae Kim

life.quote: Well, here's what I'll say: The storytellers of 'Lost' have taken us on a pretty great journey, and there have been questions along the way, and criticisms along the way, but if you look at the totality of the show, or the experience of it as a whole, I think as long as you look at it from that perspective you'll be happy.
life.author: Daniel Dae Kim

life.quote: It saddens me to know that I jeopardized the welfare of the kind people of Hawaii, a community that I love and call my home.
life.author: Daniel Dae Kim

life.quote: I'm telling you, you can't compare Saudi Arabia to other countries.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: I'm not panicking, and I'm not scared, I've been through the Gulf War, the Asia crisis, and the Russian crisis.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: Nowadays, anyone who cannot speak English and is incapable of using the Internet is regarded as backward.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: You know, Saudi Arabia has a lot of poverty also. Regardless about what you hear about the viceroy and people being rich, et cetera.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: If I'm going to do something, I do it spectacularly or I don't do it at all.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: Most governments are pragmatic, most people are logical. There are pockets of extremism in Israel, in the U.S. and in the Muslim world. But we have to fight them with reason, with logic and with compassion.

life.quote: I own almost 100 hotels in North America. Some of them are only in management, but some of them we have some small stakes in them.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: My own center, my Kingdom Center, which is the highest priced tower in Saudi Arabia, was vacated twice because of terrorist attacks, terrorist threats.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: It is my responsibility to take advantage of my position to make the world a better place
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: Some countries, like Saudi Arabia, where the population growth is very high, whereby you don't have the mortgage low yet. Still the demand outstrips supply by much.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: In Riyadh, there's going to be a huge project that will house at least 12,000 units with inhabitants of approximately 150,000 people. It's like a city within a city.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: Well, you know, News Corp is the only real media global - that has a global presence that's involved in TV production, in movies, in publishing, in newspapers, digital media, et cetera. So for a company like that to function, clearly it does not depend only on Rupert Murdoch or James Murdoch.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: Saudi Arabia has stability. The social contract and the political contract between the king and the rulers and the royal family and the ruled people in Saudi Arabia is very strong and the bondage is so solid.

life.quote: One of my biggest personal holdings is Rotana. That company has a very dominant force in the Middle East. It has around 45% of all the movie industry and around 75% of all the music.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: Well, clearly Apple is a role model of the American innovation whereby it produced all these products - iPod, iPhone, iPad - that are really now dominating all the technology arena in the world.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: The legacy of Steve Jobs and the strength of Steve Jobs is that he established a company that's clearly firing on all cylinders and clicking very well.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: I definitely believe that the so-called American decline is greatly exaggerated.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: You know, in Saudi Arabia, there is a body of 40 people - 34 people exactly, that once the succession comes, they will meet and they will elect a king in there.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: So, if you look at what's common among some of the companies I have, including the Four Seasons, NewsCorp, George V, the Plaza, these are all irreplaceable brands in their own fields.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: We will not accept in our country even a single soldier who will attack Muslims or Arabs.
life.author: Sultan bin Abdul-Aziz Al Saud

life.quote: Our Palestinian brethren continue to be slaughtered at the hands of Israelis while the world turns the other cheek.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: Or region has suffered more than its share of wars.
life.author: Saud al-Faisal

life.quote: The lesson is that, No. 1, this management has to be at the highest class possible. No. 2, they have to have a succession plan.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: Actually, King Abdullah, under his supervision and guidance, has established a dialogue in Saudi Arabia whereby all the population, whether Shiite or Sunnis from north, south, west or east, they can get together and exchange their views.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: Ethics to me is very important.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: No company should depend on one person no matter how that person is smart or genius, whether it's Apple or News Corp, or Citibank or any other company in the world.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: The issue of Palestine has been there since more than 60 years. But more important since 1967 when the war was, ended in the defeat of some Arab countries.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: You cannot play with fire.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: I believe the government of the United States should re-examine its policies in the Middle East and adopt a more balanced stance toward the Palestinian cause.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: I will always serve my country in any capacity, but I'm very happy with what I'm doing right now.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: The potential for Twitter is spectacular and great.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: I would love to be a corporate leader.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: Kingdom Holding will continue to achieve strong results and to distribute dividends
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: We're getting hurt, but I'm a long-term investor.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: My wheels are running. My investments are local, regional and international.
life.author: Al-Waleed bin Talal

life.quote: In the current environment, we find it very difficult to defend America, and so we keep our silence. Because, to be very frank with you, how can we defend America?
life.author: Sultan bin Abdul-Aziz Al Saud

life.quote: With King Abdullah's leadership and his people's trust he can keep the kingdom stable and secure in all its affairs.
life.author: Sultan bin Abdul-Aziz Al Saud

life.quote: We are not against religions. This country is the cradle of prophecy and the true message and we will not contradict this.
life.author: Sultan bin Abdul-Aziz Al Saud

life.quote: We have warned and continue to warn against calls for the division of Iraq, which come up now and then, calling for sectarian rights or minority freedoms.
life.author: Sultan bin Abdul-Aziz Al Saud

life.quote: Saudi Arabia has also changed. People today are connecting with each other all across the world through small gadgets and television. It's a different society.
life.author: Sultan bin Abdul-Aziz Al Saud

life.quote: When one door closes, another opens; but we often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door that we do not see the one which has opened for us.
life.author: Alexander Graham Bell

life.quote: Instead of getting married again, I'm going to find a woman I don't like and just give her a house.
life.author: Rod Stewart

life.quote: Before you judge a man, walk a mile in his shoes. After that who cares?... He's a mile away and you've got his shoes!
life.author: Billy Connolly

life.quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
life.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

life.quote: Yes, friends, governments in capitalist society are but committees of the rich to manage the affairs of the capitalist class.
life.author: James Connolly

life.quote: He disliked emotion, not because he felt lightly, but because he felt deeply.
life.author: John Buchan

life.quote: I will go anywhere as long is it is forward.
life.author: David Livingstone

life.quote: If you strike at, imprison, or kill us, out of our prisons or graves we will still evoke a spirit that will thwart you, and perhaps, raise a force that will destroy you! We defy you! Do your worst!
life.author: James Connolly

life.quote: God, send me anywhere, only go with me. Lay any burden on me, only sustain me. And sever any tie in my heart except the tie that binds my heart to Yours.
life.author: David Livingstone

life.quote: If a commission by an earthly king is considered a honor, how can a commission by a Heavenly King be considered a sacrifice?
life.author: David Livingstone

life.quote: I have never once feared the devil, but I tremble every time I enter the pulpit.
life.author: John Knox

life.quote: The day will come when the man at the telephone will be able to see the distant person to whom he is speaking.
life.author: Alexander Graham Bell

life.quote: The British Government has no right in Ireland, never had any right in Ireland, and never can have any right in Ireland.
life.author: James Connolly

life.quote: Every man dies. Not every man really lives.
life.author: William Wallace

life.quote: We believe in constitutional action in normal times; we believe in revolutionary action in exceptional times.
life.author: James Connolly

life.quote: People talk of the sacrifice I have made in spending so much of my life in Africa. It is emphatically no sacrifice. Say rather it is a privilege.
life.author: David Livingstone

life.quote: Lord, give me Scotland or I die!
life.author: John Knox

life.quote: One sometimes finds what one is not looking for. When I woke up just after dawn on Sept. 28, 1928, I certainly didn’t plan to revolutionize all medicine by discovering the world’s first antibiotic, or bacteria killer. But I guess that was exactly what I did.
life.author: Alexander Fleming

life.quote: Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.
life.author: Alexander Graham Bell

life.quote: Keep your fears to yourself, but share your courage with others.
life.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

life.quote: To promote a woman to bear rule, superiority, dominion, or empire above any realm, nation, or city, is repugnant to nature; contumely to God, a thing most contrary to his revealed will and approved ordinance; and finally, it is the subversion of good order, of all equity and justice.
life.author: John Knox

life.quote: The unprepared mind cannot see the outstretched hand of opportunity.
life.author: Alexander Fleming

life.quote: There is one safe and happy place, and that is in the will of God.
life.author: David Livingstone

life.quote: I determined never to stop until I had come to the end and achieved my purpose.
life.author: David Livingstone

life.quote: The only difference between success and failure is the ability to take action.
life.author: Alexander Graham Bell

life.quote: Minds are like parachutes. They only function when they are open.
life.author: James Dewar

life.quote: No society can surely be flourishing and happy, of which the far greater part of the members are poor and miserable.
life.author: Adam Smith

life.quote: When I think of those who have influenced my life the most, I think not of the great but of the good.
life.author: John Knox

life.quote: Shall I tell you what supported me through all those years of exile among a people whose language I could not understand and whose attitude towards me we always uncertain and often hostile? It was this: "Lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world".
life.author: David Livingstone

life.quote: If you are going to be used by God, He will take you through a number of experiences that are not meant for you personally at all. They are designed to make you useful in His hands, and to enable you to understand what takes place in the lives of others.
life.author: Oswald Chambers

life.quote: There is pleasure in the pathless woods, there is rapture in the lonely shore, there is society where none intrudes, by the deep sea, and music in its roar; I love not Man the less, but Nature more.
life.author: George Byron

life.quote: I am a missionary, heart and soul. God had an only Son, and He was a missionary and a physician. I am a poor, poor imitation of Him, or wish to be. In this service I hope to live; in it I wish to die!
life.author: David Livingstone

life.quote: Like a bird singing in the rain, the grateful memories survive in time of sorrow.
life.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

life.quote: We, at least, are not loyal men: we confess to having more respect and honour for the raggedest child of the poorest labourer in Ireland today than for any, even the most virtuous, descendant of the long array of murderers, adulterers and madmen who have sat upon the throne of England.
life.author: James Connolly

life.quote: The remarkable thing about God is that when you fear God, you fear nothing else, whereas if you do not fear God, you fear everything else.
life.author: Oswald Chambers

life.quote: May the strength of God pilot us, may the wisdom of God instruct us, may the hand of God protect us, may the word of God direct us. Be always ours this day and for evermore.
life.author: Saint Patrick

life.quote: It is not from the benevolence of the butcher, the brewer, or the baker that we expect our dinner, but from their regard to their own interest.
life.author: Adam Smith

life.quote: Yes, ruling by fooling, is a great British art with great Irish fools to practice on.
life.author: James Connolly

life.quote: The achievement of one goal should be the starting point of another.
life.author: Alexander Graham Bell

life.quote: When you're not doing so well, vote for a better life for yourself. If you are doing quite nicely, vote for a better life for others.
life.author: Irvine Welsh

life.quote: The Irish Republic must be made a word to conjure with - a rallying point for the disaffected, a haven for the oppressed, a point of departure for the socialist, enthusiastic in the cause of human freedom.
life.author: James Connolly

life.quote: For the birth of something new, there has to be a happening. Newton saw an apple fall; James Watt watched a kettle boil; Roentgen fogged some photographic plates. And these people knew enough to translate ordinary happenings into something new.
life.author: Alexander Fleming

life.quote: We are not responsible for the circumstances we are in, but we are responsible for the way we allow those circumstances to affect us; we can either allow them to get on top of us or we can allow them to transform us into what God wants us to be.
life.author: Oswald Chambers

life.quote: Beauty in things exists in the mind which contemplates them.
life.author: David Hume

life.quote: Don't keep forever on the public road, going only where others have gone and following one after the other like a flock of sheep. Leave the beaten track occasionally and dive into the woods.
life.author: Alexander Graham Bell

life.quote: The first thing you have to know is yourself. A man who knows himself can step outside himself and watch his own reactions like an observer.
life.author: Adam Smith

life.quote: Dare to be honest and fear no labor.
life.author: Robert Burns

life.quote: Christ alone can save the world, but Christ cannot save the world alone.
life.author: David Livingstone

life.quote: Penicillin cures, but wine makes people happy.
life.author: Alexander Fleming

life.quote: A great man shows his greatness by the way he treats little men.
life.author: Thomas Carlyle

life.quote: There is no such thing as freedom of choice unless there is freedom to refuse.
life.author: David Hume

life.quote: Whatever you can do, or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius, power, and magic in it.
life.author: W. H. Murray

life.quote: To be trusted is a greater compliment than to be loved.
life.author: George Macdonald

life.quote: One sometimes finds what one is not looking for.
life.author: Alexander Fleming

life.quote: No one else holds or has held the place in the heart of the world which Jesus holds. Other gods have been as devoutly worshipped; no other man has been so devoutly loved.
life.author: John Knox

life.quote: Strive for continuous improvement, instead of perfection.
life.author: Kim Collins

life.quote: All your travelling is together, you eat together, you're on stage as a band together, when you get to the sound-check the band and the crew are all together.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: Classical, Romantic, and Baroque music, that's what I really like.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: When you're on tour you definitely don't want lots of arguments. It's very important that everybody gets on because you're in close proximity a great deal of the time.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: I am constantly being told that I have been a big influence for many people, including other musicians.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: Inspiration doesn't really work like that - you're not looking out for it. Inspiration is something that tends to capture you rather than you capture it.

life.quote: Right from day one, you know when you've written a good song.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: This band - because this is myself on electric and acoustic guitars - we've done three tours together now and I really, really like it which is why I did the DVD as well.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: I started running in high school. I found out if you run fast then you can get girls.
life.author: Kim Collins

life.quote: You find what you are best at and stick to it. I found my sound early on. Look at U2: they haven't changed their music for 20 years. Anyway, many people come unstuck when they try to change what they do and what they are known for.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: When I was younger I was obsessed with writing, so even if I wanted to listen, I didnt have time.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: It's a very organic process, and it has a specific order to it. I love to write, and once you've written, then you arrange. After the arrangement, you record it, and then you tour it.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: I am not in love / But I'm open to persuasion.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: So, the combination of looking at lots of different people and how they react to each other and how they relate to each other and waiting for that inspiration is the thing that allows me to keep writing.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: I love to go on tour and perform. I love all the parts of the process.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: Whichever age you are, that's the best age. I'm a very "now" person.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: I've always written in a free, unencumbered way.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: I've written what and when I want to. It's been about expressing myself. But with the degree, I had to learn to do everything in a very specific, disciplined way. I am very disciplined, but this demanded a totally different kind of discipline. A real challenge.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: Writing music is just something that I was born to do.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: My mother bought a piano, put it in the front room, and I just started writing my songs.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: So if you're on tour for eight months, a year... or whatever it is you definitely don't want arguments and I'm happy to say that I've always had a really nice bunch of people around me all the time.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: That is one of the things about going on tour, that I get to work with some really talented people and it allows me to be able to listen to them as well - and just have fun on stage.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: Yesterday I was playing Beethovens fifth, because I love that.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: Writing is all about self-editing; it's all about being present being aware of what's happening
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: Just an hour with you, and I understand why we had to meet.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: In America, you watch TV and think that's totally unreal, then you step outside and it's just the same.
life.author: Joan Armatrading

life.quote: I would like to thank the Commonwealth Games Federation for the very fair manner in which this matter has been dealt with.

life.quote: This is my future and I will take personal responsibility for making sure all competition requirements are met.
life.author: Kim Collins

life.quote: If the IAAF feel that is the right way to go for TV rights and everything, the rule will stay. As much as I want to be on the podium, tonight is a sad night for athletics.

life.quote: Whenever the competition is sleeping is when I shine.
life.author: Kim Collins

life.quote: We only have one life and one body to care of, and we better do it right. You never know what tomorrow may bring and so we better live this life the best we can and be grateful for everything we have.

life.quote: I know that success does not come at once, it is not a thing achieved overnight. It is the result of many, many, many years of working and trying to achieve goals.

life.quote: I had to listen to the classical music because it calms me down, calms my nerves down.

life.quote: I don't like to compare years, honestly. I think every year is a different experience, a different challenge. You grow. You evolve as a person and as a player.

life.quote: Tennis players we're always playing in center courts that feel like arenas. And when we get on the court and the crowd cheers your name or salutes you - it's like you're a gladiator in the arena. And everyone is cheering - and you're fighting, you're screaming, during your strokes - it feels like you're an animal, fighting for your life.

life.quote: I am grateful to life. And also to the people who have brought me here. Without them, I could not be where I am now.

life.quote: I'm a happy man, because I am successful in what I do, of course; but what makes me most happy is I have people around me that I love and who love me back. This, for me, is the most important thing. Nobody likes to be alone.

life.quote: In my case, I can sincerely say nothing is impossible.

life.quote: Mangling my racket and an odd swearword on the court is not something I am proud of and it shouldn't happen, but even my coaches have told me that it's sometimes better to let it all out, the anger inside you, because keeping it bottled would just eat you up in the long term.
life.author: Novak Djokovic

life.quote: The fact that nobody played tennis in my family and you'd say by chance they make three tennis courts in front of the restaurant that my family owned when I was 4, I think that's a destiny. That's kind of life circumstances that kind of come together for you to become who you want to become.

life.quote: My nutritionist has done a great job in changing my diet after we established I am allergic to things like gluten - I can't eat pizza, pasta and bread. I have lost some weight, but my movement is sharper and I feel great.

life.quote: Each year represents new challenges and obstacles. You have to adjust.

life.quote: I want to help children in Serbia and around the world so they can realize their dreams.

life.quote: I often regret that I have spoken; Never that I have been silent.

life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: There are only two days in the year that nothing can be done. One is called Yesterday and the other is called Tomorrow. Today is the right day to Love, Believe, Do and mostly Live.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Don't ever mistake my silence for ignorance, my calmness for acceptance or my kindness for weakness. Compassion and tolerance are not a sign of weakness, but a sign of strength.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Give the ones you love wings to fly, roots to come back and reasons to stay.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Do not let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: The planet does not need more "successful people". The planet desperately needs more peacemakers, healers, restorers, storytellers and lover of all kinds.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Just one small positive thought in the morning can change your whole day.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: When you think everything is someone else's fault, you will suffer a lot. When you realize that everything springs only from yourself, you will learn both peace and joy.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: I find hope in the darkest of days, and focus in the brightest. I do not judge the universe.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: When you talk, you are only repeating what already know. But if you listen, you may learn something new.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Follow the three R's: - Respect for self. - Respect for others. - Responsibility for all your actions.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: The planet does not need more successful people. The planet desperately needs more peacemakers, healers, restorers, storytellers, and lovers of all kinds.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Choose to be optimistic, it feels better.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Remember that the best relationship is one in which your love for each other exceeds your need for each other.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: True happiness comes from having a sense of inner peace and contentment, which in turn must be achieved by cultivating altruism, love and compassion, and by eliminating anger, selfishness and greed.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: This is my simple religion. There is no need for temples; no need for complicated philosophy. Our own brain, our own heart is our temple; the philosophy is kindness.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Choose to be optimistic, it feels better.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: A lack of transparency results in distrust and a deep sense of insecurity.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Don’t let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Remember that great love and great achievements involve great risk.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Instead of wanting more, give thanks for the blessings you already have.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: If someone does not smile at you, be generous and offer your own smile. Nobody needs a smile more than the one that cannot smile to others.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Foolish, selfish people are always thinking of themselves and the result is always negative. Wise persons think of others, helping them as much as they can, and the result is happiness. Love and compassion are beneficial both for you and others. Through your kindness to others, your mind and heart will open to peace.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Share your knowledge. It is a way to achieve immortality.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: A heart full of love and compassion is the main source of inner strength, willpower, happiness, and mental tranquility
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: If every 8 year old in the world is taught meditation, we will eliminate violence from the world within one generation
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: We often add to our pain and suffering by being overly sensitive, over-reacting to minor things, and sometimes taking things too personally.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Happiness mainly comes from our own attitude, rather than from external factors.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Anger cannot be overcome by anger. If someone is angry with you, and you show anger in return, the result is a disaster. On the other hand, if you control your anger and show its opposite - love, compassion, tolerance and patience - not only will you remain peaceful, but the other person's anger will also diminish.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: What is love ? Love is the absence of judgment
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: The challenge today is to convince people of the value of truth, honesty, compassion and a concern for others.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Just as ripples spread out when a single pebble is dropped into water, the actions of individuals can have far-reaching effects.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Light must come from inside. You cannot ask the darkness to leave; you must turn on the light.
life.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

life.quote: My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: I have found that the greatest degree of inner tranquility comes from the development of love and compassion. The more we care for the happiness of others, the greater is our own sense of well-being. Cultivating a close, warmhearted feeling for others automatically puts the mind at ease. It is the ultimate source of success in life.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Today, as we wish each other a Happy New Year, let us determine to be more sincere, compassionate, warm-hearted human beings, trying to make our world a more equal place. That way we'll actually make it a happy year.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Do not let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: When we feel love and kindness toward others, it not only makes others feel loved and cared for, but it helps us also to develop inner happiness and peace.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: If you don't love yourself, you cannot love others. You will not be able to love others. If you have no compassion for yourself then you are not able of developing compassion for others.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them humanity cannot survive.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: The period of greatest gain in knowledge and experience is the most difficult period in one's life.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Sleep is the best meditation.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: We can live without religion and meditation, but we cannot survive without human affection.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: The purpose of out lives is to be happy.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Compassion is not religious business, it is human business, it is not luxury, it is essential for our own peace and mental stability, it is essential for human survival.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: We must never forget that it is through our actions, words, and thoughts that we have a choice.
life.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

life.quote: I describe myself as a simple Buddhist monk. No more, no less.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Old friends pass away, new friends appear. It is just like the days. An old day passes, a new day arrives. The important thing is to make it meaningful: a meaningful friend - or a meaningful day.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: The way to change others' minds is with affection, and not anger.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: The most essential thing in life is to establish an unafraid, heartfelt communication with others.
life.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

life.quote: Give the ones you love wings to fly, roots to come back, and reasons to stay.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: I remain convinced that most human conflicts can be solved through genuine dialogue conducted with a spirit of openness and reconciliation.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: The problems we face today, violent conflicts, destruction of nature, poverty, hunger, and so on, are human-created problems which can be resolved through human effort, understanding and the development of a sense of brotherhood and sisterhood. We need to cultivate a universal responsibility for one another and the planet we share.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: No society can legitimately call itself civilized if a sick person is denied medical aid because of lack of means.
life.author: Aneurin Bevan

life.quote: The NHS will last as long as there are folk left with faith to fight for it
life.author: Aneurin Bevan

life.quote: It's best being a striker. If you miss five then score the winner, you're a hero. The goalkeeper can play a blinder, then let one in… and he's a villain.
life.author: Ian Rush

life.quote: How can wealth persuade poverty to use its political freedom to keep wealth in power? Here lies the whole art of Conservative politics in the twentieth century.
life.author: Aneurin Bevan

life.quote: No amount of cajolery, and no attempts at ethical or social seduction, can eradicate from my heart a deep burning hatred for the Tory Party. So far as I am concerned they are lower than vermin.
life.author: Aneurin Bevan

life.quote: My philosophy is: It's none of my business what people say of me and think of me. I am what I am, and I do what I do. I expect nothing and accept everything. And it makes life so much easier.
life.author: Anthony Hopkins

life.quote: My philosophy is: It's none of my business what people say of me and think of me. I am what I am and I do what I do. I expect nothing and accept everything. And it makes life so much easier.
life.author: Anthony Hopkins

life.quote: Women will be no longer made the slaves of, or dependent upon men ... They will be equal in education, rights, privileges and personal liberty.
life.author: Robert Owen

life.quote: Eight hours daily labour is enough for any human being, and under proper arrangements sufficient to afford an ample supply of food, raiment and shelter, or the necessaries and comforts of life, and for the remainder of his time, every person is entitled to education, recreation and sleep.
life.author: Robert Owen

life.quote: The lowest stage of humanity is experienced when the individual must labour for a small pittance of wages from others.
life.author: Robert Owen

life.quote: Is it not the interest of the human race, that every one should be so taught and placed, that he would find his highest enjoyment to arise from the continued practice of doing all in his power to promote the well-being, and happiness, of every man, woman, and child, without regard to their class, sect, party, country or colour
life.author: Robert Owen

life.quote: To train and educate the rising generation will at all times be the first object of society, to which every other will be subordinate.
life.author: Robert Owen

life.quote: There is but one mode by which man can possess in perpetuity all the happiness which his nature is capable of enjoying, - that is by the union and co-operation of all for the benefit of each.
life.author: Robert Owen

life.quote: I think, that if I touched the earth, it would crumble; It is so sad and beautiful, so tremulously like a dream.
life.author: Dylan Thomas

life.quote: Do not go gently into that good night but rage, rage against the dying of the light.
life.author: Dylan Thomas

life.quote: I hold a beast, an angel and a madman within me.
life.author: Dylan Thomas

life.quote: When one burns one's bridges, what a very nice fire it makes.
life.author: Dylan Thomas

life.quote: Light breaks where no sun shines; Where no sea runs, the waters of the heart; Push in their tides.
life.author: Dylan Thomas

life.quote: Life always offers you a second chance. is called tomorrow.
life.author: Dylan Thomas

life.quote: A good poem is a contribution to reality. The world is never the same once a good poem has been added to it. A good poem helps to change the shape of the universe, helps to extend everyone's knowledge of himself and the world around him.
life.author: Dylan Thomas

life.quote: The purpose of getting power is to be able to give it away.
life.author: Aneurin Bevan

life.quote: No expectations. Ask nothing, expect nothing and accept everything, and life is very well.
life.author: Anthony Hopkins

life.quote: I love you more than anybody in the world... I love you for millions and millions of things, clocks and vampires and dirty nails and squiggly paintings and lovely hair and being dizzy and falling dreams.
life.author: Dylan Thomas

life.quote: We could manage to survive without money changers and stockbrokers. We should find it harder to do without miners, steel workers and those who cultivate the land.
life.author: Aneurin Bevan

life.quote: A census taker once tried to test me. I ate his liver with some fava beans and a nice chianti.
life.author: Anthony Hopkins

life.quote: You wouldn't think such a place as San Francisco could exist. The wonderful sunlight there, the hills, the great bridges, the Pacific at your shoes. Beautiful Chinatown. Every race in the world. The sardine fleets sailing out. The little cable-cars whizzing down The City hills. And all the people are open and friendly.
life.author: Dylan Thomas

life.quote: The average person is gregarious; there is something in the spirit of the crowd that adds to the enjoyment of entertainment.
life.author: Ivor Novello

life.quote: An alcoholic is someone you don't like who drinks as much as you do.
life.author: Dylan Thomas

life.quote: Damn it all you can't have the crown of thorns and the thirty pieces of silver.
life.author: Aneurin Bevan

life.quote: Real joy comes not from ease or riches or from the praise of men but from doing something worthwhile.
life.author: Wilfred Grenfell

life.quote: Once you accept the fact that there's nothing to fear, you drill into the primal oil well. I believe when we do things without fear, we can do anything. As long as you don't worry about the consequences.
life.author: Anthony Hopkins

life.quote: In 1983 I'd had a number one. I'd sold 6 million copies of Total Eclipse Of The Heart all over the world.
life.author: Bonnie Tyler

life.quote: After Zorro, people spoke Spanish to me for ages. I'm Welsh but that movie instantly gave me a new ethnicity.
life.author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

life.quote: To preserve permanent good health, the state of mind must be taken into consideration.
life.author: Robert Owen

life.quote: Friendships that have stood the test of time and change are surely best.
life.author: Joseph Parry

life.quote: The whole point of courage, to overcome your fear. That's the interesting thing, when courage bleeds through the fear.
life.author: Anthony Hopkins

life.quote: Don't be afraid to take a big step if one is indicated. You can't cross a chasm in two small jumps.
life.author: David Lloyd George

life.quote: You're not more than one generation from poor white trash, are you, Agent Starling?
life.author: Anthony Hopkins

life.quote: It snowed last year too: I made a snowman and my brother knocked it down and I knocked my brother down and then we had tea.
life.author: Dylan Thomas

life.quote: The best craftsmanship always leaves holes and gaps... so that something that is not in the poem can creep, crawl, flash or thunder in.
life.author: Dylan Thomas

life.quote: I went on all over the States, ranting poems to enthusiastic audiences that, the week before, had been equally enthusiastic about lectures on Railway Development or the Modern Turkish Essay.
life.author: Dylan Thomas

life.quote: What is our task? To make Britain a fit country for heroes to live in.
life.author: David Lloyd George

life.quote: If my revelation of having bipolar II has encouraged one person to seek help, then it is worth it. There is no need to suffer silently and there is no shame in seeking help.
life.author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

life.quote: I wish I was born in that era: dancing with Fred Astaire and Gene Kelly, going to work at the studio dressed in beautiful pants, head scarves, and sunglasses.
life.author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

life.quote: My life was not useless; I gave important truths to the world, and it was only for want of understanding that they were disregarded. I have been ahead of my time.
life.author: Robert Owen

life.quote: If you're going to make rubbish, be the best rubbish in it.
life.author: Richard Burton

life.quote: I do condition my hair with honey and beer. I smell like the bottom of a beer barrel for days afterwards, but it's very good for the hair.
life.author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

life.quote: Once upon a time I was falling in love, now I'm only falling apart.
life.author: Bonnie Tyler

life.quote: Finding that no religion was based upon facts, but that all of them were in opposition to facts, and could not therefore be true, I began to reflect upon what must be the condition of mankind, trained from infancy to believe in these errors, and to make them the rule of their conduct.
life.author: Robert Owen

life.quote: I mean, first of all, let me say whichever superhero first came up with the idea of wearing a cape, he wasn't really onto anything good. The number of times I'm treading on that damn thing or I throw a punch and it ends up covering my whole head. It's really not practical.
life.author: Christian Bale

life.quote: You can't relate to a superhero, to a superman, but you can identify with a real man who in times of crisis draws forth some extraordinary quality from within himself and triumphs but only after a struggle.
life.author: Timothy Dalton

life.quote: Cold beer is bottled God.
life.author: Dylan Thomas

life.quote: The only differences one can and should allow in socialism are between hard working people and idlers and between honest people and dishonest people.
life.author: Slobodan Milosevic

life.quote: Life is not worth living if I cannot have pasta or bread again.
life.author: Monica Seles

life.quote: The loss of national identity is the greatest defeat a nation can know, and it is inevitable under the contemporary form of colonization.
life.author: Slobodan Milosevic

life.quote: Tennis has to become everything to you if you're going to make it to the top. You have to live it.
life.author: Monica Seles

life.quote: Materialism is incomplete even as a theory of the physical world, since the physical world includes conscious organisms among its most striking occupants.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: Life may be not only meaningless but absurd.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: Each of our lives is a part of the lengthy process of the universe gradually waking up and becoming aware of itself.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: A person may be greedy, envious, cowardly, cold, ungenerous, unkind, vain, or conceited, but behave perfectly by a monumental act of the will.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: Yugoslavia is a multinational community and it can survive only under the conditions of full equality for all nations that live in it.
life.author: Slobodan Milosevic

life.quote: Humans are addicted to the hope for a final reckoning, but intellectual humility requires that we resist the temptation to assume that tools of the kind we now have are in principle sufficient to understand the universe as a whole.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: I don't believe in playing hurt, in taking injections to cover the pain.
life.author: Monica Seles

life.quote: Perhaps the belief in God is the belief that the universe is intelligible, but not to us.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: fundamentally an organism has conscious mental states if and only if there is something that it is like to be that organism--something it is like for the organism.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: Altruism itself depends on a recognition of the reality of other persons, and on the equivalent capacity to regard oneself as merely one individual among many.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: It is the utmost necessity that this congress be a congress of unity.
life.author: Slobodan Milosevic

life.quote: There is a tendency to seek an objective account of everything before admitting its reality.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: every subjective phenomenon is essentially connected with a single point of view, and it seems inevitable that an objective, physical theory will abandon that point of view.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: We are not angels. Nor are we the devils you have made us out to be.
life.author: Slobodan Milosevic

life.quote: You have to want to play it all day, every day to get to the top.
life.author: Monica Seles

life.quote: I have to live for the day, and not worry about or try to know what tomorrow brings.... if I've learned one thing from all that'shappened to me, it's that if you would know what tomorrow brings, you may not want to live it.
life.author: Monica Seles

life.quote: Did you know that Christmas Day is absolutely the best day to fly? It is. No crowded airports and crowded planes. I always flew to Australia. That's what Christmas was for me - a plane journey to the next tournament
life.author: Monica Seles

life.quote: You will never have great tennis champions from England because of the cold and dark, but most of all because people only care about the sport for two weeks a year, and then they're on to something else. There's just not a great love of the sport there
life.author: Monica Seles

life.quote: If we tried to rely entirely on reason, and pressed it hard, our lives and beliefs would collapse - a form of madness that may actually occur if the inertial force of taking the world and life for granted is somehow lost. If we lose our grip on that, reason will not give it back to us.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: Equality means nothing unless incorporated into the institutions.
life.author: Slobodan Milosevic

life.quote: Everything, living or not, is constituted from elements having a nature that is both physical and nonphysical - that is, capable of combining into mental wholes. So this reductive account can also be described as a form of panpsychism: all the elements of the physical world are also mental.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: I did realize more than ever, after the stabbing, that tennis is a business - a tough business.
life.author: Monica Seles

life.quote: We are an episode between two oblivions.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: Eventually, I believe, current attempts to understand the mind by analogy with man-made computers that can perform superbly some of the same external tasks as conscious beings will be recognized as a gigantic waste of time.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: At the time when this famous historical battle was fought in Kosovo, the people were looking at the stars, expecting aid from them. Now, six centuries later, they are looking at the stars again, waiting to conquer them.
life.author: Slobodan Milosevic

life.quote: As you know, I was one of the original grunters. But Jimmy Connors used to grunt way before I was born. I never knew I was grunting, it was just part of my strokes.
life.author: Monica Seles

life.quote: Tennis is so competitive. I guess that's the way it has to be.
life.author: Monica Seles

life.quote: I never really did Christmas before. Christmas Day? I mean - what's that? What's it all about? I was always flying on Christmas Day
life.author: Monica Seles

life.quote: I have this terrible dark side to my personality, which playing tennis keeps at bay
life.author: Monica Seles

life.quote: I never knew I was grunting, it was just part of my strokes.
life.author: Monica Seles

life.quote: I'm not sure I understand how responsibility for our choices makes sense if they are not determined.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: Without consciousness the mind-body problem would be much less interesting. With consciousness it seems hopeless.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: Common sense doesn't have the last word in ethics or anywhere else, but it has, as J. L. Austin said about ordinary language, the first word: it should be examined before it is discarded.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: Consciousness is what makes the mind-body problem really intractable.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: For as long as multinational communities have existed, their weak point has always been the relations between different nations.
life.author: Slobodan Milosevic

life.quote: A theory of motivation is defective if it renders intelligible behaviour which is not intelligible.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: The inclusion of consequences in the conception of what we have done is an acknowledgement that we are parts of the world, but the paradoxical character of moral luck which emerges from this acknowledgement shows that we are unable to operate with such a view, for it leaves us with no one to be.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: It doesn't matter who is playing or how old they are. I just worry about what I can control. It doesn't give me more or less motivation.
life.author: Monica Seles

life.quote: I'm 5 feet 10 inches, and whatever my whatever my weight is, that's fine. As long as I am able to move and I feel good, it doesn't matter.
life.author: Monica Seles

life.quote: I am lucky to have advisers whom I trust.
life.author: Monica Seles

life.quote: I don't like salads: I like the strong food.
life.author: Monica Seles

life.quote: Any reductionist program has to be based on an analysis of what is to be reduced. If the analysis leaves something out, the problem will be falsely posed.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: NATO believes it can pick on a small nation and force us to surrender our independence. And that is where NATO miscalculated. You are not willing to sacrifice lives to achieve our surrender. But we are willing to die to defend our rights as an independent sovereign nation.
life.author: Slobodan Milosevic

life.quote: Absurdity is one of the most human things about us: a manifestation of our most advanced and interesting characteristics.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: The point is... to live one's life in the full complexity of what one is, which is something much darker, more contradictory, more of a maelstrom of impulses and passions, of cruelty, ecstacy, and madness, than is apparent to the civilized being who glides on the surface and fits smoothly into the world.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: I want atheism to be true and am made uneasy by the fact that some of the most intelligent and well-informed people I know are religious believers. It isn't just that I don't believe in God and, naturally, I hope that I'm right in my belief. It's that I hope there is no God! I don't want there to be a God; I don't want the universe to be like that.
life.author: Thomas Nagel

life.quote: We are all mortal until the first kiss and the second glass of wine.
life.author: Eduardo Galeano

life.quote: I don't believe in charity. I believe in solidarity. Charity is so vertical. It goes from the top to the bottom. Solidarity is horizontal. It respects the other person. I have a lot to learn from other people.
life.author: Eduardo Galeano

life.quote: Many small people, in small places, doing small things can change the world.
life.author: Eduardo Galeano

life.quote: Scientists say that human beings are made of atoms, but a little bird told me that we are also made of stories
life.author: Eduardo Galeano

life.quote: Utopia is on the horizon. I move two steps closer; it moves two steps further away. I walk another ten steps and the horizon runs ten steps further away. As much as I may walk, I'll never reach it. So what's the point of utopia? The point is this: to keep walking.
life.author: Eduardo Galeano

life.quote: The Church says: the body is a sin. Science says: the body is a machine. Advertising says: The body is a business. The Body says: I am a fiesta.
life.author: Eduardo Galeano

life.quote: Celebration of the Human Voice--- When it is genuine, when it is born of the need to speak, no one can stop the human voice. When denied a mouth, it speaks with the hands or the eyes, or the pores, or anything at all. Because every single one of us has something to say to the others, something that deserves to be celebrated or forgiven by others.
life.author: Eduardo Galeano

life.quote: I am not particularly interested in saving time; I prefer to enjoy it.
